\partial_X X^n=q^n X^n \partial_X+\bigl(\partial_X X^n\bigr)_q, \nonumber
\bigl(\partial_X X^n\bigr)_q\equiv \sum_{k=0}^{n-1}q^k X^{n-1} =\frac{q^n-1}{q-1}X^{n-1}. \nonumber
\partial_X f(X)=f(qX)\partial_X +\bigl(\partial_X f(X)\bigr)_q, \nonumber
\bigl(\partial_X f(X)\bigr)_q\equiv \sum_{k=1}^\infty \frac{f^{n}(0)}{n!} \bigl(\partial_X X^n\bigr)_q. \nonumber
\partial_X \bigl(f(X)g(X)\bigr)=\bigl(\partial_X f(X)\bigr)_qg(X) +f(qX)\bigl(\partial_X g(X)\bigr)_q. \nonumber
\label{Eq:X-variable} X=i(q-q^{-1})^{-1} \bigl( q^{(\hat z+1/2)} - q^{-(\hat z+1/2)}\bigr)\hat p^{-1}.
\label{Eq:X-perturbation} X=\hat x  + f^2 g(\hat x, \hat p), \qquad g(\hat x,\hat p)=-\frac{1}{6}(1+ \hat x  \hat p  \hat x  \hat p )\hat x.
\label{Eq:q-potential} V(X)=V(\hat x) +\hat H^{(q)}_I(\hat x,\hat p),
\label{Eq:H-q-summed} \hat H^{(q)}_I(\hat x,\hat p) =\frac{f^2}{6} \bigl\{ \hat x^3 V'(\hat x) \partial^2_{\hat x} + \bigl[\hat x^3 V^{''}(\hat x) +3 \hat x^2 V^{'}(\hat x)\bigr] \partial_{\hat x} +{\textstyle\frac{1}{3}}\hat x^3 V^{'''}(\hat x) +{\textstyle\frac{3}{2}}\hat x^2 V^{''}(\hat x)\bigr\}.

\label{Eq:hat-H} H(X(\hat x,\hat p),P(\hat x,\hat p))=H_{\rm un}(\hat x,\hat p)+ \hat H^{(q)}_I (\hat x,\hat p);
\label{Eq:tilde-H} H(X(\tilde x,\tilde p),P(\tilde x,\tilde p))=H_{\rm un}(\tilde x,\tilde p) +\tilde H^{(q)}_I (\tilde x,\tilde p).

\zeta=\frac{n^{n}}{s^{s}(n-s)^{n-s}}\frac{b^{n-s}}{a^{n}}.
x=z a^{\frac{1}{n-s}},\,\,l=-b a^{\frac{-n}{n-s}}
x^{\gamma}_{i}=a^{\frac{\gamma}{n-s}} \epsilon^{i\gamma}\left(F_{0}(\zeta)+\frac{\gamma}{n-s} \sum_{\kappa=1}^{n-s-1} \epsilon^{-in\kappa}\mu_{\kappa} l^{\kappa} F_{\kappa}(\zeta)\right) \label{ns}

F_{\kappa}(\zeta)=F \left( \begin{array}{cccc} a_{1,\kappa}, & \dots, & a_{n-1,\kappa}, & a_{n,\kappa}\\ b_{1,\kappa}, & \dots, & b_{n-1,\kappa}, & \zeta \end{array} \right)
F_{\kappa}(\zeta)=\sum^{\infty}_\mu \frac{(a_{1,\kappa})_{\mu}\dots (a_{n,\kappa})_{\mu} }{(b_{1,\kappa})_{\mu}\dots (b_{n,\kappa})_{\mu}} \frac{\zeta^{\mu}}{\mu!}
\begin{array}{rcl} a_{i,\kappa}&=&\frac{\kappa}{n-s}+\frac{n-i}{n}-\frac{\gamma}{n(n-s)} \,\,\, (i=1,2,\dots,n),\\ b_{i,\kappa}&=&\frac{\kappa}{n-s}+\frac{s-i+1}{s}-\frac{\gamma}{s(n-s)} \,\,\, (i=1,2,\dots,s),\\ b_{i,\kappa}&=&\frac{\kappa}{n-s}+\frac{i-s}{n-s}+\frac{\delta_{i}}{n-s} \,\,\, (i=s+1,\dots,n-1). \end{array}
\delta_{i}=0, {\mathrm{when}}\,\,\, i<n-\kappa,\,\,\delta_{i}=1, {\mathrm{when}}\,\,\, i \ge n-\kappa.
x=z (-l)^{\frac{\gamma}{s}}a^{\frac{1}{n-s}},\,\,\,\lambda=(-l)^{\frac{n-s}{s}}=b^{\frac{n-s}{s}}\,g^{-\frac{n}{s}}.

[f(x) , g(x)]_{MB} = (f * g)(x) - (g * f)(x) ~~~.

\int (f*g)(x) d^{3}x = \int (g*f)(x) d^{3}x = \int f(x)g(x)d^{3}x ~~~.

{\mathit {M} }^{\mu\nu}_{NP} = {\mathit {M} }^{\mu\nu}_{P} +  {\mathit {M} }^{\mu\nu}_{n} ;
{\mathit {M} }^{00}_{n} = - \frac {\tilde p^2}{4\alpha^2} ,~~~{\mathit {M} }^{11}_{n} =  \frac {\tilde p^2}{4\alpha^2} -  \frac {\tilde p_2^2}{2\alpha^2},~~~  {\mathit {M} }^{22}_{n} =   \frac {\tilde p^2}{4\alpha^2} -  \frac {\tilde p_1^2}{2\alpha^2} \\
{\mathit {M} }^{01}_{n} = {\mathit {M} }^{02}_{n}= 0   ,~~~and~~~ {\mathit {M} }^{12}_{n}= \frac {\tilde p_1\tilde p_2}{2\alpha^2}. \\
{\mathit {M} }^{\mu\nu}_{NP} = {\mathit {M} }^{\mu\nu}_{P} + \frac {1}{4 \alpha^2}( \epsilon^{lj} \epsilon^{jk} \eta^{\mu \nu} - 2  \epsilon^{\mu j } \epsilon^{\nu k }) \tilde p_{j} \tilde p_{k} ~~~,

\label{Eq_0223} \delta^{+}_l(k) = \begin{cases} \displaystyle \frac{\pi}{2}(|l| - W) + \Delta^{+}_l(k),& l \neq [e\Phi/2\pi]\\[5mm] \displaystyle \frac{\pi}{2}(e\Phi/2\pi) + \Delta^{+}_l(k),& l = [e\Phi/2\pi]\\ \end{cases}

\label{Eq_0230} -\frac{e^2||B||^2}{4\pi m^2} \leq lndet \leq 0,

\label{Eq_0303} \psi^0_l(r) = \frac{R_l(r)}{\sqrt{r}}.

\label{Eq_0314} \epsilon > (ka)^2 \int^a_0 \frac{dr}{a}   \left(\frac{r}{a}\right)^{2N+1} e^{2e \varphi}.

\Big|\Psi_\kappa(n) - \sum_{\tilde s=0}^n  \frac{(-\kappa)^{\tilde s}}{\tilde s!} \biggl[ \sum_{\tilde k=0}^{n}  \frac{(-\kappa)^{\tilde k}}{\tilde k!} \binom{n}{\tilde k} (H_{n-\tilde k}+H_{\tilde s}-2 H_{\tilde k}) \biggr]\Big| \leq C (8|\kappa|)^n  \frac{n\log n }{n!}  \,, \eqlabel{Psikappanest}
^n  \frac{|\kappa|^{\tilde s}}{\tilde s!} \biggl[ \sum_{\tilde k=n-\tilde s+1}^{n}  \frac{ |\kappa|^{\tilde k}}{\tilde k!} \binom{n}{\tilde k} \Big|(H_{n-\tilde k}+H_{\tilde s}-2 H_{\tilde k})\Big| \biggr] &\leq 2^{n+2} \log n \sum_{\tilde s=0}^n  \sum_{\tilde r=n }^{n+\tilde s} \frac{|\kappa|^{\tilde r}}{\tilde r!}   \binom{\tilde r}{\tilde s}\\ &< C n (2|\kappa|)^n  \frac{n\log n }{n!} \sum_{\tilde r=n }^{2n}   2^{\tilde r}\,,

\label{hs3}  D_{\mu \nu}^{-}(x,x')\equiv D_{\mu \nu}^{+}(x',x).
\label{hs4}  \eta^{\mu \nu}\;D_{\mu \nu}^{\pm}=0,  \qquad D_{\mu \nu}^{\pm}=D_{\nu \mu}^{\pm},  \qquad  \partial _{\nu}D_{\mu}^{\pm \nu}=0,
\label{hs5}  D_{\mu \nu}^{\pm}(x,x')=c\; \partial_\mu \; \partial_\nu \;D^{\pm}(x,x'),
s = {t + t'\over2}; \qquad \sigma = {t-t'\over2}.
\label{ksy1}  \tilde{D}^{\pm}(\omega , s)=  \int _{-\infty}^{\infty} d\sigma \;  e^{-i\omega \sigma}\; D^{\pm}(s,\sigma),
\label{ksy2}  n(\omega , s)=\frac{1}{(2\pi)^2 \omega}  \left[  \tilde{D}^{+}(\omega , s )-  \tilde{D}^{-}(\omega , s )  \right],
\label{ksy3}  \frac{d e}{d\omega}=\frac{\omega ^2}{\pi}  \left[  \tilde{D}^{+}(\omega , s )+  \tilde{D}^{-}(\omega , s )  \right].
\label{hswl}  x^{\alpha}(s)=  (\gamma s, R_{0}\cos (\omega _{0}s),  R_{0}\sin (\omega _{0}s), 0),
\label{hsA}  \frac{d e}{d\omega}=  \frac{\gamma ^3}{2\pi ^3 R_{0}^{3}} \;  \frac{\omega ^2+(\gamma v \omega _{0})^2}{\omega ^2} \;  \frac{v^3w^2}{w^2+(2\gamma v)^2} \;  h_{\gamma}(w),
\label{hsB}  \frac{d p}{d\omega}=  \frac{\gamma ^3}{2\pi ^3 R_{0}^{3}}\;  \frac{\omega ^2+(\gamma v \omega _{0})^2}{\omega ^2}\;  4v^4 \; k_{\gamma}(w),
\label{hsC}  \frac{d s}{d\omega}=  \frac{\gamma ^3}{2\pi ^3 R_{0}^{3}}\;  \frac{\omega ^2+(\gamma v \omega _{0})^2}{\omega ^2}\;  \frac{v^3w^2}{w^2+(2\gamma v)^2}\;  j_{\gamma}(w).
\label{hsD}  h_{\gamma}(w)\equiv   \frac{v^3w^2}{w^2+(2\gamma v)^2}  \int _{0}^{\infty}\left(\frac{N_h(x,v)}  (3+v^2)x^2+(v^2+3v^4)\sin ^2x-8v^2x \sin x}  {\gamma ^2[x^2-v^2\sin ^2 x]^3}  -\frac{3}{x^4}+\frac{2\gamma ^2 v^2}{x^2}\right)\cos (wx)\; d x;
\label{hsE}  k_{\gamma}(w)\equiv -  \int _{0}^{\infty}\left(\frac{N_k(x,v)}{\gamma ^2[x^2-v^2\sin ^2 x]^3}  x^2+v^2\sin ^2x-(1+v^2)x \sin x}{\gamma ^2[x^2-v^2\sin ^2 x]^3}  -\frac{3}{x^4}-\frac{\gamma ^2}{6x^2}\right)  \cos (wx)\; d x;
\label{hsF}  j_{\gamma}(w)\equiv \frac{v^3w^2}{w^2+(2\gamma v)^2} f(v,w,\gamma)  \int _{0}^{\infty}\left(\frac{1}{\gamma ^4[x^2-v^2\sin ^2 x]^2}-  \frac{1}{x^4}+\frac{2\gamma ^2 v^2}{3x^2}\right)\cos (wx)\; d x.
$ H_{\gamma}=\frac{v^3w^2}{w^2+(2\gamma v)^2}\;  h_{\gamma}(w),  \quad  K_{\gamma}=4v^{4}\; k_{\gamma}(w),  \quad  J_{\gamma}=\frac{v^3w^2}{w^2+(2\gamma v)^2}\; j_{\gamma}(w)$,  
\label{ksy6}  \tilde{D}^{-}(\omega)  \frac{de}{d\omega}=  \frac{\omega ^3}{\pi ^2}  \left[  \frac{\omega _{0}}{\gamma\omega}  \sum _{n=0}^{\infty}  \frac{v^{2n}}{2n+1}\sum _{k=0}^{n}(-1)^{k}  \;  \frac{(n-k-\frac{\omega}{\gamma \omega _0})^{2n+1}}{k!\; (2n-k)!}  \;  \Theta\left(n-k-\frac{\omega}{\gamma \omega _0}\right)\right],

\frac{\partial}{\partial t} p_0(y,t) =  \frac{\partial}{\partial y} \left(y\, p_0(y,t)\right) + \frac{\langle x^2\rangle}{2} \frac{\partial^2}{\partial y^2}p_0(y,t) - \frac{\partial}{\partial y} \int dx\, x\, a(x,y,t) \, . \label{eq16}

P(\beta) = \lim_{t\rightarrow\infty} {1\over t} \ln  \sum_{t\leq T_p\leq t+\varepsilon} \exp\left( -\beta \sum_{i=1}^{d-1} \lambda_{p,i}T_p\right)\ . \label{eq27}

S[\psi]= \int\; dx\left[\frac12 \psi^2(x) -\frac{q^2}{2}\partial_\mu \psi(x)\partial^\mu \psi(x) - \frac14\tilde{\psi}^4(x) \right], \label{action-tab-x}
\label{tilde-psi} \tilde{\psi}(x)\equiv\Psi (x)= \exp(\frac18 \Box)\psi(x).
\Upsilon(x) -\Psi^2(x)=0,
\left(q^2\Box+1\right)\Psi(x) -D^2_\Box\left( \Upsilon \Psi\right)(x)=0.
\label{Phi1} \Upsilon(t) -D^2_t\left(\Psi^2\right)(t)=0,
\label{Psi1} \left(-q^2\frac{d^2}{dt^2}+1\right)\Psi(t) -D^2_t\left( \Upsilon \Psi\right)(t)=0.
\label{tilde-psi1} \tilde{\psi}(t)\equiv\Psi (t)= e^{-\frac18 \frac{d^2}{dt^2}} \psi(t), ~~~~
\label{tilde-phi1} \tilde{\upsilon}(t)\equiv\Upsilon (t)= e^{-\frac18 \frac{d^2}{dt^2}} \upsilon(t). ~~~~
\label{Phi-m} D^{-2}_{t}\Upsilon =\Psi^2,
\label{Psi-m}  \left(-q^2 \frac{d^2}{dt^2}+1\right)D^{-2}_{t}\Psi = \Upsilon \Psi.
\label{Phi-con}  C \Upsilon=\Psi^2,
\label{Psi-con}  (- q^2 \frac{d^2}{dt^2}+1)C\Psi=\Upsilon \Psi,
\label{con-def} \Cc_a\psi (t)=\frac{1}{\sqrt{4\pi a}}\int _{-\infty}^{\infty} e^{-\frac{(t-t')^{2}}{4a}} \psi(t')dt'.
\label{up-Up} \upsilon=\Cc_{1/8}\Upsilon=\Cc_{1/8}\tilde{\upsilon},
\psi=\Cc_{1/8}\Psi=\Cc_{1/8}\tilde{\psi}. \label{psi-Psi}
\label{Phi-con-sl}  C \Upsilon=\Psi^2,
\label{Psi-con-sl} C\Psi=\Upsilon \Psi.
\label{eq+} ( C_{+} \Upsilon)(t) = \Psi(t)^2,~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
\label{eq-} (C_{-} \Psi) (t)=\Upsilon (t)\Psi(t), ~~~0\leq t<\infty,
K_{+}(t,t') =K(t-t')+K(t+t'),
K_{-}(t,t') =K(t-t')- K(t+t'),
\Upsilon =\frac{C_{-} \Psi}{\Psi},
\label{parts-of-Energy}  E(t)=E_{k}(t)+ E_{p}(t)+E_{nl}(t),
\label{pk-of-Energy} E_{k}(t)=\frac{q^2}{2} (\partial \psi)^2,
\label{pp-of-Energy}  E_{p}(t)=- \frac{1}{4}\upsilon^2 -\frac12 \psi^2+  \frac{1}{ 2}(\Upsilon \Psi^2 ),
\label{parts-of-energy}  E_{nl}(t)=E_{nl1}(t)+E_{nl2}(t)+E_{nl3}(t)+E_{nl4}(t),
\label{calE} {\cal E}(t)={\cal E}_{p}+{\cal E}_{k}+ {\cal E}_{nl}(t),
\label{ekep} {\cal E}_{k}=\frac{q^2}{2} (\partial \psi)^2 ,~~~~ {\cal E}_{p}=- \frac{1}{2}\psi^2+ \frac{1}{ 4}\Psi ^4,
\label{enl} {\cal E}_{nl}(t)=\frac18\int_0^1 d\rho\left( e^{\frac{-\rho}{8}{\partial}^2} \Psi ^3 \right) \overleftrightarrow{\partial}   \left(\partial  e^{\frac{\rho}{8}{\partial}^2} \Psi \right).
\label{Enla} {\cal E}_{nl}(t)={\cal E}_{nl1}(t)+{\cal E}_{nl2}(t)= \frac18\int_0^1 d\rho\left( e^{\frac{1-\rho}{8}{\partial}^2}(-q^2 {\partial}^2+1 ) \psi \right) \overleftrightarrow{\partial}   \left(\partial  e^{-\frac{1-\rho}{8}{\partial}^2} \psi \right).
\label{sr} {\cal E}_{nl}(t)=\frac18\int_0^1 d\rho\left( e^{\frac{2-\rho}{8}{\partial}^2}(-q^2 {\partial}^2+1 ) \Psi \right) \overleftrightarrow{\partial}   \left(\partial  e^{\frac{\rho}{8}{\partial}^2} \Psi \right).
\label{eint} {\cal E}_{nl}(t)=\frac{1}{8}\int_{\varepsilon}^{1} d\rho (K_1 \Psi)(K_2 \Psi)- \frac{1}{8}\int_{\varepsilon}^{1} d\rho (K_3 \Psi)(K_4 \Psi),
\label{pressure} P(t)=-E+2E_{k}(t)+2E_{nl2}(t)+2E_{nl4}(t),
\label{pres} \begin{split} P(t)=-E+q^2 (\partial  \psi)^2&-\frac14 \int_0^1 d\rho( e^{\frac{1-\rho}{8}{\partial}^2}( -q^2{\partial}^2+1)\partial\psi)   ( e^{-\frac{1-\rho}{8}{\partial}^2}\partial  \psi )\\ &-\frac18 \int_0^1 d\rho( e^{\frac{1-\rho}{8} {\partial}^2}\partial \upsilon  )( e^{-\frac{1-\rho}{8}{\partial}^2} \partial\upsilon).
\label{pressure-1} {\cal P}(t)=   -E+2{\cal E}_k(t)+2{\cal E}_{nl2}(t),
\label{p1} {\cal P}(t)=-E +q^2 (\partial  {\cal \psi})^2-\frac14 \int_0^1 d\rho( e^{\frac{1-\rho}{8}{\partial}^2}( -q^2{\partial}^2+1)\partial_{t}\psi)   ( e^{-\frac{1-\rho}{8}{\partial}^2}\partial_{t}  \psi ).
\label{p0-se} P(0)=-E+q^2 (\partial \psi)^2(0)-\frac14 \int_0^1 d\rho\left( e^{\frac{1-\rho}{8}{\partial}^2}( -q^2{\partial}^2+1)\partial\psi\right)   \left( e^{-\frac{1-\rho}{8}{\partial}^2}\partial  \psi \right).

\label{eq:localkahler}     \mathcal{L} = \intd{\diff{^4x}} \biggl( \intd{\diff{^4 \theta}} K(\Phi,   \bar{\Phi}) - \bigl(\intd{\diff{^2 \theta}} W(\Phi) + \hc \bigr) \biggr)\ .
\label{eq:vylagrangian}   \Ltext{V-Y} = \intd{\diff{^4x}}  \biggl( \intd{\diff{^4 \theta}} 9 a (\bar{\Phi} \Phi)^{\inv{3}} -   \Bigl(\intd{\diff{^2 \theta}} \bigl(\frac{2 \beta(g)}{9 \cg g^3} \Phi \log   \frac{z \Phi}{\Lambda^3} + b \Phi \bigr)  + \hc \Bigr) \biggr) \ .
\label{eq:vysuperpot}   \intd{\diff{^2 \theta}} \bigl(c \Phi \log   \frac{z \Phi}{\Lambda^3} + b \Phi \bigr) = c \bigl( F   - \inv{2 \varphi} \psi \psi + F \log \frac{z \varphi}{\Lambda^3} \bigr) + b F\ .
\label{eq:vyelimination}   F = - \inv{3} \frac{\psi \psi}{\varphi} + \frac{(\bar{\varphi}   \varphi)^{\frac{2}{3}}}{a} c \log \frac{\bar{z} \bar{\varphi}}{\Lambda^3}
\label{eq:vyonshell}   \begin{split}     \Ltext{V-Y} &= \intd{\diff{^4x}} a (\bar{\varphi} \varphi)^{-\frac{2}{3}} \bigl(\partial_\mu \bar{\varphi}   \partial^\mu \varphi + \half{i} \psi \sigma^\mu \lrpartial_\mu \bar{\psi}   \bigr) - \frac{i a}{9} \psi \sigma^\mu \bar{\psi} (\bar{\varphi}   \varphi)^{-\frac{5}{3}} (\varphi \lrpartial_\mu \bar{\varphi}) \medsp   &\quad - \frac{(\bar{\varphi} \varphi)^{\frac{2}{3}}}{a} c^2 \log \frac{z   \varphi}{\Lambda^3} \log\frac{\bar{z}   \bar{\varphi}}{\Lambda^3} + c \Bigl((\psi \psi) (\inv{3 \varphi} \log \frac{\bar{z}   \bar{\varphi}}{\Lambda^3} + \inv{2 \varphi}) + \hc \Bigr)
\label{eq:vygeneralization}   \Ltext{SYM} (\Phi, \bar{\Phi}, \ldots) = \Ltext{V-Y}(\Phi, \bar{\Phi}) +   \Delta \mathcal{L}(\Phi, \bar{\Phi}, \ldots)\ ,
\label{eq:vyFlag}   \Lindex{F} = \frac{c_1}{\Lambda^4} \bar{F} F - d F - \bar{d} \bar{F}\ .
\label{eq:vyFlag2}   \Lindex{F} = \frac{|c_2|}{\Lambda^6} \partial_\mu F \partial^\mu \bar{F} + \frac{c_1}{\Lambda^4} \bar{F} F - d F - \bar{d} \bar{F}
\label{eq:vyFlag3}   \Lindex{F} = \frac{|c_2|}{\Lambda^6} \partial_\mu F \partial^\mu \bar{F} +   \frac{c_1}{\Lambda^4} \bar{F} F  - \frac{|c_3|}{\Lambda^{12}} (\bar{F} F)^2 - d F - \bar{d} \bar{F}\ .
\label{eq:phi4min}   F_0 = \Lambda^4 \sqrt{\frac{|c_1|}{2 |c_3|}}\ ,

H_0 \equiv -\frac{3\Delta+8}{3 (\Delta +2)} H, \quad  H=- (\Delta + 2) \sqrt{- \frac{\delta}{\Delta}} \lambda_{0},
\eta = \int e^{-\alpha} dt = \frac{3 \Delta + 8}{3 (\Delta + 2)} H_{0}^{-\frac{2}{3 \Delta + 8}}  t^{\frac{3 (\Delta + 2)}{3 \Delta + 8}}.
e^{W(z)} = {\cal H}(z)^{\frac{2}{3(\Delta+2)}},\quad e^{\kappa \Xi(z)}= {\cal H}(z)^{\frac{2 \sqrt{2}b}{(\Delta+2)}},
{\cal H}(z)= \sqrt{-1-\frac{\Delta}{8 \delta}} \sinh{H z}, \label{eq:background_negative}
{\cal H}(z)=e^{H z} \label{eq:background_zero}
{\cal H}(z)= \sqrt{1+\frac{\Delta}{8 \delta}} \cosh{H z}, \label{eq:background_positive}
\partial_z W(z) \vert_{z=z_0}=-e^{W(z_0)-\sqrt{2}b \kappa \Xi(z_0)}  \frac{\sqrt{2}}{6} \lambda_0,\quad  \partial_z \Xi(z) \vert_{z=z_0}=-  e^{W(z_0)-\sqrt{2}b \kappa \Xi(z_0)} b \kappa^{-1} \lambda_0.
ds^2=e^{2 W(z)} \left( e^{2 \sqrt{2} b \kappa \phi(t)} dz^2  -dt^2 + e^{2 \alpha(t)} \left(-2 T_i dz dx^i -2 S_i dt dx^i+ \delta_{ij} dx^i dx^j \right) \right),

\delta \phi_f \equiv \delta \phi+\frac{\dot{\phi}}{\dot{\alpha}} \Psi =\delta \phi+3 \sqrt{2} b \kappa^{-1} \Psi,
\delta S^{(S)}=\frac{1}{2}\int dz dt dx^3 e^{3 W(z)} e^{\sqrt{2} b \kappa \phi(t)} e^{3 \alpha(t)}(e^{-2 \sqrt{2}b \kappa \phi(t)} \delta \phi_f^{'2}- \dot{\delta \phi_f}^2 +e^{-2 \alpha(t)} (\nabla \delta \phi_f)^2).

\varphi_{ij}=\frac{1}{2 \kappa} h_{ij}. \label{eq:tensor}

\partial_z \varphi_{ij} \vert_{z=z_0} =0.

\left[ a_{pm}, a_{p'm'}^{\dagger} \right] = \delta(p - p') \delta(m - m').
\left. \frac{\partial}{\partial z} \psi_{m}(z) \right|_{z = z_{0}} = 0.

\psi''_{m} +\frac{2}{\Delta+2} H \psi'_{m} + m^{2} \psi_{m} = 0.
C=\frac{i \beta + \frac{1}{\Delta+2}}{i \beta - \frac{1}{\Delta+2}}.

\label{phi_exp}   C \Lambda^{3\kappa} |\phi|^{4/3-\kappa}  = L \Lambda^3 \left( 1   +\frac23 \rho + \frac29 \rho^2 +\mathcal{O}(\rho^3) \right)~.
\label{pot_exp}   \frac{4\rho^2 L \Lambda^3}{(4-3\kappa)^2} \left( 1 +\frac23 \rho   +\cdots\right) =   \frac{4\pi\tau_5}{L^2} \e{2\Phi_0}    \left( \rho^2 + \frac23 \rho^3 +\cdots \right)~.
\label{Skin}   S_{\mathrm{kin}} = - \frac{2\pi\tau_5}{L^4} \int d^4x\, \e{2\Phi}    \left[\rho \coth(2\rho+c) -\frac12 a(\rho) \cos(\psi-\psi_0) \right]    \left[ (\partial \rho)^2 +\frac14 (\partial \psi)^2 \right]~.
\label{Skin_0}   S_{\mathrm{kin}} \approx -\frac{2\Lambda^3}{L} \int d^4    x\, \left[ \rho^2 +\frac14(\psi-\psi_0)^2 \right]     \left[ (\partial \rho)^2 +\frac14 (\partial \psi)^2 \right]~.
\label{Skin_1}   S_{\mathrm{kin}} \approx -\frac1{8L\Lambda^9} \int d^4   x\, \left( \phi -\Lambda^3 \e{i\psi_0}\right)   \left( \phi^\ast -\Lambda^3 \e{-i\psi_0} \right)    \partial_\mu \phi \partial^\mu\phi^\ast ~,
\label{metric10}   ds_{10}^2 = \e{\Phi} \left[ dx_{1,3}^2 + \frac{\e{2h}}{L^2}   (d \tth^2 +\sin^2 \tth \, d\tp^2) +\frac1{L^2} d\rho^2   +\frac1{L^2} \sum\limits_{a=1}^3 (\sigma^a-L A^a)^2   \right]~.
\label{dsigma}   d\sigma^a = - \varepsilon^{abc} \sigma^b \wedge \sigma^c~.
\sum\limits_{a=1}^3 (\sigma^a -L {A'}^a)^2    = \frac12 \trace ( \sigma -L A' )^2    = \frac12 \trace (g \sigma g^{-1} -iL dg \,g^{-1} -L A)^2~.
\label{A}   A^1 = \frac{a(\rho)}{2L}  d\tth~,\quad   A^2 = \frac{a(\rho)}{2L}  \sin\tth \, d\tp~,\quad   A^3 = \frac1{2L} \cos \tth \, d\tp~,
\label{F}   F^1 = \frac{\da(\rho)}{2L} d\rho \wedge d \tth~,\quad   F^2 = \frac{\da(\rho)}{2L} d\rho \wedge \sin\tth \,d\tp~,\quad   F^3 = \frac1{2L} \left[a(\rho)^2-1\right] d\tth \wedge \sin\tth \, d\tp~.
\label{C2} \begin{split}   C^{(2)} &= \frac1{4L^2} \left[ \psi \left(\sin\theta \, d\theta \wedge   d\phi) + \sin\tth \, d\tth \wedge d\tp \right) + \cos\theta \cos\tth   \, d\phi \wedge d\tp \right] \\   &\quad - \frac{a(\rho)}{2L^2} \left( d\tth \wedge \sigma^1 +   \sin\tth \, d\tp \wedge \sigma^2 \right)~,
\label{F3}   F^{(3)} = \frac2{L^2} (\sigma^1-L A^1) \wedge   (\sigma^2-L A^2) \wedge (\sigma^3-L A^3)    - \frac1{L} \sum\limits_{a=1}^3 F^a \wedge     (\sigma^a-L A^a)~.
\label{hatrhodef}   2\hr\left[ \coth(2\hr+c) +1\right]  = 1~,
\label{charge_quant}   \frac1{2\kappa_{10}^2} \int_{S^3} F^{(3)} = N \tau_5~.
\label{lambda}   L^{-2} = N g_s \alpha'~.
\label{dC6} \begin{split}   dC^{(6)} &= -\frac1{L^2} v^{(4)} \wedge \left\{ 2 \e{2\Phi}   \left[\e{2h} +\frac1{16} \e{-2h} (1-a^4) \right] d\rho\wedge   d\tth \wedge \sin\tth\, d\tp \phantom{\frac12} \right. \\   &\quad \left. + \frac14 d\left[    \e{2\Phi} \da \left( d\tth \wedge \sigma^2 - \sin \tth\, d\tp \wedge   \sigma^1 \right)    - (a^2-1) \e{2\Phi-2h} d\rho \wedge (\sigma^3-L A^3) \right] \right\}~,
\label{C6} \begin{split}   C^{(6)} &= -\frac1{L^2} v^{(4)} \wedge \left\{    \Psi(\rho)\, d\tth \wedge \sin\tth\, d\tp \right. \\   &\quad \left. + \frac14 \left[    \e{2\Phi} \da \left( d\tth \wedge \sigma^2 - \sin \tth\, d\tp \wedge   \sigma^1 \right)    - (a^2-1) \e{2\Phi-2h} d\rho \wedge (\sigma^3 -L A^3) \right]   \right\}~,
\label{dotPsi}   \dot{\Psi}(\rho) =  2 \e{2\Phi}     \left[\e{2h} +\frac1{16} \e{-2h} (1-a^4) \right]~.
\label{eq:action} S=\int\left[\frac{1}{2\kappa_{_6}^2}(R-2\Lambda) +{\cal L}_{\matter}\right]\sqrt{-g}\,\dd^6 x,
\label{eq:lag} {\cal L}_{\matter} = \frac{1}{2}g^{\si{AB}}\DD_{\si{A}}\Phi\left(\DD_{\si{B}}\Phi\right)^* -V(\Phi)-\frac{1}{4}\F_{\si{AB}}\F^{\si{AB}},
\label{eq:fab} \F_{\si{AB}}=\partial_{\si{A}} C_{\si{B}} -\partial_{\si{B}} C_{\si{A}},
\label{eq:d} \DD_{\si{A}}\equiv\partial_{\si{A}} -iqC_{\si{A}},
\label{eq:V} V(\Phi)=\frac{\lambda}{8}\left(\vert\Phi\vert^2-\eta^2\right)^2,
\label{eq:metric} \dd s^2=g_{\si{AB}} \dd x^{\si{A}} \dd x^{\si{B}} = \ee^{\sigma(\rdim)}\eta_{\mu\nu} \dd x^\mu\dd x^\nu -\dd\rdim^2-\rdim^2\ee^{\gamma(\rdim)}\dd\theta^2,
\label{eq:ansatz} \Phi= \varphi(\rdim)\ee^{i n\theta} = \eta f(\rdim)\ee^{i n\theta},\qquad C_\theta= \displaystyle \frac{1}{q}\left[n-Q(\rdim)\right]
\label{eq:tmunumatt} T_{\si{AB}} \equiv 2{\delta {\cal L}_{\matter} \over \delta g^{\si{AB}}} - g_{\si{AB}} {\cal L}_{\matter},
\label{eq:einstein} G_{\si{AB}} + \Lambda g_{\si{AB}} + \kappa_{_6}^2 T_{\si{AB}} = 0,
\label{eq:dimless1} \radim\equiv\sqrt{\vert\Lambda\vert}\rdim,
\label{eq:dimless2} \alpha\equiv\frac{1}{2}\kappa_{_6}^2\eta^2,\qquad \beta\equiv\frac{1}{4}\frac{\lambda\eta^2}{|\Lambda|},\qquad \varepsilon\equiv\frac{q^2\eta^2}{|\Lambda|}.
\label{eq:KGred} \ddot f +\left(2\dot\sigma +\frac{1}{2}\dot\gamma+\frac{1}{\radim}\right)\dot f = \frac{Q^2}{\radim^2}f\hbox{e}^{-\gamma}+2\beta\left(f^2-1\right)f,
\label{eq:max} \nabla_{\si{A}} \F^{\si{AB}}=-q^2C^2\vert\Phi\vert^2+\frac{i}{2}q\left( \Phi\partial^{\si{B}}\Phi^*-\Phi^*\partial^{\si{B}}\Phi\right),
\label{eq:maxred} \ddot Q + \left(2\dot\sigma-\frac{1}{2}\dot\gamma- \frac{1}{\radim}\right)\dot Q = \varepsilon f^2 Q.
s \equiv \dot{\sigma}, \qquad u\equiv \dot \gamma, \qquad v\equiv \ee^{\gamma},
\label{eq:lmdefs} l \equiv \frac{2}{\radim} + u, \qquad m \equiv \radim^2 v,
\label{eq:limhiggs} f(0)=0,\qquad \lim_{\radim\to +\infty}f = 1.
\label{eq:limgauge}  Q(0)=n,\qquad \dot Q(0)=w(0)=0, \qquad\lim_{\radim\to +\infty}Q = 0.
\label{eq:ricci} R=-\left(\gamma'' + 4 \sigma'' + \frac{1}{2} \gamma'^2 + 5 \sigma'^2 + 2 \gamma ' \sigma' + \frac{2 \gamma'}{\rdim} + \frac{4 \sigma'}{\rdim}\right),
\label{eq:warp0} u(0)=s(0)=0,
\label{eq:l0} l(\radim) \sim \frac{2}{\radim}.
\label{eq:v0} v_\zero\equiv\ee^{\gamma(0)},
w \sim w_\one \radim^{\kappaw}, \qquad Q \sim n + \frac{w_\one}{1+\kappaw} \radim^{1+\kappaw},
\label{eq:f1} f \sim f_\one \radim^{\kappaf},
s \sim s_\one \radim^{\kappas},
\label{eq:s1} \kappas=1, \qquad s_\one=\frac{1}{2}\left(1 - \alpha \beta + \frac{\alpha}{\varepsilon} \frac{w_\one^2}{v_\zero} \right).
\alpha \kappaf^2 f_\one^2 \radim^{2 \kappaf-2}=2 s_\one +\left(\alpha \beta -1\right) - \frac{\alpha}{\varepsilon} \frac{w_\one^2}{v_\zero} +  \alpha \frac{f_\one^2 n^2}{v_\zero} \radim^{2 \kappaf -2}.
\label{eq:powerf} \kappaf=\frac{n}{\sqrt{v_\zero}}.
\label{eq:v0cond} v_\zero \le n^2.
\label{eq:sinf} \lim_{\radim \to +\infty} \dot{s} =\lim_{\radim \to +\infty} \dot{u} = 0.
\label{eq:warpF} \lfx^2 = \sfx^2 = -\frac{2}{5} \frac{\Lambda}{|\Lambda|}.
\label{eq:mF} \lim_{\radim \to + \infty} m \propto \ee^{-\sqrt{2/5} \radim},
\ell=\frac{3}{4} \sqrt{2\over5}\left(\sqrt{\frac{40}{9} \varepsilon +1} - 1 \right).
\label{eq:epsilonmin} 2 \ell > \sqrt{2\over 5} \quad \Longleftrightarrow \quad \varepsilon > \frac{2}{5}.
\dd s^2_{_5} = \ee^{\sigma (y)} \eta_{\mu\nu} \dd x^\mu \dd x^\nu -\dd y^2,
S_{_5}^2 +\dot S_{_5}={2\over 3}, \label{5Dmunu}
S_{_5} = c_{_5} \times {A_{_5} \ee^{c_{_5} \radim} - \ee^{-c_{_5} \radim} \over {A_{_5} \ee^{c_{_5} \radim} + \ee^{-c_{_5} \radim}}}, \label{sol5}
\lim_{\radim\to\pm\infty} S_{_5}(\radim) = \pm \sqrt{2\over 3}, \qquad \forall A_{_5} \in \setR^*. \label{inf5}
\dot s+{5\over 4} s^2 ={1\over 2}, \label{s6}
s = \sqrt{2\over 5} \times {A_{_6} \ee^{c_{_6} \radim} - \ee^{-c_{_6} \radim} \over {A_{_6} \ee^{c_{_6} \radim} + \ee^{-c_{_6} \radim}}}, \label{sol6}
\lim_{\radim\to +\infty} s(\radim) = \sqrt{2\over 5},
\left\{ \begin{aligned} \tilde{\psi} & = \psi - \sigma' \epsilon_r,\\ \tilde E &= E + 2 \ee^{-\sigma} \epsilon ,\\ \tilde\xi &= \xi - 2 \epsilon_r',\\  \tilde \zeta &= \zeta - \frac{1}{2} \left[\epsilon_\theta' +\partial_\theta \epsilon_r - \left(\displaystyle{2\over r}+\gamma'\right) \epsilon_\theta \right],\\  \tilde\omega &= \omega - {2\ee^{-\gamma} \over r^2} \partial_\theta\epsilon_\theta - \left({2\over r}+\gamma'\right)\epsilon_r,\\ \tilde B &= B -  {1\over 2} \left( \epsilon_r + \epsilon'-\sigma' \epsilon \right),\\ \tilde C &= C - \displaystyle {1\over 2} \left( \epsilon_\theta + \partial_\theta \epsilon \right). \end{aligned} \right.
\left\{ \begin{aligned}  \Psi & \equiv \psi - \displaystyle {1\over2} \sigma'     \left(4B + \ee^\sigma E' \right),\\  \Xi & \equiv \xi     -\partial_r\left(4B + \ee^\sigma E' \right),\\  \Upsilon     & \equiv\zeta - \displaystyle {1\over 4} \partial_r \left(4C +     \ee^{\sigma} \partial_\theta E\right) -\displaystyle {1\over 4}     \partial_\theta \left(4B + \ee^{\sigma} E'\right) \\ &  + \displaystyle{1\over4} \left({2\over r} + \gamma'\right) \left(4C     + \ee^{\sigma} \partial_\theta E \right),\\  \Omega & \equiv \omega - \displaystyle {\ee^{-\gamma} \over r^2}     \partial_\theta \left(4C + \ee^\sigma \partial_\theta E \right) \\  &     - \displaystyle {1\over2} \left({2 \over r} +     \gamma' \right) \left(4B + \ee^\sigma \partial_r E     \right). \end{aligned} \right.
\left\{ \begin{aligned} \epsilon &= \displaystyle -{1\over 2} \ee^\sigma E,\\ \epsilon_r &= \displaystyle 2B+{1\over 2} \ee^\sigma E',\\ \epsilon_\theta &= \displaystyle 2C+{1\over 2} \ee^\sigma \partial_\theta E, \end{aligned} \right.
\left\{ \begin{aligned} \tilde{\chi_p} & = \displaystyle \chi_p - \varepsilon_r \Phi' - i n \frac{\ee^{-\gamma}}{r^2} \varepsilon_\theta \Phi,\\ \tilde{\gper} & = \displaystyle \gper -\frac{\ee^{-\gamma}}{r^2} C_\theta \varepsilon_\theta,\\ \tilde{\gperR} & = \displaystyle \gperR - \frac{\ee^{-\gamma}}{r^2} C_\theta \varepsilon_{\theta}' + 2 \frac{\ee^{-\gamma}}{r^2} C_\theta \left(\frac{1}{r} + \frac{\gamma'}{2} \right) \varepsilon_\theta,\\ \tilde{\gperT} & = \displaystyle \gperT - C_{\theta}' \varepsilon_r - \frac{\ee^{-\gamma}}{r^2} C_\theta \partial_\theta \varepsilon_\theta, \end{aligned} \right.
\left\{ \begin{aligned} \Chip &\equiv\displaystyle \chi_p - \frac{1}{2} \Phi'\left( 4 B + \ee^\sigma E' \right) -\frac{i n \ee^{-\gamma}}{2 r^2} \Phi \left(4C + \ee^\sigma \partial_\theta E \right),\\ \Gper & \equiv \displaystyle \gper - \frac{1}{2} \frac{\ee^{-\gamma}}{r^2} C_\theta \left(4C+\ee^{\sigma} \partial_\theta E \right),\\ \GperR & \equiv  \displaystyle \gperR - \frac{1}{2} \frac{\ee^{-\gamma}}{r^2} C_\theta \left[4C'+ \left(\ee^{\sigma} \partial_\theta E\right)' \right] \\ & + \displaystyle \frac{\ee^{-\gamma}}{r^2} C_\theta \left(\frac{1}{r} + \frac{\gamma'}{2} \right) \left(4C + \ee^{\sigma} \partial_\theta E \right),\\ \GperT & \equiv \displaystyle \gperT - \frac{1}{2} C_\theta' \left(4B+\ee^{\sigma} E' \right) \\ & - \displaystyle \frac{1}{2} \frac{\ee^{-\gamma}}{r^2} C_\theta \left(4 \partial_\theta C + \ee^{\sigma} \partial^2_\theta E \right), \end{aligned} \right.
\Box = \eta^{\mu \nu} \partial_\mu \partial_\nu = \partial _t^2 - \nabla^2.\label{nabla}
2n-p = n+\bar n \Longleftrightarrow p=n-\bar n.
\ddot{\Chip} - \sqrt{5\over 2} \dot{\Chip} + \frac{M_\chi^2}{|\Lambda|} \exp\left(\sqrt{2\over 5} \radim\right) \Chip \underset{\infty}{\sim} 0, \label{eq:Chipasymp}
\label{eq:masschi} \Box \Chip = -M_\chi^2 \Chip,
{1\over z} {\dd\over \dd z} \left( z {\dd \tilde f\over \dd z}\right) + \left( {10 M_\chi^2\over |\Lambda|} - \frac{25}{4 z^2} \right) \tilde f =0,
\label{eq:Chipdiv} \Chip \propto \exp\left( \sqrt{5\over 8} \radim \right) \times \calZ_{5/2} \left[ \sqrt{10  \over |\Lambda|} |M_\chi|\exp \left( {\radim \over \sqrt{10}}\right) \right] ,
|\Chip| \underset{\infty}{\propto} \exp{\left(\sqrt{\frac{2}{5}} \radim \right)}.
\Chip \underset{\infty}{\propto} \exp{\left(\sqrt{\frac{2}{5}}\radim \right)} \exp{\left[- \sqrt{\frac{10}{|\Lambda|}} \left|M_\chi\right| \exp{\left(\frac{\radim}{\sqrt{10}}\right)} \right]}.
\Thetadim = q \Theta, \quad \Thetadim_r = \frac{q}{\sqrt{|\Lambda|}} \Theta_r, \quad \Thetadim_\theta  = q\Theta_\theta ,
\Upsiadim = \sqrt{|\Lambda|} \Upsilon,\quad \Chiadim = \frac{\Chi}{\eta},
\label{eq:upsitheta_r} \Upsiadim = \dfrac{4 \alpha Q\Thetadim_r }{\ee^{-\sigma} \madim_\upsilon^2 - 4 \alpha \dfrac{f^2 Q^2}{m}},
\label{eq:theta_r_theta} \Thetadim_r = \calP \dot{\Thetadim},
\calP = \dfrac{\ee^{-\sigma} \madim_\ug^2}{\ee^{-\sigma} \madim_\ug^2 - \varepsilon f^2 \dfrac{\ee^{-\sigma} \madim_\upsilon^2 - 4 \alpha Q^2/m}{\ee^{-\sigma} \madim_\upsilon^2 - 4 \alpha f^2 Q^2/m}}.
\label{eq:evolthetadim} \left(\calP - 1 \right) \ddot{\Thetadim} + \left[ \dot{\calP} + \left(s + \dfrac{l}{2} \right) \left(\calP - 1 \right) \right] \dot{\Thetadim} + \varepsilon f \Thetadim = 0,
\label{eq:evolthetaasymp} \ddot{\Thetadim} - \sqrt{\dfrac{5}{2}} \dot{\Thetadim} + \madim_\ug^2 \exp{\left(\sqrt{\dfrac{2}{5}} \radim\right)} \Thetadim \underset{\infty}{\sim} 0.
\label{eq:evolthetaconst} \ddot{\Thetadim} + \left[ l\left(\dfrac{\madim_\upsilon^2}{\madim_\ug^2} - 1 \right) - \sqrt{\dfrac{5}{2}} \right] \dot{\Thetadim} + \madim_\upsilon^2 \exp{\left(\sqrt{\dfrac{2}{5}} \radim \right)} \underset{\infty}{\sim} 0.
\madim_\upsilon^2 = \madim_\ug^2.
\begin{aligned} \delta g_{\mu \nu} & = \ee^\sigma \eta_{\mu \nu} \Psi, & \delta g_{\mu r} & = 0, & \delta g_{\mu \theta} & = 0, \\ \delta g_{r \theta} & = -\Upsilon, & \delta g_{rr} & = - \Xi, & \delta g_{\theta \theta} & = -\gTT \Omega. \end{aligned}
\delta g^{\si{AB}}=-g^{\si{AC}} g^{\si{BD}} \delta g_{\si{BD}},
\begin{aligned} \delta g^{\mu \nu} & = - \ee^{-\sigma} \eta^{\mu \nu} \Psi, & \delta g^{\mu r} & = 0, & \delta g^{\mu \theta} & = 0,\\ \delta g^{r \theta} & = \gTTi \Upsilon, & \delta g^{rr} & = \Xi, & \delta g^{\theta \theta} & = \gTTi \Omega. \end{aligned}
\delta R^{\si A}_{\si{\ BCD}} = -\delta \Gamma^{\si A}_{\si{\ BC};{\si D}} + \delta \Gamma^{\si A}_{\si{\ BD};{\si C}},
\delta \Gamma^{\si A}_{\si{\ BC}} = \frac{1}{2} g^{\si{AD}} \left( \delta g_{\si{DB;C}} + \delta g_{\si{DC};{\si B}} - \delta g_{\si{BC};{\si D}} \right).
\delta G_{\si{AB}} = \delta R_{\si{AB}} - \frac{1}{2} R \delta g_{\si{AB}} - \frac{1}{2} g_{\si{AB}} \delta R,
\delta R = g^{\si{AB}} \delta R_{\si{AB}} + \delta g^{\si{AB}} R_{\si{BD}}.
\begin{aligned} \delta G_{\mu \nu} & = \left(\partial_\mu \partial_\nu - \eta_{\mu \nu} \Box \right) \left( \frac{\Xi + \Omega}{2} + \Psi \right) + \frac{1}{2} \ee^\sigma \eta_{\mu \nu} \Bigg\{3 \Psi'' + 3 \gTTi \partial^2_\theta \Psi + \Omega'' - 2 \gTTi \partial_\theta \Upsilon' + \gTTi \partial_\theta^2 \Xi \\ & + 3 \left(2 \sigma' + \lngTTp \right) \Psi' - \left. \left(\frac{3}{2} \sigma' + \lngTTp \right) \Xi' + \left[\frac{3}{2} \sigma' + 2 \left(\lngTTp\right) \right] \Omega' - 3 \gTTi \sigma' \partial_\theta \Upsilon \right\} + G_{\mu \nu}  \left(\Psi - \Xi \right), \end{aligned}
\begin{aligned} \delta G_{\mu r} & = \frac{1}{2} \partial_\mu \Bigg\{3 \Psi' + \Omega' - \gTTi \partial_\theta \Upsilon - \left(\frac{3}{2} \sigma' + \lngTTp \right) \Xi + \left(-\frac{1}{2} \sigma' + \lngTTp \right) \Omega \Bigg\},\\ \delta G_{\mu \theta} & = \frac{1}{2} \partial_\mu \Bigg\{\partial_\theta\left(3 \Psi + \Xi \right) - \Upsilon' - \left(\sigma' + \lngTTp \right) \Upsilon \Bigg\}, \end{aligned}
\begin{aligned} \delta G_{rr} & = \frac{1}{2} \ee^{-\sigma} \Box\left(3 \Psi + \Omega\right) - 2 \gTTi \partial_\theta^2 \Psi + 2 \gTTi \sigma' \partial_\theta \Upsilon - \left[3 \sigma' + 2 \left(\lngTTp \right) \right] \Psi' - \sigma' \Omega',\\ \delta G_{\theta \theta} & = \frac{1}{2} \gTT \ee^{-\sigma} \Box \left(3 \Psi + \Xi \right) - 2 \gTT \Psi'' + \gTT \sigma' \left(\Xi' - 5 \Psi' \right) + \frac{1}{2} \gTT \left(4 \sigma'' + 5 \sigma'^2 \right) \left( \Xi - \Omega \right),\\ \delta G_{r \theta} & = -\frac{1}{2} \ee^{-\sigma} \Box \Upsilon + 2 \partial_\theta \Psi' - \sigma' \partial_\theta \Xi + \left[\sigma'   - 2 \left(\lngTTp\right) \right] \partial_\theta \Psi -\frac{1}{2} \left(4 \sigma'' + 5 \sigma'^2 \right) \Upsilon. \end{aligned}
\begin{aligned} T_{\si{AB}} & =\frac{1}{4} \left(\DD_{\si A} \Phi \right)^\dag \left(\DD_{\si B} \Phi \right) + \frac{1}{4} \left(\DD_{\si B} \Phi \right)^\dag \left(\DD_{\si A} \Phi \right) \\ & - g^{\si{CD}} \F_{\si{AC}} \F_{\si{BD}} - g_{\si{AB}} \mathcal{L}_{\matter}, \end{aligned}
\mathcal{L}_\matter = -\frac{1}{2} \gTTi \frac{Q'^2}{q^2} - \frac{1}{2} \varphi'^2 - \frac{1}{2} \gTTi \varphi^2 Q^2 - V(\varphi),
\begin{aligned} \delta \mathcal{L}_\matter & = \gTTi \frac{Q'}{q} \left(\GperT' - \partial_\theta \GperR \right) + \frac{1}{2} \gTTi \frac{Q'^2}{q^2} \left(\Xi + \Omega \right) \\ & + \frac{1}{2} \varphi'^2 \Xi + \frac{1}{2} \gTTi \varphi^2 Q^2 \Omega + \gTTi q \varphi^2 Q \GperT \\ & - \left[ \varphi' \Chip' \gTTi \varphi Q(Q+n-p) \Chip + {\dd V\over \dd \varphi} \Chip \right] \\ & \times \cos\left[(n-p)\theta\right]. \end{aligned}
\begin{aligned} \delta T_{\mu \nu} & = \ee^{\sigma} \eta_{\mu \nu} \Bigg\{-\gTTi \frac{Q'}{q} \left(\GperT' - \partial_\theta \GperR \right) + \left[\varphi' \Chip' + \gTTi Q (Q-n+p) \varphi \Chip + {\dd V \over \varphi} \Chip \right] \cos\left[(n-p)\theta\right] \\ & - \left(\frac{1}{2} \gTTi \frac{Q'^2}{q^2} + \frac{1}{2} \varphi'^2 \right) \Xi - \left(\frac{1}{2} \gTTi \frac{Q'^2}{q^2} + \frac{1}{2} \gTTi \varphi^2 Q^2 \right) \Omega + \left[\frac{1}{2} \gTTi \frac{Q'^2}{q^2} + \frac{1}{2} \varphi'^2 + \frac{1}{2} \gTTi \varphi^2 Q^2 + V(\varphi) \right] \Psi \\ & - \gTTi q \varphi^2 Q \GperT \Bigg\}, \end{aligned}
\begin{aligned} \delta T_{\mu r} & = \partial_\mu \Bigg\{- \gTTi \frac{Q'}{q} \left(\GperT - \partial_\theta \Gper \right) + \varphi' \Chip \cos\left[(n-p)\theta\right] \Bigg\},\\ \delta T_{\mu \theta} & = \partial_\mu \Bigg\{ \frac{Q'}{q} \left(\GperR - \Gper' \right) -\varphi Q \Chip \sin\left[(n-p)\theta \right] -q \varphi^2 Q \Gper \Bigg\}, \end{aligned}
\delta \F_{\mu \nu} = 0 = \delta \F^{\mu \nu},
\begin{aligned} \delta \F_{\mu r} & = \partial_\mu \left(\GperR - \Gper' \right),\\ \delta \F^{\mu r} & = - \ee^{-\sigma} \eta^{\mu \nu} \partial_\nu \left(\GperR - \Gper' \right),\\ \delta \F_{\mu \theta} & = \partial_\mu \left(\GperT - \partial_\theta \Gper \right),\\ \delta \F^{\mu \theta} & = - \frac{\ee^{-(\sigma+\gamma)}}{\rdim^2} \eta^{\mu \nu} \partial_\nu \left(\GperT - \partial_\theta \Gper \right). \end{aligned}
\begin{aligned} \delta \F_{r \theta} & = \GperT' - \partial_\theta \GperR,\\ \delta \F^{r \theta} & = \gTTi \left[\frac{Q'}{q} \left(\Xi + \Omega \right) + \GperT' - \partial_\theta \GperR \right]. \end{aligned}
\delta \F^{\si{AB}}_{\ \ \ ;\si{A}} = \partial_{\si A} \delta \F^{\si{AB}} + \Gamma^{\si A}_{\ \si{DA}} \delta \F^{\si{DB}},
\label{de} \left( - \left[ \left(1 - \frac{1}{r}\right) \ddr \right]^2 + V(r) -  \omega^2 \right) \psi(r) = 0
\label{potential} V(r) = \warp \left( \frac{l(l+1)}{r^2} + \frac{1 - j^2}{r^3} \right).
\label{tortoise-origin} dx = \warp^{-1} dr.
\label{tortoise} x = r + \log(r-1).
\label{dex} \left( - \frac{\partial^2}{\partial x^2} + V[r(x)] - \omega^2 \right) \psi = 0.
\label{bd-infty} \psi(r) \sim e^{-i \omega x} \textrm{\quad as\quad} \omega x \to \infty.
\label{double-cover} z = r + \log(r-1) - i \pi \sim -\ha r^2,
\label{potential-sing} V[r(z)] \sim \frac{j^2-1}{4z^2}.
\label{bessel-ode} \left( -\frac{\partial^2}{\partial z^2}  + \frac{j^2 - 1}{4z^2} - \omega^2 \right) \psi(z) = 0.
\label{bessel-sol} \psi(z) = A_+ c_+\sqrt{\omega z} J_{j/2} (\omega z) + A_-  c_-\sqrt{\omega z}  J_{-j/2}(\omega  z).
\label{bessel-asymp-before} c_\pm \sqrt{\omega z} J_{\pm j/2} (\omega z) \sim 2\cos (\omega z -  \alpha_{\pm})  \textrm{\quad as\quad} \omega z \to \infty,
\alpha_{\pm} = \frac{\pi}{4} (1 \pm j).
A_+ e^{-i \alpha_+} + A_- e^{-i \alpha_-} = 0,
\psi(z) \sim \left( A_+ e^{i \alpha_+} + A_- e^{i \alpha_-} \right) e^{-i  \omega z} \textrm{\quad as\quad} \omega z \to \infty.
J_{\pm j/2}(\omega z) = z^{\pm j/2} \phi(z),
\label{bessel-asymp-after} c_\pm \sqrt{\omega z} J_{\pm j/2} (\omega z) \sim e^{6i \alpha_\pm} 2\cos (- \omega z -  \alpha_{\pm}) \textrm{\quad as\quad} \omega z \to -\infty.
\psi(z) \sim \left(A_+ e^{5 i \alpha_+} + A_- e^{5 i \alpha_-} \right)  e^{-i \omega z} + \left(A_+ e^{7 i \alpha_+} + A_- e^{7 i \alpha_-} \right) e^{i \omega z} \textrm{\quad as\quad}  \omega z \to -\infty.
\label{monodromy} \frac{A_+ e^{5i\alpha_+} + A_-e^{5i\alpha_-}}{A_+ e^{i\alpha_+} + A_-e^{i\alpha_-}} = \frac{e^{6i\alpha_+} - e^{6i\alpha_-}}{e^{2i\alpha_+}-e^{2i\alpha_-}} = -\frac{\sin 3\pi j/2}{\sin \pi j/2} = -(1 + 2 \cos \pi j).
\label{answer} e^{4 \pi \omega} = -(1 + 2 \cos \pi j).
\label{unif-simple} \abs{4 \pi \re \omega} = \log\abs{1+2\cos \pi j}.
4 \pi \omega = (2n + 1) \pi i \pm \log(3).
\n{m}_A = (A_+ e^{i m \alpha_+} + A_- e^{i m \alpha_-})
\nn{m}{n}_A = \n{m}_A e^{-i \omega z} + \n{n}_A e^{i \omega z}.
\label{mono3pi} 3 \pi: \nn{m}{n} \to \nn{n+6}{m+6},
\label{constraint-bd} \n{-1}_A = 0.
\nn{1}{-1}_A \to \nn{5}{7}_A,
\frac{\n{5}_A}{\n{1}_A} = -(1+2\cos \pi j).
\label{de-hs} \left[ - \left( f(r) \ddr \right)^2 + V(r) - \omega^2 \right] \psi(r) = 0,
\label{potential-hs} V(r) = f(r) \left[ \frac{l(l+d-3)}{r^2} + \frac{(d-2)(d-4)f(r)}{4r^2} + \frac{(d-2)f'(r)}{2r} \right].
\label{leadingpot-hs} V(r) \sim -\frac{(d-2)^2}{4r^{2d-4}}.
\label{leading-z} V[r(z)] \sim -\frac{1}{4z^2}
e^{\betaH \omega} = -(1 + 2\cos \pi j),

\re \betaH \omega = \pm \TH \log(3).
f(r) = 1 - \frac{2GM}{r} + \frac{Q^2}{r^2} = \frac{(r-1)(r-k)}{r^2}
dz = dr \frac{r^2}{(r-1)(r-k)},
\label{rn-tortoise} z = r + \frac{\log(1-r) - k^2\log(1-r/k)}{1-k}
\label{zclose-rn} z \sim \frac{r^3}{3k}.
\label{leading-potl-rn} V(r) \sim \left\{ \begin{array}{cl}                       -2k^2 / r^6 & \textrm{scalar perturbation} \\               +4k^2 / r^6 & \textrm{electromagnetic-gravitational perturbation}               \end{array} \right.
V[r(z)] \sim \frac{j^2 - 1}{4 z^2}
\label{j-rn} j = \left\{ \begin{array}{cl}               1/3  & \textrm{scalar perturbation} \\               5/3  & \textrm{electromagnetic-gravitational perturbation}             \end{array} \right.
\label{c1} \n{-1}_A = 0.
\label{mono2pi} 2\pi: \nn{m}{n} \to \nn{m+4}{n+4}
\delta = - 2 \pi i k^2 / (1-k).
\label{phased-asymp} \psi(z) = B_+ c_+\sqrt{\omega (z-\delta)} J_{j/2} (\omega (z-\delta)) + B_- c_-\sqrt{\omega (z-\delta)} J_{-j/2}(\omega (z-\delta)).
\n{n_\delta} = e^{i \omega \delta} \cdot \n{n}.
\label{c2} \nn{5}{3}_A = \nn{-1_\delta}{1_{-\delta}}_B.
\frac{\n{3_\delta}_B}{\n{1}_A} = - \left(1 + 2\cos \pi j\right) - e^{2 i \omega \delta}(2+2\cos \pi j).

\label{rn-answer} e^{\betaH \omega} = - 2 - 3e^{k^2 \betaH \omega}.

\label{eq:mass}   \M \rightarrow M\cdot\bf{1} \; .
\label{eq:chcon}   \nabla^\mu j_{a\mu} = 0\ ,
\label{eq:enlaw}   \nabla^\mu T_{\mu\nu} = \f_\nu\ .

\label{eq:fop}   \ff_\nu = i\,\frac{\hbar}{2M}\left(\bar{\H}^\mu\cdot\F_{\mu\nu}+\F_{\mu\nu}\cdot\H^\mu   \right)\ .
\label{eq:EnCon}   \nabla^\mu T_{\mu\nu} = 0\ .

\label{eq:Jtau}   \J_\mu = j_{a\mu}\tau^a

\label{eq:vtauH}   v_{a\mu}=\frac{i}{2Mc^2}\left(\tau_a\cdot\H_\mu+\bar{\H}_\mu\cdot\tau_a \right)
\label{eq:TtrIT}   T_{\mu\nu} = \tr \left(\I\cdot\T_{\mu\nu} \right)
\label{eq:Tscp}   \T_{\mu\nu}=\frac{1}{2Mc^2}\left[\bar{\H}_\mu\cdot\H_\nu+\bar{\H}_\nu\cdot\H_\mu   -g_{\mu\nu}\left(\bar{\H}^\lambda \cdot \H_\lambda-\left(\M c^2 \right)^2 \right)\right]\ ,
\label{eq:Kherm}   \D_\mu\K_\nu-  \D_\nu\K_\mu + i\left[\K_\mu ,\K_\nu\right]-i \left[\L_\mu ,\L_\nu\right] =   i\F_{\mu\nu} \; ,
\label{eq:Lherm}   \D_\mu\L_\nu-  \D_\nu\L_\mu + i \left[\L_\mu ,\K_\nu\right]+ i \left[\K_\mu ,\L_\nu\right] = 0 \; .
\label{eq:trL}   L_\mu \doteqdot \tr\L_\mu \; ,
\label{eq:curlL}   \nabla_\mu L_\nu -   \nabla_\nu L_\mu = 0\ .

\label{eq:Deltan}   \Delta(n)=\frac{1}{n}\tr\p{n}\ ,

\label{eq:Dn0}   \p{n} = 0\ ,\ n = N+1,N+2,N+3,\ldots
\label{eq:DN0}   \left(\Delta(N)\cdot{\bf 1} - \p{N}\right)\cdot\I = 0\ .

\label{eq:detI3}   \DeS = \det\I\ ,\ (N=3)\ .

\label{eq:DeT}   \DeT = \det\I\  ,\ (N=4)\ .

\omega^+_{n} = \left\{ \begin{array}{ll}  \s{(n + \delta)^2+f^2} & \mbox{ for } n \geq -\delta \\ -\s{(n + \delta)^2+f^2} & \mbox{ for } n < -\delta  \end{array} \right.\ \ ,
\omega^-_{n} = \left\{ \begin{array}{ll}  \s{(n - \delta)^2+f^2} & \mbox{ for } n > \delta \\ -\s{(n - \delta)^2+f^2} & \mbox{ for } n \leq \delta  \end{array} \right.\ \ .
[\ap^a_{n+\delta},\bar{\ap}^b_{m-\delta}] =2\omega^+_{n}\delta_{n+m,0}\delta_{a,b} \spa [\ti{\ap}^a_{n-\delta},\ti{\bar{\ap}}^b_{m+\delta}] =2\omega^-_{n}\delta_{n+m,0}\delta_{a,b} \ \ .
E^2-\left( \f{m}{R} \right)^2 - \left( \f{wR}{\ap'} \right)^2 = \frac{2}{\alpha'} \sum_{n \in \Z} \left( N^{+}_{n}\s{(n+ \delta)^2+f^2}+N^{-}_{n}\s{(n-\delta)^2+f^2} \right) + 2\beta p^+ {\bf J}\ , \label{sp1}
{\bf J} = \sum_{n \in \Z} \left( N^+_n - N^-_n \right) \ ,
N^+_n = \left\{  \begin{array}{ll}  \sum_{a=1}^4 \frac{1}{2\omega^+_{n}}  \tilde{\alpha}_{-n-\delta}^a \tilde{\bar{\alpha}}_{n+\delta}^a  & \mbox{ for } n \geq -\delta \\ \sum_{a=1}^4 \frac{1}{2\omega^-_{-n}}  \alpha_{n+\delta}^a \bar{\alpha}_{-n-\delta}^a  & \mbox{ for } n < -\delta \end{array} \right. \ \ ,
N^-_n = \left\{  \begin{array}{ll}  \sum_{a=1}^4 \frac{1}{2\omega^-_{n}}  \tilde{\bar{\alpha}}_{-n+\delta}^a \tilde{\alpha}_{n-\delta}^a    & \mbox{ for } n > \delta \\ \sum_{a=1}^4 \frac{1}{2\omega^+_{-n}}  \bar{\alpha}_{n-\delta}^a \alpha_{-n+\delta}^a  & \mbox{ for } n \leq \delta \end{array} \right. \ \ .
\{S^i_{n+\delta},\bar{S}^j_{m-\delta}\}=2\delta_{n+m,0}\delta_{ij} \spa \{\tilde{S}^i_{n-\delta},\ti{\bar{S}}^j_{m+\delta}\} =2\delta_{n+m,0}\delta_{ij} \ .
\label{fermham} H = \f{1}{\ap'p^+} \sum_{n \in \Z} \left( F^+_n \sqrt{(n+\delta)^2 + f^2 }  + F^-_n \sqrt{(n-\delta)^2 + f^2 } \right) + \beta \sum_{n \in \Z} ( F^+_n - F^-_n ) \ ,
F^+_n = \left\{  \begin{array}{ll}  \frac{1}{2} \sum_{i=1}^4  \tilde{S}_{-n-\delta}^i \tilde{\bar{S}}_{n+\delta}^i  & \mbox{ for } n \geq -\delta \\ \frac{1}{2} \sum_{i=1}^4  S_{n+\delta}^i \bar{S}_{-n-\delta}^i  & \mbox{ for } n < -\delta \end{array} \right. \ \ ,
F^-_n = \left\{  \begin{array}{ll}  \frac{1}{2} \sum_{i=1}^4  \tilde{\bar{S}}_{-n+\delta}^i \tilde{S}_{n-\delta}^i   & \mbox{ for } n > \delta \\ \frac{1}{2} \sum_{i=1}^4  \bar{S}_{n-\delta}^i S_{-n+\delta}^i  & \mbox{ for } n \leq \delta \end{array} \right. \ \ .
\sum_{n \in \Z} n(N^+_{n}+N^-_{n} + F^+_n + F^-_n)+mw=0.
\sum_{n \in \Z} n(N^+_{n}+N^-_{n} + F^+_n + F^-_n)=0.
\frac{E^2}{2\beta} =  \sum_{n \in \Z} \s{E^2 + \left( \frac{n}{\beta \ap'} \right)^2 }  \Big( \ca{N}^+_n + \ca{N}^-_n  \Big)  + E \sum_{n \in \Z}  \left( \ca{N}^+_n - \ca{N}^-_n \right)\ ,
\ca{N}^+_n = N^+_n + F^+_n \spa \ca{N}^-_n = N^-_n + F^-_n \ .

E^2 = \frac{2}{\alpha'} \sum_{n \in \Z}  |n| \left( \ca{N}^+_n + \ca{N}^-_n \right) + 2\beta E \sum_{n \in \Z} \left( \ca{N}^+_n - \ca{N}^-_n \right) + \beta^2 \alpha' E^2 \sum_{n \in \Z}  \frac{1}{|n|} \left( \ca{N}^+_n + \ca{N}^-_n \right)\ ,
E = \beta \sum_{n \in \Z} \left( \ca{N}^+_n - \ca{N}^-_n \right) + \sqrt{ \left[ \beta \sum_{n \in \Z} \left( \ca{N}^+_n - \ca{N}^-_n \right) \right]^2 + \frac{2}{\alpha'} \sum_{n \in \Z}  |n| \left( \ca{N}^+_n + \ca{N}^-_n \right) }
E = \frac{1}{2} p_y + \sqrt{ \frac{1}{4} p_y^2 + 4 \beta \sum_{n \in \Z} \ca{N}^+_n } \label{betabig}
\sum_{n \in \Z} n(N^+_{n}+N^-_{n} + N_n + F^+_n + F^-_n + F_n )=0.

G_{\mu \nu}-\frac{3}{2}\lambda \sigma \phi^2 g_{\mu\nu} =6\phi^{-2}(\Sigma_{\mu \nu}(e^{\sigma}g_{\mu \nu})+\tau_{\mu\nu})+ 6t_{\mu\nu}~, \label{5}

g^{\mu\nu}\Sigma_{\mu\nu}(e^{\sigma}g_{\mu\nu})=0~, \label{ab}

\delta S_{inv}[\theta] \;=\; - i g \int d^3x \; \omega^a (x) [D_\mu {\tilde F}_\mu ]^a(L) \;=\;0 \;,
\label{eq:mink} S_{inv}^M \,=\, \int d^3x \,\frac{1}{2} {\tilde f}^\mu_a G_{\mu\nu}^{ab}(\theta){\tilde f}^\nu_b
\label{eq:defgm} G_{\mu\rho}^{ac}(\theta)\, M^{\rho\nu}_{cb}(\theta) \;=\; \delta_\mu^\nu \delta^a_b  \;\;,\;\; M^{\mu\nu}_{ab}\,=\, g^{\mu\nu}\delta_{ab} +  g^{-\frac{1}{2}} \epsilon^{\mu\lambda\nu} f^{acb} \theta_\lambda^c\;.
\label{eq:mc} F_{\mu\nu}(L) \;=\; 0 \;.
\label{eq:vartheta} \delta_\omega \theta_\mu(x) \;=\; D^L_\mu \omega(x)
\label{eq:defdl} D^L_\mu \omega \;=\; \partial_\mu \omega + g^{\frac{1}{2}} [L_\mu,\omega] \;,
\label{eq:loft} L_\mu^a \,=\, -i g^{-1} \, G_{\mu\nu}^{ab}(\theta)\, {\tilde f}_\nu^b (\theta)\;.
\label{eq:gaugecomm} [\delta_\eta, \delta_\omega ] \theta_\mu^a \;=\;  \Sigma_{\mu\nu}^{ab} (\theta) \, \frac{\delta S_{inv}[\theta]}{\delta \theta_\nu^b}
\label{eq:defsigma} \Sigma_{\mu\nu}^{ab}(\theta) \;=\; - \frac{1}{g} \, \eta^h \, \omega^c \, ( f^{aec}   f^{dbh} -   f^{aeh}   f^{dbc}) G_{\mu\nu}^{ed}(\theta) \;.
\label{eq:asymm} \Sigma_{\mu\nu}^{ab} \;=\; -\Sigma_{\nu\mu}^{ba} \;,
\delta \theta_\mu^a \;=\; \Lambda_{\mu\nu}^{ab}(\theta) \frac{\delta S[\theta]}{\delta \theta_\nu^b}
\label{eq:delf} \delta_\omega L_\mu^a \;=\; - i g^{-\frac{1}{2}} \, G_{\mu\nu}^{ab}(\theta)  f^{bcd} {\tilde F}_\nu^c (L) \omega_d  \;,
\label{eq:ginvi} \delta_\omega \, I[\theta] \;=\; 0 \;,
\delta_\omega \;=\; \int d^3x \, \delta_\omega \theta_\mu^a(x) \,  \frac{\delta}{\delta \theta_\mu^a(x)} \;.
\label{eq:ccond} \delta_\omega I[\theta]=0 \;\;\Rightarrow \;\;  \left[ \delta_\eta \,,\, \delta_\omega \right] I[\theta] \,=\, 0 \;.
\label{eq:comm} [ \delta_\eta \,,\, \delta_\omega ] \;=\; \int d^3x \, \Sigma_{\mu\nu}^{ab}(\theta) \, \frac{\delta S_{inv}}{\delta   \theta_\mu^a (x)}  \frac{\delta }{\delta\theta_\nu^b (x)}  \;.
\label{eq:extra} F_{\mu\nu}(L) \;=\; 0\;.
\label{eq:eqlt} L_\mu \;=\; -i g^{-1} \, \epsilon_{\mu\nu\lambda} D_\nu \theta_\lambda \;,
G_{\mu\nu}^{ab} (\theta) \;=\; \delta_{\mu\nu}^{ab} \,-\, i g^{-\frac{1}{2}} \epsilon_{\mu\lambda\sigma} f^{acd} \theta_\lambda^c G_{\sigma\nu}^{db}(\theta) \;.
\label{eq:global} \partial_\mu L_\mu \;=\; D_\mu L_\mu \;=\; -i g^{-1} \, \epsilon_{\mu\nu\lambda}  D_\mu D_\nu \theta_\lambda \;=\;  -i g^{-\frac{1}{2}} [ {\tilde F}_\mu (L), \theta_\mu ]
L^a_0 (x) \;=\; - i q \delta ({\mathbf x} - {\mathbf x}_0) ,\;\;\; L_j (x) \;=\; 0\;.
{\tilde f}_\mu^a \;=\; q \, \delta_{\mu 0} \,  \delta({\mathbf x} - {\mathbf x}_0)
\label{eq:defzinv} {\mathcal Z}_{inv}[J] \;=\; \int [{\mathcal D}\theta] \, \,\exp \left\{- S_{inv}[\theta] + \int d^3x J_\mu \cdot \theta_\mu \right\} \;.
\label{eq:defsfx} S[\theta_\mu;b,{\bar c}, c] \;=\; S_{inv}[\theta] \,+\, S_{gf}[b,\theta]\,+\, S_{gh}[{\bar c},c;\theta]
\label{eq:defsgf} S_{gf}[\theta] \;=\; \int d^3x \,( - \frac{1}{2\lambda} b^2 \,+\, b \cdot \partial_\mu \theta_\mu )
\label{eq:defsgh} S_{gh}[{\bar c},c;\theta]\,=\, \int d^3x \left[ \partial_\mu {\bar c} \cdot D_\mu^L c \,+\, \frac{1}{2g} (\partial_\mu {\bar c} \times c)^a  G_{\mu\nu}^{ab}(\theta)  (\partial_\nu{\bar c}\times c)^b \right]\;.

\begin{array}{lll}[ p_\mu , p_\nu ] & = \ 0\, ,\qquad & \epsilon( p_\mu ) \ = \ 0\, ,\medskip\cr \Delta(p_0) & = \ p_0\otimes 1 + 1\otimes p_0\, , & \Delta( p_i ) \ = \ p_i\otimes 1 + e^{-\frac{p_0}{\kappa c}}\otimes p_i\, ,\medskip\cr S( p_0 ) & = \ -p_0\, , & S(p_i) \ = \ -p_i e^{\frac{p_0}{\kappa c}}\, .\end{array}\label{r26}
[ {x_i}^k , {x_0}^l ] \ = \ {x_i}^k \left\{ {x_0}^l - \left( x_0 - i\frac{k}{\kappa c}\right)^l\right\}\, .\label{r213}
\Delta^F( x_\mu ) \ = \ F \Delta_0( x_\mu ) F^{-1}\, .\label{r31}
[\Delta^F( x_0 ) , \Delta^F( x_i ) ] \ = \ -\frac{i}{\kappa c} \Delta^F( x_i )\, ,\qquad  [ \Delta^F( x_i ) , \Delta^F( x_j ) ] \ = \ 0\, .\label{r32}
(\Delta^F\otimes 1) \Delta^F (x_\mu) \ = \ (1\otimes \Delta^F ) \Delta^F (x_\mu)\, .\label{r33}
(1\otimes F) ( 1\otimes \Delta_0 ) F \ = \ ( F\otimes 1) ( \Delta_0\otimes 1 ) F\, .\label{r352}
F \ = \ \exp\left(\sum\,\phi_n\otimes \phi^n\right)\, .\label{r353}
e^{1\otimes \phi_n\otimes \phi^n} e^{\phi_n\otimes \Delta_0(\phi^n)} \ = \ e^{\phi_n\otimes \phi^n\otimes 1} e^{\Delta_0(\phi_n)\otimes \phi^n}\, .\label{r354}
\triangleright :\, {\cal{P}}_\kappa\otimes {\cal{X}}_\kappa\rightarrow {\cal{X}}_\kappa :\, p\otimes x\rightarrow p\triangleright x\, .\label{r313}
(p\tilde{p})\triangleright x \ = \ p\triangleright (\tilde{p} \triangleright x)\, ,\quad 1\triangleright x \ = \ x\, .\label{r314}
p\triangleright x \ = \ x_{(1)} < p\,, x_{(2)} >\, .\label{r315}
p\triangleright (x\tilde{x}) \ = \ (p_{(1)}\triangleright x) (p_{(2)} \triangleright \tilde{x})\, ,\quad p\triangleright 1=\epsilon(p) 1\, .\label{r316}
[x,p] \ = \ x\circ p-p\circ x\, , \qquad  x\circ p \ = \ x\otimes p\, , \qquad p\circ x=(p_{(1)}\triangleright x)\otimes p_{(2)}\, .\label{r320}
\begin{array}{lll} [ x_0 , x_i ] \ = & -\frac{i}{\kappa c} x_i\, , \qquad\qquad & [ x_i , x_j ] \ = \ 0\, ,\medskip\cr [ x_i , p_0 ] \ = & -i\,\alpha x_i\, , & [ x_0 , p_i ] \ = \ \frac{i}{\kappa c} p_i\, ,\medskip\cr [ x_0 , p_0 ] \ = & - i\, , & [ p_\mu , p_\nu ] \ = \ 0\, ,\bigskip\cr [ x_i , p_j ] \ = & i\,\delta_{i j} e^{\alpha x_0} + \left(1 - e^{-\frac{i \alpha}{\kappa c}}\right) x_i\,p_j& \, .\end{array}\label{r321}
[ x_0 , p_0 ] \ = \ -i\, ,\quad [ x_i , p_j ] \ = \ i\,\delta_{i j} e^{\alpha x_0}\, ,\quad [ x_i , p_0 ] \ = \ -i\,\alpha x_i\, .\label{r322}
\begin{array}{lll} [ x_0 , x_i ] \ = & -\frac{i}{\kappa c} x_i\, , \qquad\qquad & [ x_i , x_j ] \ = \ 0\, ,\medskip\cr [ x_i , p_0 ] \ = &  0\, , & [ x_0 , p_i ] \ = \  \frac{i}{\kappa c} p_i + \beta_{j i} x_j\, ,\medskip\cr [ x_0 , p_0 ] \ = & - i\, , & [ p_\mu , p_\nu ] \ = \ 0\, ,\bigskip\cr [ x_i , p_j ] \ = & i\,\delta_{i j}  \, .&\end{array}\label{r323}
[ x_0 , p_0 ] \ = \ -i\, ,\quad [ x_i , p_j ] \ = \ i\,\delta_{i j}\, ,\quad [ x_0 , p_i ] \ = \ i\,\beta_{j i} x_j\, .\label{r324}
x_i \ = \ \hat{x}_i e^{\alpha \hat{x}_0}\, ,\quad x_0 \ = \ \hat{p}_0\, ,\quad p_\mu \ = \ \hat{p}_\mu\, ,\qquad for \qquad \Pi_\infty(\alpha)\, . \label{3r25}
x_\mu \ = \ \hat{x}_\mu\, ,\quad p_0 \ = \ \hat{p}_0\, ,\quad p_i \ = \ \hat{p}_i - \beta \hat{p}_0\, \hat{x}_i\, ,\qquad for \quad \Pi_\infty(\beta)\, .\label{r326}

< f^k , x_0 >^n \ = \ (- k <f , x_0 >)^n\, .\label{430}

= \ k!\,\delta_{k m} (-i)^k e^{-\frac{i\alpha}{2\kappa} k(k-1)} < e^{-\frac{m p_0}{\kappa}} (p_0 + im\alpha)^n , x_0^l >\, .\label{435}
< p_0^n , x_0^l > = n!\,<p_0 , x_0>^n \delta_{n l}\, ,\quad < p^m , x^k > = m!\,<p , x >^m \delta_{m k}\, . \label{437}

\left( \bar{Z}_{i_{1}i_{2}i_{3}}^{a}\right) _{i}^{b}=g\frac{\delta ^{2}W_{cd} }{\delta \varphi _{a}\delta \varphi _{b}} g_{i[i_{1}}A_{i_{2}}^{c}A_{i_{3}]}^{d},  \label{i14a}
\left( \bar{Z}_{a}^{i_{1}i_{2}}\right) _{b}^{ij}=-\frac{1}{2}gW_{ab}\left( g^{i_{1}i}g^{i_{2}j}-g^{i_{1}j}g^{i_{2}i}\right) ,  \label{i15a}
\left( \bar{Z}_{a}^{i_{1}i_{2}}\right) _{i}^{b}=-\left( D^{[i_{1}}\right) _{a}^{\;\;b}\delta _{i}^{i_{2}]},  \label{i15}
\left( D_{i}\right) _{\;\;b}^{a}=\delta _{b}^{a}\partial _{i}-g\frac{\delta W_{bc}}{\delta \varphi _{a}}A_{i}^{c}.  \label{i16}
\left( \bar{Z}_{i_{1}i_{2}i_{3}i_{4}}^{a}\right) _{b}^{j_{1}j_{2}j_{3}}=- \frac{1}{3!}\left( D_{[i_{1}}\right) _{\;\;b}^{a}\delta _{i_{2}}^{j_{1}}\delta _{i_{3}}^{j_{2}}\delta _{i_{4}]}^{j_{3}},  \label{i19}
\left( \bar{Z}_{i_{1}i_{2}i_{3}i_{4}}^{a}\right) _{j_{1}j_{2}}^{b}=-\frac{g}{ 2}g_{j_{1}k_{1}}g_{j_{2}k_{2}}\frac{\delta ^{2}W_{cd}}{\delta \varphi _{a}\delta \varphi _{b}}\delta _{[i_{1}}^{k_{1}}\delta _{i_{2}}^{k_{2}}A_{i_{3}}^{c}A_{i_{4}]}^{d},  \label{i20}
\left( \bar{Z}_{a}^{i_{1}i_{2}i_{3}}\right) _{j_{1}j_{2}}^{b}=\frac{1}{2} \left( D^{[i_{1}}\right) _{a}^{\;\;b}\delta _{j_{1}}^{i_{2}}\delta _{j_{2}}^{i_{3}]},  \label{i21}
\left( \bar{Z}_{a}^{i_{1}i_{2}i_{3}}\right) _{b}^{j_{1}j_{2}j_{3}}=\frac{g}{ 3!}W_{ab}\sum\limits_{\sigma \in S_{3}}\left( -\right) ^{\sigma }g^{i_{1}j_{\sigma (1)}}g^{i_{2}j_{\sigma (2)}}g^{i_{3}j_{\sigma (3)}}. \label{i22}
\left( \bar{Z}_{i_{1}\cdots i_{p+2}}^{a}\right) _{b}^{j_{1}\cdots j_{p+1}}= \frac{\left( -\right) ^{p+1}}{\left( p+1\right) !}\left( D_{[i_{1}}\right) _{\;\;b}^{a}\delta _{i_{2}}^{j_{1}}\cdots \delta _{i_{p+2}]}^{j_{p+1}}, \label{i25}

\label{eq:set3}  \begin{array}{l} \langle T_{\mu\nu} \rangle_{ren}^{free} = \\   - \frac{ g_{\mu\nu}}{64\pi^2}   \frac{1+|\gamma|^2}{1-|\gamma|^2}\times \\    \Big(         m^2(m^2-2 H^2)     \left(\psi\left(\tfrac{3}{2}-i\nu\right)+\psi\left(\tfrac{3}{2}+i\nu\right)     +\ln\left(\frac{H^2}{\mu^2}\right)+\frac{\pi}{\cosh\pi\nu}\frac{\gamma+\gamma^*}{1+|\gamma|^2}      \right) \\     + \tfrac{8}{3}m^2 H^2-\tfrac{359}{180}H^4 \Big) ~. \end{array}
{\cal U}(\zeta)\equiv \exp(\tha (\bar\zeta a^2-\zeta {a^\dagger}^2))=e^A
e^A a e^{-A} = e^{{\cal L}_A} a
\begin{array}{lcl} [A,a] &=& \zeta a^\dagger = \rho e^{i\phi} a^\dagger \\  [A,a^\dagger] &=& \zeta^* a~.   \end{array}
\begin{array}{lcl} {\cal L}_A^{2n+1} a &=&  e^{i\phi} \rho^{2n+1}a^\dagger \\ {\cal L}_A^{2n} a &=&  \rho^{2n}a \\   \end{array}
\begin{array}{lll}     e^{A}a e^{-A}     &=& a \sum\rho^{2n}/2n! + a^\dagger e^{i\phi}\sum \rho^{2n+1}/(2n+1)!\\     &=&  a_k \cosh (\rho) +  a_k^\dagger e^{i\phi}\sinh (\rho)   \end{array}
\label{eq:bog1}   b_k = {\cal U}a_k {\cal U}^\dagger=N_\alpha(a_k - e^{\alpha^*}  a_k^\dagger)   = a_k \cosh (\rho) +  a_k^\dagger e^{i\phi}\sinh (\rho)~.
e^{\alpha-\alpha^*}=e^{-2i\phi}  \Rightarrow \phi=-{\rm Im}(\alpha)
e^{\alpha+\alpha^*}= \tanh^2 \rho \\
\begin{array}{lll} \rho &=& \tanh^{-1}e^{{\rm Re}(\alpha)}\\ &=& \ha \ln (\frac{1+e^{{\rm Re}(\alpha)}}{1-e^{{\rm Re}(\alpha)}})\\ &=& \ha \ln \tanh (-\tha{\rm Re}(\alpha)) \end{array}
\zeta = \tha e^{-i{\rm  Im}(\alpha)}\ln \tanh (-\tha{\rm Re}(\alpha))~.

f\ast g\left( \mathbf{\vec{x}}\right) =-\frac{1}{\left( \pi \theta \right) ^{2}}\int \int d^{2}x^{\prime }d^{2}x^{^{\prime \prime }}f\left( \mathbf{ \vec{x}}^{\prime }\right) g\left( \mathbf{\vec{x}}^{\prime \prime }\right) e^{-\frac{1}{\theta } \left( \mathbf{\vec{x}}^{\prime }-\mathbf{\vec{x}} \right) \times \left( \mathbf{\vec{x}}^{\prime \prime }-\mathbf{\vec{x}} \right) }.  \label{Bakerform}

U = -\frac{1}{2\nu}\,u\,\,, \,\,\,V = -\frac{1}{2\nu}(\nu u_x - \frac{1}{2} u*u)\,\,.  \label{eq:pot}

u_t + u_x \,*\, u = \nu\, u_{xx}.  \label{eq:NB}
\chi \, * \,_{*}\chi^{-1} = 1\,\,,  \label{eq:inv}

\chi_t = \nu \,\chi_{xx}\,\,,  \label{eq:heat}

w^{(l+1)}(e_{i})=\left( \frac{l}{l-1}\right) \frac{\partial }{\partial e_{i}} w^{(l)}(e_{i});\qquad l\geq 1.
a_{i}=e_{i}-\tilde{\Lambda}\frac{\partial }{\partial e_{i}}\left( \frac{ 2(e_{i})^{2-4n_{0}}}{(w^{\prime \prime }(e_{i}))^{2}}\right) +{\cal O}( \tilde{\Lambda}^{2}).

\Phi = {\mbox {diag}}( \la_1 i\si_2 , \ldots , \la_{M} i\si_2)\, .
W(\la)=2\al \sum_{l=0}^{N} \sum_{I=1}^{M}\frac{s_{N-l}(e^2)}{2l+2} \la _I^{2l+2} \, .  \label{SUPER}
\ph_i \equiv {\mbox {diag}} (\la_1 (i\si_2), \la_2 (i\si_2),\ldots , \la _{M_i}(i\si_2))\, ,  \label{DIA}
\Phi ={\mbox {diag}} (\ph_1,\ldots ,\ph_N )\, .
W(\Phi)=\al \sum_{l=0}^{N}\sum_{I=1}^{N} \frac{s_{N-l}(e^2)}{2l+2}\tr  \Phi_I^{2l+2} \, .
\Delta = \prod_{I\neq J}^{M} (\la_I^2 -\la_J^2)= \Delta^{(1)}\cdot \Delta^{(2)}\, ,
(\la_{1}^2 - \la_{2}^2)^2 = \int dB_{2 1} dC_{1 2} \exp\left( B_{2 1}^{\al \bet}\la_{1}(i\si_2)_{\bet\al}C_{1 2}^{\al\bet} + C_{1 2}^{\al\bet}\la_{2}(i \si_2)_{\bet\al} B_{2 1}^{\al\bet} \right)\, ,
\prod_{I_1,J_2}(\la_{I_1}^2 - \la_{J_2}^2)^2 = \int dB_{2 1} dC_{1 2} \exp\left( \tr_2 (B_{2 1}\ph_{1}C_{12}) + \tr_1(C_{12}\ph_{2}B_{21})\right) \, ,
\prod_{I_i, J_j}^{} (\la_{I_i}^2 - \la_{J_j}^2)^2 = \int \prod_{i< j}dB_{ji} dC_{ij} \exp\left(\sum_{i< j}\tr_j( B_{ji}\ph_{i}C_{ij}) + \tr_i (C_{ij}\ph _{j}B_{ji})\right)\, .
d\Phi dB dC = \prod_{I}d\la_I \prod_{I_1\neq J_1}^{M_1} (\la_{I_1}^2 -\la _{J_1}^2) \prod_{I_2\neq J_2}^{M_2} (\la_{I_2}^2 -\la_{J_2}^2) \ldots \prod_{I_N\neq J_N}^{M_N} (\la_{I_N}^2 -\la_{J_N}^2) \prod_{i< j}dB_{ji} dC_{ij} \, .  \label{MES}
Z = \int \prod_{i}d\ph_{ii} \prod_{i< j}dB_{ji} dC_{ij} \exp\left( W(\Phi) + \sum_{i< j}^{N} \tr_j( B_{ji}\ph_{ii}C_{ij}) + \tr_i (C_{ij}\ph _{jj}B_{ji})\right)\, .

\gamma^0 =-\sigma_1\ , \quad \gamma^1= {\rm i} \sigma_3 \ , \quad  \gamma^5 = - \sigma_2 \ . \label{d1f}

H_0 |\eta,n\rangle  = \eta |k_n| |\eta ,n \rangle \qquad (\eta=\pm 1) \ ,  \label{d2}
\langle x| \eta ,n \rangle =\frac{1}{\sqrt{2L}}\left( \begin{array}{c} 1 \\ -{\rm i} \eta \,{\rm sgn}(k_n) \end{array} \right){\rm e}^{{\rm i}k_n x}  ,  \ k_n = \frac{2\pi}{L} (n+1/2) . \label{d3}
S(x)=\sum_{\ell} S_{\ell} {\rm e}^{{\rm i}2\pi \ell x/a}  \qquad (S_{-\ell} = S_{\ell}^*)  \label{d5}
\langle \eta',n'|V|\eta,n \rangle = \frac{\rm i}{2} \left[ \eta \, {\rm sgn}(k_n)-\eta'{\rm sgn}(k_{n'})\right] \sum_{\ell} \delta_{n'-n,N\ell} S_{\ell} . \label{d6}
E_{\eta,n} \approx \eta \, {\rm sgn}(k_n) \left( k_n + \sum_{\ell} \frac{|S_{\ell}|^2}{2(k_n-q_{\ell})} \right) \ , \label{d7}

(L_{-2}+\frac{3}{2}L_{-1}^{2})\left| \widetilde{x}\right\rangle =[\frac{1}{2} \alpha _{-1}\cdot \alpha _{-1}+\frac{5}{2}k\cdot \alpha _{-2}+\frac{3}{2} (k\cdot \alpha _{-1})^{2}]\left| 0,k\right\rangle ;\left| \widetilde{x} \right\rangle =\left| 0,k\right\rangle ,-k^{2}=2.  \tag{8}
L_{-1}\left\vert x\right\rangle =[\theta \cdot \alpha _{-2}+(k\cdot \alpha _{-1})(\theta \cdot \alpha _{-1})]\left\vert 0,k\right\rangle ;\left\vert x\right\rangle =\theta \cdot \alpha _{-1}\left\vert 0,k\right\rangle ,-k^{2}=2,\theta \cdot k=0.  \tag{9}
\text{Ansatz: }\left\vert x\right\rangle =[\theta \cdot \alpha _{-2}+a(k\cdot \alpha _{-1})(\theta \cdot \alpha _{-1})]\left\vert 0,k\right\rangle ;-k^{2}=4,\theta \cdot k=0  \tag{12}
\text{Ansatz: }\left| x\right\rangle =[\frac{5}{2}ak\cdot \alpha _{-2}+\frac{ 1}{2}b\alpha _{-1}\cdot \alpha _{-1}+\frac{3}{2}c(k\cdot \alpha _{-1})^{2}]\left| 0,k\right\rangle ;-k^{2}=4  \tag{14}
5a+b+3k^{2}c=0,5k^{2}a+13b+\frac{3}{2}k^{2}c=0.  \tag{15}
L_{-1}\left\vert x\right\rangle =\theta _{\mu \nu \lambda }(k_{\beta }\alpha _{-1}^{\mu \nu \lambda \beta }+3\alpha _{-1}^{\mu \nu }\alpha _{-2}^{\lambda })\left\vert 0,k\right\rangle ;\left\vert x\right\rangle =\theta _{\mu \nu \lambda }\alpha _{-1}^{\mu \nu \lambda }\left\vert 0,k\right\rangle ,  \tag{17}

\eta _{\mu \nu }^{T}=\eta _{\mu \nu }-k_{\mu }k_{\nu }/k^{2},  \tag{35}

(A_{\mu \nu \lambda \gamma }\alpha _{-1}^{\mu \nu \lambda \gamma }+B_{\mu \nu \lambda }\alpha _{-1}^{\mu \nu }\alpha _{-2}^{\lambda }+C_{\mu \nu }\alpha _{-2}^{\mu \nu }+D_{\mu \nu }\alpha _{-1}^{\mu }\alpha _{-3}^{\nu }+E_{\mu }\alpha _{-4}^{\mu })\left\vert 0,k\right\rangle .  \tag{37}

\lambda (k)= \frac{(p\varepsilon^1 + q \varepsilon^2 + r  \varepsilon^3)}{m}.  \label{6222}

\tilde{\alpha} \rightarrow \tilde{\alpha}'  = \frac{ik_\mu (\varepsilon^\mu + ik^\mu \lambda )}{m^2} =\frac{ik_\mu \varepsilon^\mu}{m^2} - \lambda = \tilde{\alpha} - \lambda  . \label{62233}
{\cal L}_L^{EPF} = \frac{1}{2}h_{\mu\nu} \left[ R^{\mu\nu}_L -  \frac{1}{2} \eta^{\mu\nu} R_L\right] - \frac{\mu^2}{2}\left((h_{\mu\nu})^2  - h^2 \right). \label{63}
{\cal L}_L^{EPF} = \frac{1}{2}h_{\mu\nu} \left[ R^{\mu\nu}_L - \frac{1}{2} \eta^{\mu\nu} R_L\right] - \frac{\mu^2}{2}\left(\left(h_{\mu\nu} + \partial_\mu A_\nu + \partial_\nu A_\mu          \right)^2 - \left(h + 2 \partial \cdot A\right)^2\right). \label{64}
h_{\mu\nu} \rightarrow h'_{\mu\nu} = h_{\mu\nu} + \partial_\mu \Lambda_\nu + \partial_\nu \Lambda_\mu \label{65}
A_\mu (x)\rightarrow A'_\mu (x) = A_\mu (x) - \Lambda_\mu (x) \label{66}
- \mu^2 \left[ (h^{\mu\nu} + \partial^\mu A^\nu + \partial^\nu A^\mu) - \eta^{\mu\nu}(h + 2 \partial \cdot A)\right] = 0 \label{67}
\Box A^\mu + \partial_\nu h^{\nu\mu} -  \partial^\mu h -\partial^\mu (\partial \cdot A)  = 0. \label{68}
h_{\mu \nu}(x) = \chi_{\mu \nu}(k) e^{ik.x} \label{69}
A_\mu(x) = \varepsilon_\mu (k) e^{ik.x}. \label{70}
\chi_{\mu\nu} \rightarrow \chi_{\mu\nu}' = \chi_{\mu\nu} + ik_\mu \zeta_\nu + ik_\nu \zeta_\mu \label{70+1}
\varepsilon_\mu \rightarrow \varepsilon_\mu' = \varepsilon_\mu - \zeta_\mu \label{70+2}
-\mu^2 \left[ \chi^{\mu\nu} + ik^\mu\varepsilon^\nu + ik^\nu\varepsilon^\mu -\eta^{\mu\nu}(\chi + 2ik_\alpha\varepsilon^\alpha) \right] = 0. \label{71}
2k_{\mu\nu}\chi^{\mu\nu} + \mu^2\left[3(\chi + 2ik_\mu\varepsilon^\mu)\right] = 0. \label{72}
\chi^{\mu\nu} = -i(k^\mu\varepsilon^\nu + k^\nu\varepsilon^\mu). \label{73}
{\chi^1}_1 + {\chi^2}_2 + {\chi^3}_3 = 0 \label{74}
{\chi_{0i}} = -iM \varepsilon_i \label{75}

\chi_{00} = -2 iM\varepsilon_0 \label{78}
( \mu^2 - M^2) \chi_{ij} = 0. \label{79}
\{ \chi_{\mu \nu} \} = \left( \begin{array} {cccc} -2 i\mu\varepsilon_0 & -i\mu\varepsilon_1 & -i\mu\varepsilon_2 & -i\mu\varepsilon_3 \\ -i\mu\varepsilon_1   & \chi_{11}        &   \chi_{12}      &  \chi_{13}  \\ -i\mu\varepsilon_2   & \chi_{12}        &   \chi_{22}      &  \chi_{23}  \\ -i\mu\varepsilon_3   & \chi_{13}        &  \chi_{23}       &  \chi_{33} \end{array} \right) \label{80}
\{ \chi_{\mu \nu} \} = \left( \begin{array} {cccc} 0 & 0 & 0 & 0 \\ 0 &  \chi_{11}        &   \chi_{12}      &  \chi_{13}  \\ 0 &  \chi_{12}        &   \chi_{22}      &  \chi_{23}  \\ 0 &  \chi_{13}        &  \chi_{23}       &  \chi_{33} \end{array} \right);~~~ \chi_{11} + \chi_{22} + \chi_{33} = 0. \label{81}
k^2\varepsilon^\mu -  k^\mu k_\nu\varepsilon^\nu - ik_\nu \chi^{\nu \mu} + ik^\mu \chi = 0. \label{82}

\{\chi_{\mu\nu}\} + \left( \begin{array}{cccc} \left(\begin{array}{c}p(p\chi_{11} + q\chi_{12} + r\chi_{13}) \\ + q(p\chi_{12} + q\chi_{22} + r\chi_{23}) \\ + r( p\chi_{13} + q\chi_{23} + r\chi_{33})  \end{array}\right) &\left(\begin{array}{c} p\chi_{11} + q\chi_{12} \\+ r\chi_{13} \end{array}\right) & \left(\begin{array}{c}  p\chi_{12} + q\chi_{22} \\ + r\chi_{23} \end{array} \right)& \left(\begin{array}{c}  p\chi_{13} + q\chi_{23} \\ + r\chi_{33}  \end{array}\right)  \\ p\chi_{11} + q\chi_{12} + r\chi_{13} & 0 & 0 & 0 \\ p\chi_{12} + q\chi_{22} + r\chi_{23} & 0 & 0 & 0 \\  p\chi_{13} + q\chi_{23} + r\chi_{33} & 0 & 0 & 0 \\ \end{array} \right) \label{87+1}
{\cal L} = \frac{1}{12}H_{\mu\nu\lambda}H^{\mu\nu\lambda} - \frac{m^2}{4} (B_{\mu\nu} + \partial_\mu A_\nu -  \partial_\nu A_\mu ) (B^{\mu\nu} + \partial^\mu A^\nu - \partial^\nu A^\mu ) \label{n1}

-3 \ell =\vec{f} \cdot \vec{f}= \frac{1}{4} (\vec{E} +\vec{B})^{2} = \frac{1}{4} ( \vec{E}^{2} +\vec{B}^{2}) + \frac{1}{2} \vec{E} \cdot \vec{B}
-3 r =\vec{g} \cdot \vec{g}= \frac{1}{4} (\vec{E} -\vec{B})^{2} = \frac{1}{4} ( \vec{E}^{2} +\vec{B}^{2}) - \frac{1}{2} \vec{E} \cdot \vec{B}
R =(0,0),~~~~~~~{\rm scalar~~ curvature}
R_{\mu \nu}-\frac{1}{4} g_{\mu \nu} R =(1,1),~~~~~~~{\rm traceless ~~Ricci~~ tensor}

C^{R}_{\alpha \beta \mu \nu} =(2,0),~~~~~~~ {\rm anti~~ self~~ dual~~ Weyl~~ tensor}

a= \pmatrix{ a_1 \cr a_2 \cr}~,~~~~a^\dag = \pmatrix{ a_1^\dag & a_2^\dag \cr}
\xi= \pmatrix{ \xi_1 \cr \xi_2 \cr}~,~~~~\xi^\dag = \pmatrix{\xi_1^* & \xi_2^* \cr}
[a_i,a_j^\dag]=\delta_{ij}
a~\mid 0>=0~,~~~~<0\mid ~a^\dag=0
\mid \xi>= e^{a^\dag \xi} ~\mid 0>~, ~~~~<\xi\mid =<0\mid ~e^{\xi^\dag a}
<0\mid \xi> =<\xi\mid 0> =<0\mid 0>=1
\mid \xi>= \sum_{j=0}^\infty~\sum_{m=-j}^j ~\frac{\xi_1^{j+m}}{\sqrt{(j+m)!}}~\frac{\xi_2^{j-m}}{\sqrt{(j-m)!}}~\mid j,m>
<\xi\mid = \sum_{j=0}^\infty~\sum_{m=-j}^j ~<j,m\mid  ~\frac{\xi_1^{*~j+m}}{\sqrt{(j+m)!}}~\frac{\xi_2^{*~j-m}}{\sqrt{(j-m)!}}
e^{-a^\dag \xi}~a_1~e^{a^\dag \xi} = e^{-a_1^\dag \xi_1} ~ a_1~e^{a_1^\dag \xi_1} = e^{\xi_1 \frac{\partial}{\partial a_1}}~a_1 = a_1+\xi_1
e^{-a^\dag \xi}~a_2~e^{a^\dag \xi}=a_2+\xi_2
e^{-a^\dag \xi}~a_i~e^{a^\dag \xi}=a_i +\xi_i
a_i~\mid \xi>= \xi_i ~\mid \xi>
<\xi\mid ~ a_i^\dag = <\xi\mid ~\xi_i^*
<\xi \mid  j,m>=\frac{\xi_1^{*~j+m}}{\sqrt{(j+m)!}}~\frac{\xi_2^{*~j-m}}{\sqrt{(j-m)!}}
<\lambda ~\xi\mid  j,m>= \lambda^{* 2j}~<\xi\mid j,m>
<j,m\mid \lambda~ \xi>= \lambda^{2j}~<j,m\mid \xi>
~~= \frac{1}{(j+m)!}~ \frac{1}{(j-m)!}~ (\frac{\partial}{\partial \xi_1^*})~(\frac{\partial}{\partial \xi_2^*})~\xi_1^{* j+m}~\xi_2^{* j-m}=1
a_i^\dag ~\mid \xi>= a_i^\dag~ e^{a_1^\dag \xi_1 + a_2^\dag \xi_2}~\mid 0>= \frac{\partial}{\partial \xi_i}~ e^{a^\dag \xi}~\mid 0>= \frac{\partial}{\partial \xi_i}~\mid \xi>
<\xi\mid ~a_i= \frac{\partial}{\partial \xi_*}~<\xi\mid
J_i = a^\dag~\frac{\sigma_i}{2}~a
J_i~\mid 0>=0,~~~~[J_i,J_j]=i~\epsilon_{ijk}~J_k
J_1+iJ_2= a_1^\dag~a_2,~~~~J_1-iJ_2= a_2^\dag~a_1,~~~~J_3= \frac{1}{2}~(a_1^\dag a_1 -a_2^\dag a_2)
[J_3, J_1 \pm iJ_2] = J_1 \pm iJ_2~,~~~~~~[J_1 +iJ_2, J_1-iJ_2]=2J_3~,
e^{iJ_3\alpha} ~a^\dag~e^{-iJ_3 \alpha} = a^\dag~ e^{i\sigma_3\frac{\alpha}{2}}
e^{i J_2 \beta}~ a^\dag~ e^{-i J_2 \beta} = a^\dag~ e^{i\sigma_2\frac{\beta}{2}}~.
U~\mid 0>=\mid 0>~,~~~~U~a_1^\dag~U^{-1}=a_1^{'\dag}~,~~~~U~a_2^\dag~U^{-1}=a_2^{'\dag}~,
a^\dag = \pmatrix{a_1^\dag & a_2^\dag \cr}
\psi_1= e^{i(\alpha + \gamma)/2}~cos~(\frac{\beta}{2})~,~~~~\psi_2= - e^{i(\gamma-\alpha)/2}~sin(\frac{\beta}{2})

<\xi\mid ~a^\dag=<\xi\mid ~\xi^\dag
<\xi \mid  U(\psi)\mid j,m'> = \frac{(\xi^\dag \psi)^{j+m'}}{\sqrt{(j+m')!}}~\frac{(\xi^\dag \hat{\psi})^{j-m'}}{\sqrt{(j-m')!}}
\frac{1}{\sqrt{(j+m')!}}~\frac{1}{\sqrt{(j-m')!}}~ (\frac{\partial}{\partial \xi_1^*})^{j+m}~(\frac{\partial}{\partial \xi_2^*})^{j-m}~ \frac{(\xi^\dag \psi)^{j+m'}}{\sqrt{(j+m')!}}~\frac{(\xi^\dag \hat{\psi})^{j-m'}}{\sqrt{(j-m')!}}
D_{mm'}^j(\psi)= \frac{1}{\sqrt{(j+m')!}}~\frac{1}{\sqrt{(j-m')!}}~ (\frac{\partial}{\partial \xi_1^*})^{j+m}~(\frac{\partial}{\partial \xi_2^*})^{j-m}~ <\xi\mid U(\psi)\mid j,m'>
x <\xi\mid U(\psi)\mid j,m'> =  \frac{(\xi^\dag \psi)^{j+m'}}{\sqrt{(j+m')!}}~\frac{(\xi^\dag \hat{\psi})^{j-m'}}{\sqrt{(j-m')!}}
D_{\frac{1}{2}~\frac{1}{2}}^{\frac{1}{2}}= \frac{\partial}{\partial \xi_1^*}~(\xi_1^* \psi_1 +\xi_2^* \psi_2)= \psi_1= e^{i(\alpha+\gamma)/2}~cos(\frac{\beta}{2})
D_{\frac{1}{2}~-\frac{1}{2}}^{\frac{1}{2}}= \frac{\partial}{\partial \xi_1^*}~(-\xi_1^* \psi_2^* +\xi_2^* \psi_1^*)=-\psi_2^* ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
D_{-\frac{1}{2}~\frac{1}{2}}^{\frac{1}{2}}= \frac{\partial}{\partial \xi_2^*}~(\xi_1^* \psi_1 +\xi_2^* \psi_2)= \psi_2= -e^{i(\gamma - \alpha)/2}~sin(\frac{\beta}{2})
D_{-\frac{1}{2}~-\frac{1}{2}}^{\frac{1}{2}}= \frac{\partial}{\partial \xi_2^*}~(-\xi_1^* \psi_2^* +\xi_2^* \psi_1^*)= \psi_1^*~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
D^1(\psi)=\pmatrix{ \psi_1^2 & -\sqrt{2}  \psi_1 \psi_2^* & \psi_2^* \cr \sqrt{2} \psi_1 \psi_2 & \mid \psi_1\mid^2-\mid \psi_2\mid^2 & -\sqrt{2} \psi_1^* \psi_2^* \cr  \psi_2^2 & \sqrt{2} \psi_2 \psi_1^* & \psi_1^{*2} \cr}= e^{i\Sigma_3 \alpha}~e^{i\Sigma_2 \beta}~e^{i\Sigma_3 \gamma}

SU(2)= (SU(2)/U(1))\times U(1)~.
\mid \psi_1\mid^2 + \mid \psi_2\mid^2=\mid \psi_1\mid^2 (1+\mid \frac{\psi_2}{\psi_1}\mid^2)=1
\mid \psi_1\mid = \frac{1}{\sqrt{1+\mid z\mid^2}}

B=\mid \psi_1 \mid \pmatrix{ 1 & -(\frac{\psi_2}{\psi_1})^* \cr (\frac{\psi_2}{\psi_1}) & 1 \cr} = \frac{1}{\sqrt{1+{\mid z \mid}^2}} \pmatrix{ 1 & -z^* \cr z & 1 \cr}
A= \frac{1}{\sqrt{1+\mid z \mid^2}} \pmatrix{ 1 & -z^* \cr z & 1 \cr} \pmatrix{ \frac{\mid \psi_1 \mid}{\psi_1^*} &0 \cr 0 & \frac{\mid \psi_1 \mid}{\psi_1} \cr}
\Omega= \pmatrix{ \omega_1 & \omega_2 \cr -\omega_2^* & \omega_1^* \cr}
\mid \omega_1 \mid^2 + \mid \omega_2 \mid^2 =1
A' = \Omega A = \pmatrix{ \psi_1' & -\psi_2'^* \cr \psi_2' & \psi_1'^* \cr}
\pmatrix{ \psi_1' \cr \psi_2' \cr} = \pmatrix{ \omega_1 & -\omega_2^* \cr \omega_2 & \omega_1^* \cr} \pmatrix{ \psi_1 \cr \psi_2 \cr}= \pmatrix{ \omega_1 \psi_1 -\omega_2^* \psi_2 \cr \omega_2 \psi_1 + \omega_1 \psi_2 \cr}
A'= \frac{1}{\sqrt{1+\mid z' \mid^2}} \pmatrix{ 1 & -z'^* \cr z' & 1 \cr} \pmatrix{ \frac{\mid \psi_1' \mid}{\psi_1'^*} &0 \cr 0 & \frac{\mid \psi_1' \mid}{\psi_1'} \cr}
T_{\Omega} z = z' = \frac{\psi_2'}{\psi_1'} = \frac{\omega_2 \psi_1 + \omega_1^* \psi_2}{\omega_1 \psi_1 -\omega_2^* \psi_2} = \frac{\omega_2 + \omega_1^* z}{ \omega_1 - \omega_2^* z}
\psi_1'= (\omega_1 -\omega_2^*z) \psi_1
A \rightarrow T_\Omega A= A(T_\Omega z, T_\Omega \psi_1)

\label{eq:naiveheatk} H(x,x';\tau) := \left( x \vert e^{-\tau \Delta} \vert x' \right)  = e^{-\tau \Delta_x} \, \delta(x-x')  \,.
\label{eq:defdeltafint} \delta(x-x') = \sum\limits_{n = -\infty}^{+\infty}  T \int\! {d^{D-1}k \over (2 \pi)^{D-1}} \, e^{i \vec k (\vec x - \vec x')} \, e^{i \omega_n \, (x_0 - x_0')}  =: \sumint  {d^{D}k \over (2 \pi)^{D}} \, e^{i k \cdot (x - x')}
\label{eq:defenerg} \omega_n = 2 \pi T \,\left( n + {1 \over 2} \right)   \,.
\label{eq:expanhs} H(x,x;\tau) = \sumint {d^{D}k \over (2 \pi)^{D}} \, e^{-\tau \, (k^2+M^2)} \left.  \sum\limits_{m=0}^\infty {1 \over m!} \, \tau^m \, (2 i k \cdot D_x - \Delta_x + M^2)^m f(x) \right\vert_{f = 1}  \,.
\label{eq:seeley} H(x,x;\tau) = \left( {1 \over 4 \pi \tau} \right)^{D/2} e^{-\tau M^2} \sum\limits_{n =0}^\infty g_n(x;\sqrt{\tau} T) \, \tau^n  \,.
\label{eq:defcm} c_m := \left. \left . (2 i k \cdot D_x - \Delta_x + M^2)^m f(x) \right\vert_{f = 1} \,\, \right\vert_{\mbox{drop odd powers of $k$}}  \,\,.
\label{eq:defxtilde} \tilde X := X - M^2  \,.
\label{eq:trafoheat} H(x,x';\tau) \to V(x)\, e^{-\tau \Delta_x} \, V^{-1}(x)\, \delta(x-x') = V(x)\, e^{-\tau \Delta_x} \, \delta(x-x') \, V^{-1}(x') = V(x)\, H(x,x';\tau)  \, V^{-1}(x')  \,,
\label{eq:decompopdelta} e^{-\tau \Delta_x} \to V(x)\, e^{-\tau \Delta_x} \, V^{-1}(x) \quad \mbox{and} \quad \delta(x-x') \to V(x)\, \delta(x-x')  \, V^{-1}(x') \,.
\label{eq:trafoheatdiag} H(x,x;\tau) \to V(x)\, H(x,x;\tau)  \, V^{-1}(x)   \,.
\label{eq:defU} U[A](x;x') := P \exp\left[ - \int\limits_{x'}^x \!\! dz_\mu A_\mu(z) \right]
\label{eq:U1} U[A](x,x) = 1  \,.
\label{eq:Uadd} U[A](x;x') \, U[A](x';x'') = U[A](x;x'')
\label{eq:Utrafo} U[A](x;x') \to V(x)\, U[A](x;x')  \, V^{-1}(x')  \,.
\label{eq:deltaprelim} \delta(x-x') = \delta(x-x') U[A](x,x')  = \sumint  {d^{D}k \over (2 \pi)^{D}} \, e^{i k \cdot (x - x')} \, U[A](x,x') \,.
\label{eq:trafomodfourier} e^{i k \cdot (x - x')} \, U[A](x,x') \to  V(x)\, e^{i k \cdot (x - x')} \, U[A](x;x')  \, V^{-1}(x')  \,.

E\left(\beta \right)=E_{0}+\widetilde{E}\left(\beta \right)=\frac{1}{2r}\sum _{\ell =1}^{\infty }\ell ^{2}\left(\ell ^{2}+\mu _{eff}^{2}\right)^{1/2}+\frac{1}{r}\sum _{\ell =1}^{\infty }\frac{\ell ^{2}\left(\ell ^{2}+\mu _{eff}^{2}\right)^{1/2}}{e^{\beta \left(\ell ^{2}+\mu _{eff}^{2}\right)^{1/2}/r}-1},

\label{d1} \mu\frac{d\xi}{d\mu}=2\gamma_{\mathcal{O}}(g^{2},\alpha)\xi+\delta(g^{2}, \alpha)

\label{d3} \left(\beta(g^{2})\frac{\partial }{\partial g^{2}}+\alpha\beta_{ \alpha}(g^{2},\alpha)\frac{\partial}{\partial \alpha}\right)\xi(g^{2}, \alpha)=2\gamma_{\mathcal{O}}(g^{2},\alpha)\xi(g^{2},\alpha)+\delta(g^{2}, \alpha)
\label{d4} \xi(g^{2},\alpha)=\frac{\xi_{0}(\alpha)}{g^{2}}+\xi_{1}(\alpha)+\xi_{2}( \alpha)g^{2}+\ldots
\label{d5} \delta\xi=-\frac{\left(N^{2}-1\right)}{16\pi^{2}}\frac{\left(3-\alpha^{2} \right)}{\varepsilon}
\left. \frac{\delta \mathcal{W}(J)}{\delta J}\right| _{J=0}=-\left\langle \mathcal{O}\right\rangle  \label{fd}
J\mathcal{O}+\frac{\xi }{2}J^{2}\Rightarrow -\frac{\sigma ^{2}}{2\xi g^{2}}+ \frac{\sigma }{g\xi}\mathcal{O}+\frac{\sigma }{g}J-\frac{1}{2\xi }\mathcal{O} ^{2}  \label{hs}
\exp -i\mathcal{W}(J)=\int [D\phi ]\exp i\left( S_{\sigma }+\int d^{4}x\frac{ \sigma }{g}J\;\right)  \label{wjs}
\left\langle \sigma \right\rangle _{S_{\sigma }}=g\left\langle \mathcal{O} \right\rangle  \label{rel}
J\mathcal{O}+\frac{\xi }{2}J^{2}\Rightarrow -\frac{\sigma ^{2}}{2 g^{2}}+ \frac{\sigma }{g\sqrt{\xi}}\mathcal{O}+\frac{\sqrt{\xi}\sigma }{g}J-\frac{1}{ 2\xi }\mathcal{O}^{2}  \label{hsbis}
\exp -i\mathcal{W}(J)=\int [D\phi ]\exp i\left( S_{\sigma }+\int d^{4}x\frac{ \sqrt{\xi}\sigma }{g}J\;\right)  \label{wjsbis}
\label{dudal2} \Gamma\left(\frac{\sqrt{\xi}\sigma}{g}\right)=-\mathcal{W}(J)-\int d^{4}y J(y)\frac{\sqrt{\xi}\sigma(y)}{g}
\label{dudal3} \frac{\delta}{\delta\left(\frac{\sqrt{\xi}\sigma(y)}{g}\right)}\Gamma\left( \frac{\sqrt{\xi}\sigma(x)}{g}\right)=-J(y)
\label{dudal4} \frac{d}{d\left(\frac{\sqrt{\xi}\sigma}{g}\right) }V=0
\label{dudal5} \frac{dV}{d \sigma}=0
\label{dudal6} \sigma\rightarrow\frac{\sigma}{\sqrt{\xi}}
\label{19} 1=\frac{1}{N}\int [D\sigma]\exp\left[i\int d^{4}x\left(-\frac{1}{2\xi}\left( \frac{\sigma}{g}-\mathcal{O}-\xi J\right)^{2}\right)\right]
\label{20} \exp(-i\mathcal{W}(J))=\int[D\phi][D\sigma]\exp i\left[\widetilde{S}(J)+\int d^{4}x\left(-\frac{1}{2\xi}\left(\frac{\sigma}{g}-\mathcal{O}-\xi J\right)^{2}\right)\right]
\label{23} \frac{d}{d\alpha}\frac{1}{N}\int [D\sigma]\exp\left[i\int d^{4}x\left(-\frac{ 1}{2\xi}\left(\frac{\sigma}{g}-\mathcal{O}-\xi J\right)^{2}\right)\right]=0
\label{24} -\frac{d\mathcal{W}(J)}{d\alpha}=\left\langle s\left(\frac{\overline{c}b}{2}- \frac{g^{2}}{4}f^{abc}\overline{c}^{a}\overline{c}^{b}c^{c}\right)\right \rangle_{J=0}+\textrm{terms proportional to } J
\label{25bis} \Gamma\left(\frac{\sigma}{g}\right)=-\mathcal{W}(J)-\int d^{4}y J(y)\frac{ \sigma(y)}{g}
\label{25} -V(\sigma)\int d^{4}x=\Gamma\left(\frac{\sigma}{g}\right)
\label{26} \left.\frac{dV(\sigma)}{d\sigma}\right|_{\sigma=\sigma_{min}}=0
\label{26bis} \sigma=\sigma_{min} \Rightarrow J=0
\label{27} \left.\frac{d}{d\alpha}V(\sigma)\right|_{\sigma=\sigma_{min}}\int d^{4}x= \left.\frac{d}{d\alpha}\mathcal{W}(J)\right|_{J=0}
\label{28} \left.\frac{d}{d\alpha}V(\sigma)\right|_{\sigma=\sigma_{min}}=0
\label{29} \frac{\delta}{\delta\left(\frac{\sigma}{g}\right)}\Gamma=-J
\label{30} V_{0}(\sigma)+V_{1}(\sigma)g^{2}+\ldots+V_{n-1}(\sigma)\left(g^{2} \right)^{n-1}=0

W_{E}[{\bf J}]=N\int {\mathcal D}{\bf \Phi}\;  \e^{-\int d^{d} x [{\cal L}_0+ {\cal L}_{int} -{\bf J\cdot \Phi}]}. \label{01}
W_{E}[{\bf J}]=\e^{-\langle{\cal L}_{int}\left(\frac{\delta}{\delta {{\bf J}_{x}}}\right)\rangle _{x}} \e^{-Z^{0}[{\bf J}]} W_{0}[0] \label{02}
W_{E}[J]=N\int {\mathcal D}\varphi\; \e^{-\int d^{4} x [\frac{1}{2}\partial_{\mu} \varphi \partial_{\mu} \varphi + \frac{1}{2} m^{2} \varphi^{2}+V(\varphi)-J\varphi]}, \label{1b}
W_{E}[J]= \e^{-\langle V(\frac{\delta}{\delta J_{x}})\rangle _{x}} e^{-Z^{0}[J]} W_{0}[0], \label{1}
\langle V(\frac{\delta}{\delta J_{x}})\rangle  _{x}=\int d^{4}\;x \; \frac{\lambda}{4!} \frac{\delta^{4}}{\delta J_{x}^{4}}, \label{1a}
W_{0}[0]= N\int {\mathcal D}\varphi\; \e^{-\int d^{4} x [\frac{1}{2}\partial_{\mu} \varphi \partial_{\mu} \varphi + \frac{1}{2} m^{2} \varphi^{2}]}, \label{2}
Z^{0}[J]=\frac{1}{2}\langle J(x)\Delta_{xy} J(y)\rangle  _{xy},\label{3}
\Delta_{xy}=\frac{1}{(2\pi)^4}\int d^{4}p \frac{\e^{ip\cdot(x-y)}}{p^{2} + m^{2}}\label{4}
Z_{E}[J]= - \ln W_{0}[0] + Z^{0}[J] - \ln \left(1 + \e^{Z^{0}[J]} \left(e^{-\langle V(\frac{\delta}{\delta J})\rangle }-1\right)\;\e^{-Z^{0}[J]}(1)\right),\label{5}

\mathcal{Z}=\mathcal{N\;}\int DA_{i}D\theta ^{\mathrm{s}}e^{-E_{\mathrm{eff} }(A,J)}\;,  \label{pf}
E_{\mathrm{eff}}(A,J)=\int d^{3}x\left( \frac{1}{4}\left( F_{ij}+J_{ij}\right) ^{2}+\sigma ^{2}q^{2}A^{2}\right) +\widetilde{E}(A)\;, \label{effg}
e^{-\widetilde{E}(A)}=\int D\rho \exp \left[ -\int d^{3}x\left( \partial _{i}\rho \partial _{i}\rho +q^{2}\rho (\rho +2\sigma )A^{2}+V(\rho )\right) \right] \;.  \label{pr}
\varphi =\sigma e^{i\theta (x)}\;.  \label{fr}
E_{\mathrm{Lond}}(A,J)=\int d^{3}x\left( \frac{1}{4}\left( F_{ij}+J_{ij}\right) ^{2}+\frac{1}{2}m^{2}A_{i}A_{i}\right) \;\;\;,\;\;\;\; \label{l}
m^{2}=2\sigma ^{2}q^{2}\;.  \label{m}
\frac{\delta E_{\mathrm{Lond}}}{\delta A_{i}}=-\partial _{i}F_{ij}+m^{2}A_{j}-\partial _{i}J_{ij}=0\;.  \label{eqm}
\partial _{i}A_{i}=0\;.  \label{tr}
(\partial ^{2}-m^{2})A_{i}=\frac{1}{q}\epsilon _{ijk}\partial _{j}I_{k}\;. \label{bc}
A_{i}(x)=-\frac{1}{4\pi }\frac{1}{q}\epsilon _{ijk}\partial _{j}^{x}\int d^{3}y\frac{1}{\left| x-y\right| }e^{-m\left| x-y\right| }I_{k}(y)\;, \label{ai}
A_{i}(x)=-\frac{n}{2q}\epsilon _{ijk}\partial _{j}^{x}\int_{L}dy_{k}\frac{1}{ \left| x-y\right| }e^{-m\left| x-y\right| }\;.  \label{aif}
B=\partial _{x}A_{y}-\partial _{y}A_{x}=\frac{n}{q}\frac{1}{x_{\mathrm{\bot } }}\partial _{x_{\mathrm{\bot }}}\left( x_{\mathrm{\bot }}\partial _{x_{ \mathrm{\bot }}}K_{0}(mx_{\mathrm{\bot }})\right) \;.  \label{b}
\Phi =\int_{\mathrm{S}_{\infty }^{1}}d^{2}xB=\frac{2\pi n}{q} \int_{0}^{\infty }dx_{\mathrm{\bot }}\partial _{x_{\mathrm{\bot }}}\left( x_{ \mathrm{\bot }}\partial _{x_{\mathrm{\bot }}}K_{0}(mx_{\mathrm{\bot } })\right) =\frac{2\pi n}{q}\;.  \label{fl}
E_{\mathrm{Lond}}(A,J)=\int d^{3}x\left( \frac{1}{2}A_{i}\left( -\partial ^{2}+m^{2}\right) A_{i}+\frac{1}{q}A_{i}\epsilon _{ijk}\partial _{j}I_{k}+ \frac{1}{2q^{2}}I_{k}I_{k}\right) \;.  \label{ld}
A_{i}=-\frac{1}{q}\frac{\epsilon _{ijk}}{\left( -\partial ^{2}+m^{2}\right) } \partial _{j}I_{k}\;,  \label{ldv}
E_{\mathrm{Lond}}(A,J)=\frac{m^{2}}{2q^{2}}\int d^{3}xI_{k}\frac{1}{\left( -\partial ^{2}+m^{2}\right) }I_{k}\;.  \label{ldd}
\frac{E_{\mathrm{Lond}}}{L}=\frac{m^{2}n^{2}}{2q^{2}}\int d^{2}k_{\bot } \frac{1}{k_{\bot }^{2}+m^{2}}\;,  \label{luv}
F_{ij}\rightarrow \widehat{O}(\partial )F_{ij}\;,  \label{rf}
\left[ \widehat{O}f\right] (x)=\int d^{3}yO(x-y)f(y)\;.  \label{odf}
E_{\mathrm{Lond}}(A,J)\rightarrow E_{O}(A,J)\;,  \label{ereg}
A_{i}=-\frac{1}{q}\frac{\epsilon _{ijk}}{\left( -O^{2}\partial ^{2}+m^{2}\right) }O\partial _{j}I_{k}\;,  \label{vreg}
\frac{E_{O}}{L}=\frac{m^{2}n^{2}}{2q^{2}}\int d^{2}k_{\bot }\frac{1}{k_{\bot }^{2}\widetilde{O}^{2}(k_{\bot })+m^{2}}\;,  \label{ef}
\widetilde{O}(p)=\int d^{3}xe^{-ipx}O(x)\;,  \label{ft}
\label{metric} ds^2 \approx (N^{\perp}_{,\rho})^2 \rho^2 dt^2 + d\rho^2 + g_{\theta\theta}\ d\theta^2 + g_{\phi\phi}(d\phi+N^{\phi}dt)^2 \ .
\Theta= N^{\perp}_{,\rho} (t_2-t_1) \ . \label{angle}
I_{\mbox{{\tiny HAMILTONIAN}}}=\int d^4 x \left( \pi^{ij}\dot{g}_{ij} - N^{\perp}{\cal H}_{\perp} - N^{i}{\cal H}_{i} \right) \ . \label{hamaction}
-4\pi(t_2-t_1)\left.\int d\theta\left[ \ N^{\perp}_{,\rho} \delta g^{1/2}  \ + N^{\phi}\delta\pi_{\phi}^{\ \rho} \right]\right|_{\rho=0} \ , \label{surface}
\Theta=2\pi \ , \label{noconical}
4\pi A = 8\pi^2\int d\theta g^{1/2} \ , \label{add}
N^{\phi} = 0 \ , \label{zeronphi}
\phi =  \phi'-N^{\phi}_{\mbox{\tiny horizon}}t \ . \label{ccc}
J_+ = -\int_{\rho=0} d\theta \pi^{\rho}_{\phi} = \int_{r_{++}} d\theta \pi^{r}_{\phi} \ , \label{j}
J_+ = \frac{ma}{Z^2} \ . \label{jkerr}
-4\pi(t_2-t_1)\int d\theta \ N^{\perp}_{,\rho} \delta g^{1/2} \ , \label{energy}
(t_2-t_1) \delta U \ . \label{e}
4\pi(t_2-t_1)\left\{ \frac{H'(r_{++})}{(r_{++}^2+a^2)}\ \delta \left[\frac{(r_+^2+a^2)}{Z}\right] \right\} \ . \label{a}
4\pi\frac{H'(r_{++})}{(r_{++}^2+a^2)} \ \delta \left[\frac{(r_{++}^2+a^2)}{Z}\right] = \delta\left[ \frac{m}{Z^2}\right] - \left( \frac{aZ}{r_{++}^2+a^2} - \frac{a}{l^2} \right) \ \delta \left[\frac{ma}{Z^2}\right] \ , \label{identity}
(t_2-t_1) \left[\delta U - \left(\frac{aZ}{r_{++}^2+a^2} - \frac{a}{l^2}  \right) \delta J \right] \ , \label{s}
U = \frac{m}{Z^2} \ . \label{U}
(t_2-t_1) \left(\frac{aZ}{r_{++}^2+a^2} - \frac{a}{l^2}  \right) \ , \label{a1}
-(t_2-t_1) \left(N^{\phi}(r_{++}) + \frac{a}{l^2}\right) \label{a2}
(t_2-t_1)(\delta U - \Omega \delta J) \ , \label{surface2}
\Omega = N^{\phi}(r_+) - \frac{a}{l^2} \ . \label{omega}
N^{\phi}(r_{+}) - N^{\phi}(r_{++}) \ , \label{dif}
\Omega_{++} = N^{\phi}(r_{++}) - \frac{a}{l^2} \ . \label{omega++}
S=4\pi A = \frac{1}{4G} A \ , \label{entropy}
\beta=\left.\frac{\partial S}{\partial U}\right|_J \ , \label{beta}
\beta=t_2-t_1  \ , \label{betat}
N=f^{-1} N^{\perp} \ , \label{resclapse}
\label{kds} ds^2 = N^2 dt^2 + \frac{R^2}{H}dr^2 + \frac{R^2}{\Delta}d\theta^2 + g_{\phi\phi}(d\phi+N^{\phi}dt)^2 \ ,
H(r) = 0 \ . \label{hor}
\rho = \pm\frac{R(r_h)}{r_h}\int_{r_h}^{r}\frac{\tilde{r}d\tilde{r}}{\sqrt{H(\tilde{r})}} \ , \label{change}
N^{\perp}_{,\rho} = \pm\frac{1}{2(r_h^2+a^2)} \left.\frac{dH}{dr}\right|_{r_h} \ \ . \label{a11}
ds^2= N^2 (\gamma_{,\rho})^2 dt^2 + d\rho^2 + \gamma^2 d\Omega^2 \ \ \ , \label{boundaryform}
\left.\gamma^2_{,\rho} \right|_{\rho_h} = 0 \ , \label{horizon}
\tilde{{\cal H}}_{\perp} = {\cal H}_{\perp}   |\gamma_{,\rho}|  \ , \label{ham}
\int d^3 x(N^{\perp}{\cal H}_{\perp}) =  \int d^3 x(N{\tilde{\cal H}}_{\perp}) \ , \label{action}
\tilde{{\cal H}}_\perp = 2\sin\theta\   |\gamma_{,\rho}|  \left(2\gamma\gamma_{,\rho\rho} - 1 + (\gamma_{ ,\rho})^2 + \ \frac{3}{l^2}\gamma^2\right)  \ . \label{cons}
\left. -2 \int d\phi d\theta N \gamma_{,\rho\rho} \ \delta \gamma^2 \ \right|^{r_{++}}_{r_+} \  . \label{var}
{\cal H}_\perp = 0  \ , \label{constraint}
\left. -2 \int d\phi d\theta N \left(1-\frac{3}{l^2}\gamma^2 - (\gamma_{,\rho})^2 \right)  \delta \gamma \right|^{r_{++}}_{r_+}  \ , \label{var2}
\left. - 2 \int d\phi d\theta  N \  \delta \left( \gamma - \frac{\gamma^3}{l^2} \right)  \right|^{r_{++}}_{r_+}  \ . \label{var3}
-\delta U \ , \label{}
U_+= 8\pi \left( \gamma - \frac{\gamma^3}{l^2} \right) \ , \label{up}
U_{++}= -8\pi \left( \gamma - \frac{\gamma^3}{l^2} \right) \ , \label{upp}
U=\oint \left(g_{ij,i}-g_{ii,j}\right) dS_j \  , \label{adm}
U_+ = m \ ,
U_{++} = -m \ ,

\label{1.9} I[\psi_d, g]=\int d^4x \sqrt{-g}~ \bar{\psi}_d(i\gamma^\mu \nabla_\mu+m_d)\psi_d~.

\label{1.2} q(0)=q(1)=0~,

\label{1.4} {1 \over G}={1 \over 12\pi}q'(1)= {1 \over 12\pi}\left[ \sum_s (1-6\xi_s)m_s^2\ln m_s^2 +2\sum_d m_d^2\ln m_d^2\right]~.

\label{1.15} m_s^2({\bf p})=m_s^2+{\bf p}^2~.
\label{1.16} \Gamma[g]=\sum_{\bf p} \Gamma_2[\gamma,|{\bf p}|] ={a^2 \over 4\pi}\int^\infty_\sigma \Gamma_2[\gamma,p] dp^2 ~.
\label{1.17} \Gamma_2[\gamma,p]\simeq{1 \over 4G_2(p)} \int\sqrt{-\gamma} d^2x ~\left({\cal R}+2\lambda_2(p)\right)~.
\label{1.20} \Gamma[g]={1 \over 16\pi G}\int \sqrt{-g}d^4x R[g]~,
