\label{1.22} {1 \over G_2(p)}=-{\partial \over \partial p^2}{1 \over G(p)}~.
\label{2.1} T_{\alpha\beta}=-\left(\nabla_\alpha\phi\nabla_\beta\phi- \frac 12 ((\nabla \phi)^2+m^2+\xi \tilde{R}~\phi^2)\gamma_{\alpha\beta}+\xi (\gamma_{\alpha\beta} \nabla^2-\nabla_\alpha\nabla_\beta )\phi^2\right)~,
\label{2.2} T_{\alpha\beta}={1 \over 4} \left(\nabla_\alpha\tilde{\psi}\gamma_\beta\psi+ \nabla_\beta\tilde{\psi}\gamma_\alpha\psi -\tilde{\psi}\gamma_\alpha \nabla_\beta\psi- \tilde{\psi}\gamma_\beta \nabla_\alpha\psi \right)~.
\label{2.3} dl^2=\kappa^2\rho^2d\tau^2+d\rho^2=dz d\bar{z}~,
\label{2.5} I[\phi]=2\int d^2z~ \partial \phi \bar{\partial}\phi
\label{2.4} z=f(w), ~~\bar{z}=\bar{f}(\bar{w})~,
\label{2.4a} \phi(z,\bar{z})= \phi'(w,\bar{w})~.
\label{2.6} I[\psi]=\int d^2x ~\tilde{\psi}\nabla^\alpha \gamma_\alpha\psi =\sum_{j=1,2}\int d^2z \left[b_j \bar{\partial} a_j+ \bar{b}_j \partial \bar{a}_j\right]~.
\label{2.7a} b_j(z,\bar{z})=(\partial f)^{-1/2} b'_j(w,\bar{w})~,\hskip 1cm a_j(z,\bar{z})=(\partial f)^{-1/2} a'_j(w,\bar{w})~,
\label{2.7b} \bar{b}_j(z,\bar{z})=(\bar{\partial}\bar{f})^{-1/2} \bar{b}_j'(w,\bar{w})~,\hskip 1cm \bar{a}_j(z,\bar{z})=(\bar{\partial}\bar{f})^{-1/2} \bar{a}_j'(w,\bar{w})~,
\label{2.8} T(z)=-(\partial \phi)^2 ~,
\label{2.9} T_j(z)=\frac 14 (\partial b_j a_j-b_j \partial a_j)~.
\label{2.8a} T'(w)=(\partial f)^2 T(z)+{1 \over 2\pi} A_f(w)~,
\label{2.9a} T'_j(w)=(\partial f)^2 T_j(z)+{1 \over 2\pi} A_f(w)~,
\label{2.10} A_f(w)={2\partial^3f \partial f -3 (\partial ^2f)^2 \over 24(\partial f)^2}~.
\label{2.11} \langle \phi(z,\bar{z}) \phi(z',\bar{z}') \rangle= {1 \over 4\pi}\int_0^\infty {ds \over s}e^{-{d^2 \over 4s}-m^2s}= {1 \over 2\pi}K_0(d^2m^2)~,
\label{2.12a} K_0(x)=-\ln {x \over 2} +O(x^2 \ln x)~,
\label{2.12b} K_0(x)=\sqrt{\pi \over 2x}e^{-x}(1 +O(x^{-1}))~.
\label{2.13} \langle \phi(z,\bar{z}) \phi(z',\bar{z}') \rangle= -{1 \over 4\pi}\ln (m^2 |z-z'|^2)~,
\label{2.15} \langle b_1(z,\bar{z}) a_1(z',\bar{z}') \rangle= -{1 \over \pi} \partial ~K_0(d^2 m^2({\bf p}))~,
\label{2.16} \langle b_1(z,\bar{z}) \bar{b}_1(z',\bar{z}') \rangle= -{im \over 2\pi}~ K_0(d^2 m^2({\bf p}))~,
\label{2.17} \langle b_1(z,\bar{z}) \bar{b}_2(z',\bar{z}') \rangle= {\mu({\bf p}) \over 2\pi}~ K_0(d^2m^2({\bf p}))~.
\label{3.1} dl^2=-\kappa^2 \rho^2 dt^2+d\rho^2~.
\label{3.2} s={1 \over 6} \ln {R \over \epsilon}~.

\label{2.20b} H^2=-(\rho \partial_\rho)^2+\rho^2m^2~.

\label{2.23} \Phi(\omega,\epsilon, R)=2\omega \int_\epsilon^R {d \rho \over \rho} |\phi_\omega(\rho)|^2 ~.
\label{2.25} \Phi(\omega,\epsilon,R)=-{1 \over \pi \kappa} \ln {m \epsilon \over 2} +f(\omega,\epsilon)+\bar{f}(\omega,\epsilon)~,
\label{2.25a} f(\omega,\epsilon)={i \over 4\pi \omega} { \Gamma(1+i\omega/\kappa) \over \Gamma(1-i\omega/\kappa)} \left({m \epsilon \over 2}\right)^{-2i\omega/\kappa} -{1 \over 2\pi\kappa}\psi(1-i\omega/\kappa)~,
\label{2.26} F(\beta,\epsilon,R)=-{\pi \over 6\beta^2 \kappa}\ln {1 \over m \epsilon} ~.
\label{2.24} s(R/\epsilon)={1 \over 6} \ln {1 \over m \epsilon}~,

\label{2.19} T'(w)=(\partial f)^2 T(z)+(1-6\xi){1 \over 2\pi} A_f(w) -\xi{1 \over 8\pi} (\partial \ln \partial f)^2~,
\label{2.30} z=f(w)=w+\varepsilon (w)~,\hskip 1cm |\varepsilon (w)|\ll 1~.

\label{2.24a} s(c_k,R_k(p)/\epsilon)={c_k \over 6} \ln {R_k(p) \over \epsilon}~,
\label{2.20} C=\sum_s c_s+\sum_d c_d~,\hskip 1cm ~C=0~,
\label{2.21} \sum_s c_sm_s^2+\sum_d c_dm_d^2=0~.

\label{3.5} S=\sum_k S_k={{\cal A} \over 48\pi}\left(\sum_k c_km_k^2\ln m_k^2 -\ln \Lambda \sum_k c_k m_k^2 + \Lambda(1-\ln\epsilon ^2 \Lambda )\sum_k c_k\right)=S^{BH} ~.

\label{z}  \frac{\partial G(z)}{\partial y} = O(G/m_{3/2}),\  \frac{\partial G(z)}{\partial  y}(z_{0},s_{0})=0
\label{PD}    \frac{\partial h(x)}{\partial z} = \frac{\partial h(x)}{\partial    z^{*}} =  1/2 \frac{dh}{dx} \equiv \frac{h^{'}}{2}
\label{V1}  V(x) = \mathrm{e}^{G}(\frac{G^{'2}}{G^{''}}-3) =  \frac{\mathrm{e}^{G}}{G^{''}}(G^{'2}-3G^{''}).
\label{g}     G^{'} = g(x)
\label{f}     g^{2} - 3g^{'} = f^{2}.
\label{A} f^{2} = \alpha (g-3)^{2}.
\label{P} G = -3\ln{(x)},\  \ V=0.
\label{x}     \frac{dx}{dg} = \frac{1}{(1-\alpha)g^{2} + 6\alpha g -9\alpha}
\label{Sx}     x = \tan^{-1}{(\frac{1-\alpha}{3\alpha}g + 1)} - \tan^{-1}{(\frac{1}{\alpha})}
\label{Sg}     g = \frac{3\alpha}{1-\alpha}(\tan{(x+c)-1)}
\label{c}     c =  \tan^{-1}{(\frac{1}{\alpha})}.
\label{G}     G(x) = \int_{u = 0}^{x}g(u) du + G_{0}
\label{SG}     G = G_{0}  + \frac{3\alpha}{1-     \alpha}(\log \sec (x+c) - \log \sec (c)-x)
\label{Gp} G^{''} = g^{'} = \frac{3\alpha}{1-\alpha}\sec^{2}{(x+c)}
\label{SV2}     V =3 \mathrm{e}^{G_{0}}\frac{(1+ \alpha^{2})}{1 - \alpha}[\mathrm{e}^{-x}(\cos{(x)} - \frac{1}{\alpha}\sin{(x)})]^{\frac{     3\alpha}{\alpha -1}}\sin^{2}{(x)}.
\label{ms} m_{S}^{2} = \frac{V^{''}}{G^{''}}|_{x = 0}  = \frac{\mathrm{e}^{G_{0}}}{G^{''}} \frac{(f^{'})^{2}}{G^{''}}|_{x=0} = \alpha m_{3/2}^{2}
\label{mp} m_{P}^{2} = O(m_{3/2}^4).
\label{phi}     \phi(x) = \int_{u=0}^{x}\sqrt{2G^{''}(u)}du =     \sqrt{\frac{2\alpha}{3(1-\alpha)}}\ln{(\frac{\sec(x+c)+\tan(x+c)}{\sec(c)+ \tan(c)})}
\label{L}    x = 1/2 \ln{(2g/3 - 1)}.
\label{w}     w = \exp{(z)}, |w| = \exp{(x)}
\label{SL}     V = \frac{3 \mathrm{e}^{G_{0}}}{4}(|w|^{2} \exp{(|w|^{2}-1)})^{3/4}(|w| -     |w|^{-1})^{2}.
\label{psi}     L_{\psi} = 3\sqrt{-g}((\partial \psi)^{2} - \frac{\mathrm{e}^{G_{0}}}{4}     (\psi^{2}\exp{\psi^{2}-1})^{3/4}(\psi - \psi^{-1})^{2}).
\label{sig}     d \sigma^{2} = 6dwdw^{*} = 6(d\psi^{2} + \psi^{2}d\theta^{2}).

x^n y^n\prod \zeta_i = uvw = \prod (t-f(q^i x))

uv = uw =0

\sum_{I \in S_N} \tau^{( i_1 i_2 )} ... \tau^{( i_N \, N+1)} \pa F( \psi ) \;\; =\;\; 0 \label{eq:3.7}
{\cal{S}}^{{[ p_1 ,..., p_N ]}_S}_{(r+ 1/2)} \;\; =\;\; - \left( \prod_{i=1}^{N} \frac{1}{p_i !} \right) \int d^D x \; {\bar{\psi}}^{\; {\mu}^1_1 ...{\mu}^1_{p_1} ...{\mu}^i_1 ...{\mu}^i_{p_i} ...{\mu}^N_{p_N} } {\dirac \over \square^{\, r+1}} E_{{\mu}^1_1 ...{\mu}^1_{p_1} ...{\mu}^i_1 ...{\mu}^i_{p_i} ...{\mu}^N_{p_N}} ( \psi ) \label{eq:3.8}
{\cal{S}}^{{[ p_1 ,..., p_N ]}_S}_{(r+ 1/2)} \;\; =\;\; - \left( \prod_{i=1}^{N} \frac{1}{p_i !} \right) \int d^D x \; {\bar{\psi}}^{\; {\mu}^1_1 ...{\mu}^1_{p_1} ...{\mu}^i_1 ...{\mu}^i_{p_i} ...{\mu}^N_{p_N} } {\dirac} \, {\psi}_{ {\mu}^1_1 ...{\mu}^1_{p_1} ...{\mu}^i_1 ...{\mu}^i_{p_i} ...{\mu}^N_{p_N} } \label{eq:3.8a}
{d^{\dagger}}^{(i)} \psi \;\; =\;\; 0 \quad\quad , \quad\quad \gamma^{\mu^i_1} \psi_{{\mu}^1_1 ...{\mu}^1_{p_1} ...{\mu}^i_1 ...{\mu}^i_{p_i} ... {\mu}^N_{p_N} } \;\; =\;\; 0 \label{eq:3.8b}
{\dirac}\, {\cal{G}}^{(m)}_S ( \psi ) \;\; =\;\; {\cal{G}}^{(m)} ( \psi ) \label{eq:3.11}
{\cal{G}}^{(m)}_S ( \psi ) \;\; =\;\;  {\dirac \over \square} {\cal{G}}^{(m)} ( \psi ) \label{eq:3.11a}
\square\, \phi_{\mu_1 ... \mu_s} \;\; =\;\; 0 \quad\quad , \quad\quad  \partial^{\mu_1} \phi_{\mu_1 \mu_2 ... \mu_s} \;\; =\;\; 0 \quad\quad ,  \quad\quad \eta^{\mu_1 \mu_2} \phi_{\mu_1 \mu_2 ... \mu_s} \;\; =\;\; 0 \label{eq:a1}
{\cal{G}}_{\mu\nu} \;\; :=\;\; \square h_{\mu\nu} - 2 \partial^{\rho}  \partial_{( \mu} h_{\nu ) \rho} + \partial_{\mu} \partial_{\nu}  h^{\prime} \;\; =\;\; 0 \label{eq:a2}
\begin{array}{rcl}   \delta h_{\mu\nu} &=& 2 \partial_{( \mu} \xi_{\nu )} \\   \delta h^{\prime} &=& 2 \partial^{\mu} \xi_{\mu} \\   \end{array} \label{eq:a3}
T_{\mu} \;\; :=\;\; \partial^{\nu} h_{\mu\nu} - \frac{1}{2}  \partial_{\mu} h^{\prime} \;\; =\;\; 0 \label{eq:a4}
\delta T_{\mu} \;\; =\;\; \square \xi_{\mu}  \;\; =\;\; 0 \label{eq:a5}
h^{\prime} \;\; =\;\; 2 \partial^{\mu} \zeta_{\mu} \label{eq:a6}
{\cal{G}}_{\mu\nu\rho} \;\; :=\;\; \square \phi_{\mu\nu\rho} - 3  \partial^{\alpha} \partial_{( \mu} \phi_{\nu\rho ) \alpha} +  \partial_{( \mu} \partial_{\nu} {\phi}^{\prime}_{\rho )} +  \frac{1}{\square} \left( 2 \partial^{\alpha} \partial^{\beta}  \partial_{( \mu} \partial_{\nu} \phi_{\rho ) \alpha\beta} -  \partial_{\mu} \partial_{\nu} \partial_{\rho} \partial^{\alpha}  \phi^{\prime}_{\alpha} \right) \;\; =\;\; 0 \label{eq:b1}
\begin{array}{rcl}   \delta \phi_{\mu\nu\rho} &=& 3 \partial_{( \mu} \xi_{\nu\rho )} \\   \delta \phi^{\prime}_{\mu} &=& \partial_{\mu} \xi^{\,\prime} +2  \partial^{\nu} \xi_{\nu\mu} \\   \end{array} \label{eq:b2}
T_{\mu\nu} \;\; :=\;\; \partial^{\rho} \phi_{\mu\nu\rho} - \partial_{(  \mu} \phi^{\prime}_{\nu )} \;\; =\;\; 0 \label{eq:b3}
\delta T_{\mu\nu} \;\; =\;\; \square \xi_{\mu\nu} - \partial_{\mu}  \partial_{\nu} \xi^{\,\prime}  \;\; =\;\; 0 \label{eq:b4}
\square  \phi^{\prime}_{\mu} \;\; =\;\; \partial_{\mu} \partial^{\nu} \phi^{\prime}_{\nu} \label{eq:b5}
\phi^{\prime}_{\mu} \;\; =\;\; \partial_{\mu} \zeta^{\,\prime} + 2 \partial^{\nu} \zeta_{\nu\mu} \label{eq:b6}
\square \zeta_{\mu\nu} - \partial_{\mu} \partial_{\nu} \zeta^{\, \prime} \;\; =\;\; 0 \label{eq:b7}
f_\mu  \;\; :=\;\; \phi^{\prime}_{\mu} -\partial_{\mu} \zeta^{\,\prime}  - 2 \partial^{\nu} \zeta_{\nu\mu} \label{eq:b7x}
\square \zeta^{\,\prime}  \;\; =\;\; {1 \over 3} \partial^{\mu} \phi^{\prime}_{\mu} \label{eq:b8}
\square {\hat{\zeta}}_{\mu\nu} - \partial_{\mu} \partial_{\nu} \zeta^{\,  \prime} \;\; =\;\; -{1 \over D} \eta_{\mu\nu} \partial^{\rho} \phi^{\prime}_{\rho} \label{eq:b9}
\phi^{\prime}_{\mu} \;\; =\;\; \partial_{\mu} \zeta^{\,\prime} + 2 \partial^{\nu} \zeta_{\nu\mu}  \label{eq:b10}
\dot \phi^{\prime}_{\mu} \;\; =\;\; 3 \partial_{\mu} \dot \zeta^{\,\prime} + 2 \nabla ^{i} \dot  \zeta_{i\mu} -2 \nabla^2 \zeta_{0\mu}  \label{eq:b11}
\begin{array}{rcl}   {\cal{G}}_{\mu\nu\rho\sigma} &:=& \square \phi_{\mu\nu\rho\sigma} - 4  \partial^{\alpha} \partial_{( \mu} \phi_{\nu\rho\sigma ) \alpha} + 2  \partial_{( \mu} \partial_{\nu} {\phi}^{\prime}_{\rho\sigma )} \\   &&+ \frac{1}{\square} \left( 4 \partial^{\alpha} \partial^{\beta}  \partial_{( \mu} \partial_{\nu} \phi_{\rho\sigma ) \alpha\beta} - 4  \partial_{( \mu} \partial_{\nu} \partial_{\rho} \partial^{\alpha}  \phi^{\prime}_{\sigma ) \alpha} + \partial_{\mu} \partial_{\nu}  \partial_{\rho} \partial_{\sigma} \phi^{\prime\prime}\right) \;\; =\;\;  0 \\   \end{array} \label{eq:c1}
\begin{array}{rcl}   \delta \phi_{\mu\nu\rho\sigma} &=& 4 \partial_{( \mu}  \xi_{\nu\rho\sigma )} \\   \delta \phi^{\prime}_{\mu\nu} &=& 2 \partial_{( \mu}  \xi^{\,\prime}_{\nu )} +2 \partial^{\rho} \xi_{\mu\nu\rho} \\   \delta \phi^{\prime\prime} &=& 4 \partial^{\mu} \xi^{\,\prime}_{\mu}   \end{array} \label{eq:c2}
T_{\mu\nu\rho} \;\; :=\;\; \partial^{\sigma} \phi_{\mu\nu\rho\sigma} -  \frac{3}{2} \partial_{( \mu} \phi^{\prime}_{\nu\rho  )} \;\; =\;\; 0 \label{eq:c3}
\delta T_{\mu\nu\rho} \;\; =\;\; \square \xi_{\mu\nu\rho} - 3  \partial_{( \mu} \partial_{\nu} \xi^{\,\prime}_{\rho )}  \;\; =\;\; 0 \label{eq:c4}
\square \phi^{\prime}_{\mu\nu} \;\; =\;\; 2 \partial^{\rho} \partial_{( \mu} \phi^{\prime}_{\nu )\rho} \label{eq:c5}
\partial_{\mu} \phi^{\prime\prime} \;\; =\;\; 0 \qquad , \qquad  \partial^{\mu} \partial^{\nu} \phi^{\prime}_{\mu\nu} \;\; =\;\; 0 \label{eq:c5a}
\phi^{\prime}_{\mu\nu} \;\; =\;\; 2 \partial_{( \mu} \zeta^{\,\prime}_{\nu )} + 2 \partial^{\rho} \zeta_{\mu\nu\rho} \label{eq:c6}
\square \zeta_{\mu\nu\rho} - 3 \partial_{( \mu} \partial_{\nu} \zeta^{\, \prime}_{\rho )}  \;\; =\;\; 0 \label{eq:c7}
\partial_{\mu} \partial^{\nu} \zeta^{\,\prime}_{\nu}  \;\; =\;\; 0 \label{eq:c8}
\phi^{\prime\prime} \;\; =\;\; 4  \partial^{\nu} \zeta^{\,\prime}_{\nu}    \label{eq:c7a}
f_{\mu\nu} \;\; :=\;\;  \phi^{\prime}_{\mu\nu} -2 \partial_{( \mu}  \zeta^{\,\prime}_{\nu )} - 2 \partial^{\rho} \zeta_{\mu\nu\rho} \label{eq:c9}
\square \zeta^{\,\prime}_{\mu} \;\; =\;\; {1 \over 3} \partial^{\nu} \phi^{\prime }_{\mu\nu} \label{eq:c10}
E \;\; = \;\; \sum_{n=0}^{q} k_n \; \eta^n \tau^{n+1} F \label{eq:x2a}
d^{\dagger} ( \eta^n \tau^{n} {\cal{G}} ) \;\; = \;\; \eta^n \tau^n d^{\dagger} {\cal{G}} + n(n+1)\, \eta^{n-1} \tau^{n-1} d^{\dagger} {\cal{G}} \label{eq:x3}
E \;\; = \;\; \sum_{n=0}^{q} {{(-1)}^n \over (n+1){(n!)}^2} \; \eta^n \tau^{n+1} F \label{eq:x2}
\sigma^{(ij)} \; \sum_{I \in S_N} \tau^{( i_1 i_2 )} ... \tau^{( i_{N-1} i_N )} F \;\; =\;\; 0 \label{eq:x5}
f_N \;\; :=\;\; {N! \over 2^{N/2} \, (N/2)!} \label{eq:x5n}
{\cal{G}} \;\; := \;\; \sum_{I \in S_N} \tau^{( i_1 i_2 )} ... \tau^{( i_{N-1} i_N )} F \label{eq:x6}
\eta \cdot \tau {\cal{G}} \;\; :=\;\; {\cal{Y}}_{[ p_1 ,..., p_N ]} \circ \left( {1 \over 2} \sum_{i,j =1}^{N} \eta^{(ij)} \tau^{(ij)} \right) {\cal{G}} \label{eq:x7}
{d^{\dagger}}^{(i)} ( \eta \cdot \tau {\cal{G}} ) \;\; = \;\; \eta \cdot \tau\, {d^{\dagger}}^{(i)} {\cal{G}} + N\, {d^{\dagger}}^{(i)} {\cal{G}}  \label{eq:x7a}
\eta^2 \cdot \tau^2 {\cal{G}} \;\; :=\;\; {\cal{Y}}_{[ p_1 ,..., p_N ]} \circ \left( {1 \over 4} \sum_{i,j,k,l =1}^{N} \left( \eta^{(ij)} \eta^{(kl)} + 2 \eta^{(ik)} \eta^{(lj)} \right) \tau^{(ij)} \tau^{(kl)} \right) {\cal{G}} \label{eq:x8}
\eta^n \cdot \tau^n {\cal{G}} \;\; :=\;\; {\cal{Y}}_{[ p_1 ,..., p_N ]} \circ \left( {1 \over 2^n} \sum_{i_1 ,..., i_{2n} =1}^{N} \left( \sum_\pi \eta^{( \pi ( i_1 ) \pi ( i_2 ))} ... \eta^{( \pi ( i_{2n-1} ) \pi ( i_{2n} ))} \right) \tau^{( i_1 i_2 )} ... \tau^{( i_{2n-1} i_{2n} )} \right) {\cal{G}} \label{eq:x9}
E \;\; = \;\; \sum_{n} k_n \; \eta^n \cdot \tau^{n} {\cal{G}} \label{eq:x10}
{d^{\dagger}}^{(i)} ( \eta^n \cdot \tau^n {\cal{G}} ) \;\; = \;\; \eta^n \cdot \tau^n \, {d^{\dagger}}^{(i)} {\cal{G}} + {\textsf{P}}_N (n) \; \eta^{n-1} \cdot \tau^{n-1} \, {d^{\dagger}}^{(i)} {\cal{G}} \label{eq:x11}
k_n \;\; = \;\; {(-1)}^n \, {\left( \prod_{r=1}^n {\textsf{P}}_N (r) \right)}^{-1} \label{eq:x12}
{\cal{G}}_{\mu_1 ... \mu_s} \;\; := \;\; f_s \, \eta^{( \nu_1 \nu_2} ... \eta^{\nu_{s-1} \nu_s )} F_{\mu_1 \nu_1 ... \mu_s \nu_s} \label{eq:x13}
{({\eta^n \cdot \tau^n {\cal{G}}})}_{\mu_1 ... \mu_s} \;\; := \;\; g_{s,n} \, \eta_{( \mu_1 \mu_2} ... \eta_{\mu_{2n-1} \mu_{2n}} \, {\cal{G}}^{\{ n \}}_{\mu_{2n+1} ... \mu_s )} \label{eq:x14}
g_{s,n} \;\; := \;\; {s! \over n! \, 2^n \,  (s-2n)!} \label{eq:x15}
\partial^\mu {\cal{G}}^{\{ n-1 \}}_{\mu \mu_{2n} ... \mu_s} \;\; = \;\; {(s+1-2n) \over (s+2-2n)} \, \partial_{( \mu_{2n}} \, {\cal{G}}^{\{ n \}}_{\mu_{2n+1} ... \mu_s )} \label{eq:x16}
{d^{\dagger}} ( \eta^n \cdot \tau^n {\cal{G}} ) \;\; = \;\; \eta^n \cdot \tau^n \, {d^{\dagger}} {\cal{G}} + {\textsf{P}}_s (n) \; \eta^{n-1} \cdot \tau^{n-1} \, {d^{\dagger}} {\cal{G}} \label{eq:x17}

f(r)\equiv \frac{r^2}{\ell^2}+k-\frac{\mu}{r^2}+ \frac{q^2}{r^4}\,.
\mu\equiv \omega_4 M\,\,\,,\,\,\,\,\,\,\,\,\,q^2\equiv 3\omega_4^2Q^2/16\,,
\overline{q}^2<\overline{q}_+^2\,,
\overline{q}_{\pm}^2\equiv -\frac{k}{3}\left(\overline{\mu}+ \frac{2}{9}k^2\right)\pm \frac{2}{3\sqrt{3}}\left(\overline{\mu}+ \frac{k^2}{3}\right)^{3/2}\,,
y_{out}=-\frac{k}{3}+2\left(\frac{\overline{\mu}}{3}+ \frac{k^2}{9}\right)^{1/2}\cos(\phi-\pi/3)\\,
y_{in}=-\frac{k}{3}+2\left(\frac{\overline{\mu}}{3}+ \frac{k^2}{9}\right)^{1/2}\sin(\pi/6-\phi)\,,
\phi\equiv\frac{1}{3}\tan^{-1}\left(\frac{2} {\sqrt{\frac{q^2-q_-^2}{q_+^2-q^2}}- \sqrt{\frac{q_+^2-q^2}{q^2-q_-^2}}}\right)\,.
\frac{\left(f(R)+\dot{R}^2\right)^{1/2}}{R}=\frac{4\pi G}{3}\,(\rho+\sigma)\,, \label{FRW-1}
\nabla_{\mu}T_{\nu}^{\mu}=0\Longrightarrow \dot{\rho}+ 3\frac{\dot{R}}{R}\,(\rho+p)=0\,.
\frac{\left(f_+(R)+\dot{R}^2\right)^{1/2}}{R}+\frac{\left(f_-(R)+ \dot{R}^2\right)^{1/2}}{R}=\frac{8\pi G}{3}\,(\rho+\sigma)\,. \label{asymmetric}
ds_4^2=-d\tau^2+R^2(\tau)\,d\Omega_{3,k}^2\,.
H^2\equiv \left(\frac{\dot{R}}{R}\right)^2=-\frac{k}{R^2}+ \frac{\mu}{R^4}-\frac{q^2}{R^6}+\frac{8\pi G_4}{3}\,\Lambda_4+ \left(\frac{4\pi G}{3}\right)^2\left(\rho^2+2\sigma \rho\right)\,. \label{FRW-2}
\frac{8\pi G_4}{3}\,\Lambda_4 \equiv \left(\frac{4\pi G\sigma}{3}\right)^2- \frac{1}{\ell^2}\geq 0\,.
\left(\frac{\dot{R}}{R}\right)^2=-\frac{k}{R^2}+\frac{\mu}{R^4}- \frac{q^2}{R^6}+\frac{8\pi G_4}{3}\,\Lambda_4\,. \label{critical}
0<Q^2<\frac{16}{3 \omega_4^2}\,\biggl[-\frac{\ell^2}{3}\left( \omega_4 M+ \frac{2\ell^2}{9}\right)+\frac{2\ell}{3\sqrt{3}} \left(\omega_4 M+ \frac{\ell^2}{3}\right)^{3/2}\biggr]\,, \label{k-1}
Q^2 < \frac{32 M^2 \ell}{9 \sqrt{3 \omega_4 M}}\,,
H^2_\infty \equiv \frac{\kappa^2_4}{3}\,\Lambda_4 < \frac{1}{4 \omega_4 M} =\frac{3 \pi M_5^3}{32 M}\,, \label{con-H}
\left(\frac{M_5}{M_P}\right)^2 > 10^{-11} \left(\frac{M}{M_5}\right)\,. \label{strict}
H^2=\left(\frac{\dot{R}}{R}\right)^2=\frac{8\pi G_4}{3}\,\Lambda_4- \frac{k}{R^2}+ \left(\mu+\frac{8\pi G_4}{3}\,\hat{\rho}\right)\frac{1}{R^4} -\frac{q^2}{R^6}+\frac{4\pi G_4}{3\sigma}\,\frac{\hat{\rho}^2}{R^8}\,.
\frac{1}{4}\,(x')^2=bx^2-q^2x+a\,, \label{rad}
a \equiv \frac{4\pi G_4\hat{\rho}^2}{3\sigma}\,\,\,,\,\,\,\,\,\, b\equiv \mu+\frac{8\pi G_4}{3}\,\hat{\rho}= (1+\lambda)\,\frac{8\pi G_4}{3}\,\hat{\rho}
q^4\geq 4ab=\frac{2\hat{\rho}}{\sigma}\,(1+\lambda) \left(\frac{8\pi G_4}{3}\hat{\rho}\right)^2\,.\label{minimum}
R^2=\frac{q^2}{2b}+\sqrt{\Delta}\cosh\left(2\sqrt{b}\overline{\tau}\right)\,, \label{sol-r}
\tau=\frac{q^2}{2b}\,\overline{\tau}+\sqrt{\frac{\Delta}{4b}} \sinh\left(2\sqrt{b} \overline{\tau}\right)\,.
R_{min}^2=\frac{q^2}{2b}+\sqrt{\Delta}\,,\label{min}
H^2=\left(\frac{\dot{R}}{R}\right)^2=\frac{b\Delta\, \sinh^2\left(2\sqrt{b}\overline{\tau}\right)} {\left(\frac{q^2}{2b}+\sqrt{\Delta}\cosh\left(2\sqrt{b} \overline{\tau}\right)\right)^4}\,.
H^2 \simeq \frac{8\pi G_4}{3}\,\Lambda_4-\frac{k}{R^2}+ \frac{b}{R^4}\,,
H^2_\infty \equiv \frac{\kappa^2_4}{3}\,\Lambda_4 < \frac{1}{4}\, \left(\omega_4 M + \frac{8 \pi}{3}\,\frac{\hat\rho}{M_P^2}\right)^{-1}\,,
q^4\geq \frac{2\hat{\rho}}{\sigma}\,(1+\lambda) \left(\frac{8\pi G_4}{3}\hat{\rho}\right)^2.
q^2<q_+^2=\ell^4\frac{2}{3\sqrt{3}}\,\overline{\mu}^{3/2}= \ell\,\frac{2}{3\sqrt{3}}\,\mu^{3/2}\,.
q^4<\frac{4}{27}\left(\frac{3}{4\pi G_4 \sigma}\right) \lambda^3\left(\frac{8\pi G_4\hat{\rho}}{3}\right)^3. \label{con-flat}
\lambda^3-\frac{27}{4}\,(1+\lambda)= \Bigl(\lambda+\frac{3}{2}\Bigr)^2\,(\lambda-3)>0\,.
q^4 < \frac{(1+\lambda)^2 \hat\rho}{(0.2\,\,{\rm MeV})^4}\, \left(\frac{8 \pi G_4}{3}\,\hat\rho\right)^2\,. \label{upper}
\sigma > \frac{1}{2}\,\frac{\hat\rho}{R^4}  \simeq (0.17\,\,{\rm MeV})^4\,,
H^2=\left(\frac{\dot R}{R}\right)^2=\frac{8\pi G_4}{3}\,\Lambda_4- \frac{k}{R^2}+ \frac{\mu}{R^4} + \frac{8\pi G_4}{3}\,\frac{\tilde{\rho}}{R^3} +\left(\frac{4\pi G_4}{3\sigma}\,\tilde{\rho}^2-q^2\right)\,\frac{1}{R^6}\,.
R=\frac{A}{2}\,\biggl(1+\sqrt{1+\frac{4\mu}{A^2}}\,\biggr)\,,
R^4\,{\dot R}^2=\mu R^2 - \tilde q^2\,,
\sigma > \frac{(0.2\,\,{\rm MeV})^2}{2 (1+\lambda)}\, \frac{\tilde \rho^2 }{\hat \rho^{3/2}}\,.
\omega_4 M < \frac{1}{4}\,\left(\frac{8 \pi G_4}{3}\,\tilde \rho\right)^2\,,
f_{\pm}(R)=\frac{R^2}{\ell^2}+k-\frac{\mu_{\pm}}{R^2}+ \frac{q^2}{R^4}\,.
\dot{R}^2+k=\frac{\mu}{R^2}-\frac{q^2}{R^4}+\frac{2R^2}{\ell^2} \left(\frac{\rho}{\sigma}\right)\left(1+\frac{\rho}{2\sigma}\right) +\frac{\ell^2}{16 R^6}\frac{(\Delta\mu)^2}{\left(1+\frac{\rho}{\sigma}\right)^2}\,, \label{asym}
\left(\frac{4\pi G \sigma}{3}\right)^2=\frac{1}{\ell^2}= \frac{4\pi G_4}{3}\,\sigma\,,
\mu\equiv \frac{1}{2}\,(\mu_++\mu_-)\,, \qquad (\Delta\mu)^2\equiv (\mu_+-\mu_-)^2\,.
\left(\frac{\dot{R}}{R}\right)^2+\frac{k}{R^2}= \frac{\mu}{R^4}-\frac{q^2}{R^6}+\frac{\ell^2(\Delta\mu)^2}{16 R^8}\,. \label{FRW-asym}
\frac{1}{4}(x')^2=\mu x^2-q^2 x+\frac{\ell^2(\Delta\mu)^2} {16}
R^2=\frac{q^2}{2\mu}\left\{1+\sqrt{1-\frac{\mu\ell^2(\Delta\mu)^2}{4q^4}}\, \cosh\left(2\sqrt{\mu}\overline{\tau}\right)\right\}\,,
q^4>\frac{\mu\ell^2(\Delta\mu)^2}{4}\,.
R_{min}^2=\frac{q^2}{2\mu}\left\{1+\sqrt{1-\frac{\mu\ell^2(\Delta\mu)^2}{4q^4}} \right\}
\overline{q}^2<\overline{q}_+^2=\frac{2}{3\sqrt{3}} \,min\left\{\overline{\mu}_{\pm}^3\right\}\,.
(\mu_+-\mu_-)^2<\frac{32}{27}\frac{ min\left\{\mu_{\pm}^3\right\}} {(\mu_++\mu_-)}\,.
\dot{R}^2+k=\frac{1}{R^2}\left(\mu+\frac{2}{\ell^2} \left(\frac{\hat{\rho}}{\sigma}\right)\right) -\frac{q^2}{R^4}+\frac{1}{\ell^2}\left(\frac{\hat{\rho}}{\sigma}\right)^2 \frac{1}{R^6}+ \frac{\ell^2(\Delta\mu)^2}{16\left(\frac{\hat{\rho}}{\sigma} \right)^2}\frac{R^2}{\left(1+\left(\frac{\sigma}{\hat{\rho}}\right)R^4\right)^2}\,,
\left(\frac{\dot{R}}{R}\right)^2\simeq \frac{1}{R^2} \left(\mu+\frac{2}{\ell^2}\left(\frac{\hat{\rho}}{\sigma}\right)\right) -\frac{q^2}{R^4}+\frac{1}{\ell^2}\left(\frac{\hat{\rho}}{\sigma}\right)^2 \frac{1}{R^6}\,.
1+\frac{1}{2}\,(\lambda_++\lambda_-)<\frac{4}{27}\,min\left\{\lambda_{\pm}^3 \right\}\,,

\Delta {\cal{S}}=\frac{\beta \ell}{32\pi G}\int d^4x\,\sqrt{-\gamma}\, {\cal R}_4\,,
2\sqrt{\dot{R}^2+f(R)}=\frac{8\pi G}{3}\,R\,(\rho+\sigma)- \frac{\beta\ell}{2R}\left(\dot{R}^2+k\right)\,,
\dot{R}^2+k=\frac{4(\beta+2)}{(\beta\ell)^2}\,R^2\left\{1- \sqrt{1-\left(\frac{\beta\ell}{\beta+2}\right)^2\left(\frac{\mu}{R^4}-\frac{q^2}{R^6} \right)}\right\}\,. \label{exact}

\mu\rightarrow \mu/\left(1+\frac{\beta}{2}\right)\,,  \qquad  q^2\rightarrow q^2/\left(1+\frac{\beta}{2}\right)\,, \qquad \epsilon^2\rightarrow \left(1+\frac{\beta}{2}\right)\epsilon^2\,. \label{rescaled}

1>\frac{4(\beta+1)}{(\beta+2)^2}+ \frac{f(R)}{R^2}\left(\frac{\beta\ell}{\beta+2}\right)^2\,,
\frac{f(R)}{R^2}<\frac{1}{\ell^2} \Longrightarrow  R^2>\frac{q^2}{\mu}\equiv R_{min}^2\,.

A=\ddot{z}^{\mu}\,(x_{\mu}-z_{\mu}),~~~ \dot{z}^{\mu}\, \dot{z}_{\mu}= \epsilon= 0, \pm 1.
\lambda_{\mu}\, \dot{z}^{\mu}=1,~~~ \lambda^{\mu}\, R_{, \mu}=1.
a_{,\mu}\, \lambda^{\mu}=0. \label{cond}
a_{k}=\lambda_{\mu}\, {d^k \, \ddot{z}^{\mu} \over d\tau_{0}^k}, ~~~k=1,2,\cdots ,n. \label{ak}
a_{k, \alpha}\, \lambda^{\alpha}=0, \label{con01}
\eta^{\mu \nu}\, {\partial^2 \, \phi \over \partial  x^{\mu} \partial x^{\nu}}=0. \label{scal}

\lambda_{\mu}=\epsilon \dot{z}_{\mu}+\epsilon_{1}\,{n_{\mu} \over R}, ~~~ n^{\mu}\, n_{\mu}=-\epsilon R^2.
N_{\phi}^{(D)}=-\int_{S^{D-2}}\, \dot{z}_{\mu}\,T_{\phi}^{\mu \nu}\, n_{\nu}  \, R^{D-3}\, d\Omega.
A_{\mu}^{(D+2)}={1 \over R}\, {d \over d\tau}\, A_{\mu}^{(D)}. \label{rec2}
dE=-\int_{S}\, \dot{z}_{\mu}\,T_{e}^{\mu \nu} dS_{\nu},
N_{e}^{(D)}=-\int_{S^{D-2}}\, \dot{z}_{\mu}\,T_{e}^{\mu \nu}\, n_{\nu} \, R^{D-3}\,  d\Omega.

\xi_{\mu}^{(D)}=\lim_{R \rightarrow \infty} [A_{\mu}^{(D+2)} \, R^{D \over 2}], \label{gaug}

S_{0}^{L}\left[ A_{\alpha (\lambda )},B^{\alpha \beta (\lambda )}\right] =\int d^{4}x\partial _{\left[ \alpha \right. }A_{\left. \beta \right] (\lambda )}B^{\alpha \beta (\lambda )},  \label{cin1}
\delta _{\epsilon }A_{\alpha (\lambda )}=\partial _{\alpha }\epsilon _{(\lambda )},\;\delta _{\epsilon }B^{\alpha \beta (\lambda )}=\varepsilon ^{\alpha \beta \gamma \delta }\partial _{\gamma }\epsilon _{\delta }^{\;\;(\lambda )},  \label{cin2}
\mathrm{pgh}\left( B^{\alpha \beta (\lambda )}\right) =\mathrm{pgh}\left( B_{\alpha \beta (\lambda )}^{*}\right) =\mathrm{pgh}\left( A_{\alpha (\lambda )}\right) =\mathrm{pgh}\left( A^{*\alpha (\lambda )}\right) =0, \label{cin4}
\mathrm{pgh}\left( \eta _{\;\;\;(\lambda )}^{*\alpha }\right) =\mathrm{pgh} \left( C^{*(\lambda )}\right) =\mathrm{pgh}\left( \eta _{(\lambda )}^{*}\right) =0,  \label{cin5}
\mathrm{pgh}\left( \eta _{\alpha }^{\;\;(\lambda )}\right) =\mathrm{pgh} \left( C_{(\lambda )}\right) =1,\;\mathrm{pgh}\left( \eta ^{(\lambda )}\right) =2,  \label{cin6}
\mathrm{agh}\left( B^{\alpha \beta (\lambda )}\right) =\mathrm{agh}\left( A_{\alpha (\lambda )}\right) =\mathrm{agh}\left( \eta _{\alpha }^{\;\;(\lambda )}\right) =\mathrm{agh}\left( C_{(\lambda )}\right) =0, \label{cin7}
\mathrm{agh}\left( \eta ^{(\lambda )}\right) =0,\;\mathrm{agh}\left( B_{\alpha \beta (\lambda )}^{*}\right) =\mathrm{agh}\left( A^{*\alpha (\lambda )}\right) =1,  \label{cin8}
\mathrm{agh}\left( \eta _{\;\;\;(\lambda )}^{*\alpha }\right) =\mathrm{agh} \left( C^{*(\lambda )}\right) =2,\;\mathrm{agh}\left( \eta _{(\lambda )}^{*}\right) =3,  \label{cin9}
\delta B^{\alpha \beta (\lambda )}=\delta A_{\alpha (\lambda )}=\delta \eta _{\alpha }^{\;\;(\lambda )}=\delta C_{(\lambda )}=\delta \eta ^{(\lambda )}=0,  \label{cin10}
\delta B_{\alpha \beta (\lambda )}^{*}=-\partial _{\left[ \alpha \right. }A_{\left. \beta \right] (\lambda )},\;\delta A^{*\alpha (\lambda )}=2\partial _{\beta }B^{\beta \alpha (\lambda )},  \label{cin11}
\delta \eta _{\;\;\;(\lambda )}^{*\alpha }=\varepsilon ^{\alpha \beta \gamma \delta }\partial _{\beta }B_{\gamma \delta (\lambda )}^{*},\;\delta C^{*(\lambda )}=-\partial _{\alpha }A^{*\alpha (\lambda )},\;\delta \eta _{(\lambda )}^{*}=\partial _{\alpha }\eta _{\;\;\;(\lambda )}^{*\alpha }, \label{cin12}
\gamma B^{\alpha \beta (\lambda )}=\varepsilon ^{\alpha \beta \gamma \delta }\partial _{\gamma }\eta _{\delta }^{\;\;(\lambda )},\;\gamma A_{\alpha (\lambda )}=\partial _{\alpha }C_{(\lambda )},\;\gamma \eta _{\alpha }^{\;\;(\lambda )}=\partial _{\alpha }\eta ^{(\lambda )},  \label{cin13}
\gamma C_{(\lambda )}=\gamma \eta ^{(\lambda )}=0,\;\gamma B_{\alpha \beta (\lambda )}^{*}=\gamma A^{*\alpha (\lambda )}=0,  \label{cin14}
\gamma \eta _{\;\;\;(\lambda )}^{*\alpha }=\gamma C^{*(\lambda )}=\gamma \eta _{(\lambda )}^{*}=0.  \label{cin15}
S=S_{0}^{L}+\int d^{4}x\left( A^{*\alpha (\lambda )}\partial _{\alpha }C_{(\lambda )}+\varepsilon ^{\alpha \beta \gamma \delta }B_{\alpha \beta (\lambda )}^{*}\partial _{\gamma }\eta _{\delta }^{\;\;(\lambda )}+\eta _{\;\;\;(\lambda )}^{*\alpha }\partial _{\alpha }\eta ^{(\lambda )}\right) . \label{cin3}

s\alpha =\partial _{\mu }j^{\mu },  \label{cin3b}
\alpha =\alpha _{0}+\alpha _{1}+\cdots +\alpha _{I},\;\mathrm{agh}\left( \alpha _{K}\right) =K,\;\mathrm{gh}\left( \alpha _{K}\right) =0,\;\varepsilon \left( \alpha _{K}\right) =0.  \label{cin3c}

\label{eq:PoissonBracket}     \{\cdot,\cdot\} : C^\infty(M) \times C^\infty(M) \to C^\infty(M)
\label{eq:LocalPoisson}     \{f, g\} (x) =      \sum_{i,j} \alpha^{ij}(x)      \frac{\partial f}{\partial x^i}(x)     \frac{\partial g}{\partial x^j}(x)
\label{eq:JacobiLocal}     \sum_{\ell} \left(         \alpha^{i\ell} \frac{\partial \alpha^{jk}}{\partial x^\ell}         + \alpha^{j\ell} \frac{\partial \alpha^{ki}}{\partial x^\ell}         + \alpha^{k\ell} \frac{\partial \alpha^{ij}}{\partial x^\ell}     \right) = 0.
\label{eq:CanPoisson}             \{f,g\} = \sum_{i=1}^n \left(                  \frac{\partial f}{\partial q^i}                 \frac{\partial g}{\partial p_i}                 -                 \frac{\partial f}{\partial p_i}                 \frac{\partial g}{\partial q^i}             \right).
\label{eq:LiePoisson}             \{f, g\} (x) = \sum_{i,j,k} x_k c^k_{ij}              \frac{\partial f}{\partial x_i}(x)             \frac{\partial g}{\partial x_j}(x)
\label{eq:SymplecticForm}     \omega = \frac{1}{2} \omega_{ij} dx^i \wedge dx^j      \quad     \textrm{with}     \quad     (\omega_{ij}) = (\alpha^{ij})^{-1}
\label{eq:WeylExample}         \wrep(qp^2) = \frac{1}{3}(QP^2 + QPQ + PQ^2).
\label{eq:srep}     \srep(f) = \sum_{r=0}^\infty \frac{1}{r!}     \left(\frac{\hbar}{\im}\right)^r      \left.\frac{\partial^r f}{\partial p^r} \right|_{p=0}     \frac{\partial^r}{\partial q^r}
\label{eq:wrep}     \wrep (f) = \srep(Nf)     \quad     \textrm{where}     \quad     N = \eu^{\frac{\im\hbar}{2}\Delta}     \quad     \textrm{and}     \quad     \Delta = \frac{\partial^2}{\partial q \partial p}.
\label{eq:repisodiffops}     \srep, \wrep: \Pol (T^*\mathbb{R}) \to \mathrm{Diffops} (\mathbb{R}),
\label{eq:starsdef}     f \stars g = \srep^{-1} (\srep(f) \srep(g)),
\label{eq:starwdef}     f \starw g = \wrep^{-1} (\wrep(f) \wrep(g)).
\label{eq:starsexpl}     f \stars g      = \sum_{r=0}^\infty \frac{1}{r!}     \left(\frac{\hbar}{\im}\right)^r     \frac{\partial^r f}{\partial p^r}      \frac{\partial^r g}{\partial q^r}
\label{eq:starwexpl}     \begin{split}         f \starw g          &= N^{-1} (Nf \stars Ng) \\         &=         \sum_{r=0}^\infty \frac{1}{r!}         \left(\frac{\hbar}{2\im}\right)^r         \sum_{s=0}^r \binom{r}{s} (-1)^{r-s}         \frac{\partial^r f}{\partial q^s \partial p^{r-s}}         \frac{\partial^r g}{\partial q^{r-s} \partial p^s},
\label{eq:wrepInv}     \wrep(f)^\dag = \wrep(\cc{f}),
\label{eq:starwInv}     \cc{f \starw g} = \cc{g} \starw \cc{f},
\label{eq:symPBW}     \sigma: v_1 \vee \cdots \vee v_k      \mapsto \frac{(\im\hbar)^k}{k!}      \sum_{\pi \in S_k} v_{\pi(1)} \circ \cdots \circ v_{\pi(k)}
\label{eq:BCHstar}     f \starBCH g = \sigma^{-1} (\sigma(f) \circ \sigma(g))
\label{eq:exeyebch}     \eu_x \starBCH \eu_y      = \eu_{\frac{1}{\im\hbar} \mathrm{BCH}(\im\hbar x, \im\hbar y)},
\label{eq:starproduct}         f \star g = \sum_{r=0}^\infty \lambda^r C_r(f,g),
\label{eq:newstar}     f \star' g = S^{-1} (Sf \star Sg)
\label{eq:CDformula}         a \star b          = \mu \circ \eu^{\lambda \sum_i D_i \otimes E^i} (a \otimes b)
\label{eq:QPstar}     f \star g = \mu \circ      \eu^{\im\lambda x\frac{\partial}{\partial x}       \otimes y\frac{\partial}{\partial y}} (f \otimes g)
\label{eq:quadraticP}     \{f, g\}      = xy \left(         \frac{\partial f}{\partial x}         \frac{\partial g}{\partial y}         -         \frac{\partial f}{\partial y}         \frac{\partial g}{\partial x}     \right).
\label{eq:quantumplane}     x \star y = q \, y \star x     \quad     \textrm{with}     \quad     q = \eu^{\im\lambda}.
\label{eq:ClassLag}     \mathcal{L} = \partial_\mu \phi \partial^\mu \phi - m^2 \phi^2 +     \alpha \phi^4 + \cdots
\label{eq:QLag}     \tilde{\mathcal{L}} = \partial_\mu \phi \star \partial^\mu \phi      - m^2 \phi \star \phi      + \alpha \phi \star \phi \star \phi \star \phi + \cdots.

\ddot{X}_{i}=0.      \label{CMmot}

\frac{d^{2}\xi ^{z}}{dt^{2}}=0,  \label{37}
\frac{d^{2}\xi ^{a}}{dt^{2}}=\frac{1}{2}h_{b}^{a},_{00}\xi ^{b},  \label{38}
\frac{d^{2}\xi ^{\mu }}{dt^{2}}=-R_{0k0}^{\mu }\xi ^{k}-\frac{1}{2}[ R_{\alpha kl}^{\mu }\frac{d\xi ^{\alpha }}{d\tau }S^{kl}+R_{0kl}^{\mu }S^{kl},_{\gamma }\xi ^{\gamma }+R_{0kl}^{\mu },_{\sigma }\xi ^{\sigma }S^{kl}],  \label{39}
\frac{d^{2}\xi^{0}}{dt^{2}}=-\frac{1}{2}R_{jkl}^{0}\frac{d\xi^{j}}{dt}S^{kl}, \label{40}
\begin{array}{c} \frac{d^{2}\xi^{i}}{dt^{2}}=-R_{0k0}^{i}\xi^{k}-\frac{1}{2}[R_{0kl}^{i}\frac{ d\xi^{0}}{dt}S^{kl}+R_{0kl}^{i}S^{kl},_{0}\xi^{0}+R_{0kl}^{i},_{0} \xi^{0}S^{kl}] \\  \\  -\frac{1}{2}[R_{jkl}^{i}\frac{d\xi^{j}}{dt}S^{kl}+R_{0kl}^{i}S^{kl},_{j} \xi^{j}+R_{0kl}^{i},_{j}\xi^{j}S^{kl}]. \end{array} \label{41}
\frac{d^{2}\xi ^{0}}{dt^{2}}=-R_{azb}^{0}\frac{d\xi ^{a}}{dt}S^{zb}, \label{42}
R_{zazb}=R_{0a0b}=-R_{0azb}=-\frac{1}{2}h_{ab,00}.  \label{43}
\begin{array}{c} \frac{d^{2}\xi ^{i}}{dt^{2}}=-R_{0b0}^{i}\xi ^{b}-[R_{0zb}^{i}\frac{d\xi ^{0} }{dt}S^{zb}+R_{0zb}^{i}S^{zb},_{0}\xi ^{0}+R_{0zb}^{i},_{0}\xi ^{0}S^{zb}] \\  \\  -\frac{1}{2}[R_{0ab}^{i}\frac{d\xi ^{0}}{dt}S^{ab}+R_{0ab}^{i}S^{ab},_{0}\xi ^{0}+R_{0ab}^{i},_{0}\xi ^{0}S^{ab}] \\  \\  -[R_{zbz}^{i}\frac{d\xi ^{z}}{dt}S^{bz}+R_{0bz}^{i}S^{bz},_{z}\xi ^{z}+R_{0bz}^{i},_{z}\xi ^{z}S^{bz}] \\  \\  -\frac{1}{2}[R_{zab}^{i}\frac{d\xi ^{z}}{dt}S^{ab}+R_{0ab}^{i}S^{ab},_{z}\xi ^{z}+R_{0ab}^{i},_{z}\xi ^{z}S^{ab}] \\  \\  -[R_{abz}^{i}\frac{d\xi ^{a}}{dt}S^{bz}+R_{0bz}^{i}S^{bz},_{a}\xi ^{a}+R_{0bz}^{i},_{a}\xi ^{a}S^{bz}] \\  \\  -\frac{1}{2}[R_{abc}^{i}\frac{d\xi ^{a}}{dt}S^{bc}+R_{0bc}^{i}S^{bc},_{a}\xi ^{a}+R_{0bc}^{i},_{a}\xi ^{a}S^{bc}] \end{array} \label{44}
\frac{d^{2}\xi ^{z}}{dt^{2}}=-R_{azb}^{z}\frac{d\xi ^{a}}{dt}S^{zb}, \label{45}
\begin{array}{c} \frac{d^{2}\xi ^{a}}{dt^{2}}=-R_{0b0}^{a}\xi ^{b}-[R_{0bz}^{a}\frac{d\xi ^{0} }{dt}S^{bz}+R_{0bz}^{a}S^{bz},_{0}\xi ^{0}+R_{0bz}^{a},_{0}\xi ^{0}S^{bz}] \\  \\  -[R_{zbz}^{a}\frac{d\xi ^{z}}{dt}S^{bz}+R_{0bz}^{a}S^{bz},_{z}\xi ^{z}+R_{0bz}^{a},_{z}\xi ^{z}S^{bz}]-R_{0bz}^{a}S^{bz},_{a}\xi ^{a}. \end{array} \label{46}

\frac{d^{2}\xi^{0}}{dt^{2}}=-\frac{1}{2}h_{ab,00}\frac{d\xi^{a}}{dt}S^{zb}, \label{49}
\frac{d^{2}\xi ^{z}}{dt^{2}}=\frac{1}{2}h_{ab,00}\frac{d\xi ^{a}}{dt}S^{zb} \label{50}

{\mathcal J_{l+\nu}} ( \tilde{\xi};  \tilde{k}  )   \equiv   \int_{0}^{  \tilde{\xi}  }  d z \, z  \left[  w_{l+\nu}( z; \tilde{k}) \right]^{2}  \;  . \label{eq:mathcal_J_integral_def}

{\mathcal U}_{l+\nu} ( \tilde{\xi};  \tilde{k}  )  \!  \equiv  \! \int_{0}^{  \tilde{\xi}  }  d z \, z \,  \left[ w_{l+\nu} (z;  \tilde{k} ) \right]^{2}  \, \! \left[ \! \left( \openone + \frac{1}{2} \, {\mathcal E}_{z}  \right) \! \check{U} (z; \tilde{k}) \right] \;  , \label{eq:mathcal_U_integral_def}
{\mathcal M}^{(<)}_{l+\nu} ( \tilde{\xi};  \tilde{k}  )  \!  \equiv  \! \left[  {\mathcal L}^{(<)}_{l+\nu}  (\tilde{\xi}; \tilde{k}) \right]^{2}  + \left[ \tilde{\xi}^{2} -  \! (l+\nu)^{2}  - \tilde{\xi}^{2}  \check{U} (\tilde{\xi}; \tilde{k}) \right] \;  . \label{eq:mathcal_M_integral_def}
{\mathcal A}_{a} ({\bf r}) & = & = \left[ \left( \openone + \frac{1}{2} \, {\mathcal E}_{\bf r}  \right) \, V^{(<)} ({\bf r}) \right]  \, \theta (a-r)  \nonumber \\ & & - g \, \frac{ \Omega_{d-1}}{2} \, r^{d-2} \, \delta^{(d)} ({\bf r})  \,  \theta (r-a)  \;  , \label{eq:time_rate_of_dilation_op_ddim_2D_ISP_reg} \end{eqnarray}

x\, dx=q^{2}dx\, x
x\, dy=qdy\, x+(q^2-1)dx\, y
y\, dx=qdx\, y
y\, dy=q^2dy\, y
dy\, dx=q^2dx\, dy
x\, d^2x=q^2d^2x\, x
y\, d^2x=qd^2x\, y
y\, d^2y=q^2d^2y\, y
x\, d^2y=qd^2y\, x+(q^2-1)d^2x\, y
dx\, d^2y=d^2y\, dx+q(1-q)d^2x\, dy
dy\, d^2x=d^2x\, dy
dx\, d^2x=qd^2x\, dx
dy\, d^2y=qd^2y\, dy
d^{2}y\, d^{2}x=q^{2}d^{2}x\, d^{2}y.
d=\frac \partial {\partial x}dx+\frac \partial {\partial y}dy=\partial _xdx+\partial _ydy.

\partial _{x}\, y=qy\, \partial _{x}
\partial _{y}\, y=1+q^{2}y\, \partial _{y}

d(uv)=d(u)v+(j)^nud(v),
x\, dx=j^{2}dx\, x
x\, dy=-\frac{jq}{1+q^2}dy\, x+\frac{j^2q^2-1}{1+q^2}dx\, y
y\, dx=\frac{j^2-q^2}{1+q^2}dy\, x-\frac{jq}{1+q^2}dx\, y
y\, dy=j^2dy\, y
dx\, dy=qdy\, dx
x\, d^{2}x=j^{2}d^{2}x\, x
x\, d^{2}y=-\frac{jq}{1+q^{2}}d^{2}y\, x+\frac{j^{2}q^{2}-1}{ 1+q^{2}}d^{2}x\, y
yd^2x=\frac{j^2-q}{1+q^2}^2d^2y\, x-\frac{jq}{1+q^2}d^2x\, y
y\, d^2y=j^2d^2y\, y
dx\, d^{2}x=jd^{2}x\, dx
dx\, d^{2}y=-\frac{q}{1+q^{2}}d^{2}y\, dx+\frac{jq^{2}-j^{2}}{ 1+q^{2}}d^{2}x\, dy
dyd^{2}x=\frac{j-j^{2}q}{1+q^{2}}^{2}d^{2}y\, dx-\frac{q}{1+q^{2}}d^{2}x \, dy
dy\, d^{2}y=jd^{2}y\, dy
d^2x\, d^2y=qd^2y\, d^2x.

\label{eq:defg} G(x-y) \;=\; \langle \psi (x) {\bar\psi}(y) \rangle  \;,
\label{eq:defg1} G(x-y) \;=\; \frac{1}{{\mathcal N}} \int [{\mathcal D}A] \, \langle x| {\not \!\! D}^{-1} |y \rangle \, (\det \not \!\! D)^N \, \exp [ - S_g(A) ] \;,
\label{eq:defg2} {\mathcal N}\;=\;  \int [{\mathcal D}A] \, (\det \not \!\! D)^N \, \exp [ - S_g(A) ] \;,
\label{eq:fdet} (\det \not \!\! D)^N \,=\, \exp ( N {\rm Tr} \ln  \not \!\! D ) \,=\, \exp[- W^{(2)}(A) + {\mathcal O}(N^{-1}) ]

\langle x|\frac{1}{\sqrt{-\partial^2}}|y\rangle\;=\;  \int \frac{d^3k}{(2\pi)^3} e^{i k \cdot (x-y)} \, \frac{1}{|k|} \;,
[{\mathcal D}A]\;=\; {\mathcal D}A \, \exp[ - \frac{1}{2 \xi}  \int d^3x \; \partial\cdot A \,( 1 + \frac{e^2}{8   \sqrt{-\partial^2}}) \, \partial \cdot A ] \;,
\label{eq:g1} G(x-y) \;=\; \frac{1}{{\mathcal N}} \int {\mathcal D}A \, \langle x| {\not \!\! D}^{-1} |y \rangle \, \exp [ - S_G(A) ] \;,
S_G(A) \;=\; \frac{1}{2} \int d^3x \, A_\mu M_{\mu\nu} A_\nu
M_{\mu\nu} \;=\; M(\sqrt{-\partial^2}) \; \left[ \delta_{\mu\nu} +   (\xi^{-1}-1)  \frac{\partial_\mu\partial_\nu}{\partial^2} \right]
M(\sqrt{-\partial^2})\;=\; \sqrt{-\partial^2} \; ( \sqrt{-\partial^2} + \frac{e^2}{8}) \;.
\label{eq:aux} \times \exp[- i e_N \int_{0}^T d\tau {\dot x} \cdot A(x(\tau))] \;,

\label{eq:small} M^{-1}(x) \;\sim \; \frac{1}{4\pi r} \;,\;\;\; r \sim 0\;,

F(x,y) = \sum\limits_{i,j=1}^{\infty} f_{ij} x^i y^j\ . \label{2.3}
F(x,y)  = \frac{\rho (y)}{x - \pi (y)}\ \ , \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ (x,y) \in B_y\ . \label{2.4}
\pi (y)  = \sum \limits _{i=0}^{} {\pi}_i y^i\ , \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \rho (y) = \sum \limits _{i=0}^{} {\rho}_i y^i\ . \label{2.5}
F(x,y)  = \frac{r(x)}{y - p(x)}\ \ ,\ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ (x,y) \in B_x\ , \label{2.6}
p(x) = \sum \limits _{i=0}^{} p_i x^i\ , \ \ \ \ \ \ \ r(x) = \sum \limits _{i=0}^{} r_i x^i\ . \label{2.7}
\frac{r(x)}{y - p(x)} = \frac{\rho (y)}{x - \pi (y)}\; , \ \ \ \ \ (x,y) \in D_{xy} \{x \in (-\xi, +\xi) ,\; y \in (-\eta , +\eta)\} \ . \label{2.8}

r(x) [x-\pi (y)] = \rho (y) [y- p(x)]\ \ , \label{2.10}
\frac{r^{\prime}(x)}{p^{\prime}(x)} = \frac{{\rho}^{\prime}(y)}{{\pi}^{\prime}(y)} \equiv a\ , \label{2.11}
r(x) = a p(x) + b\ , \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \rho (y) = a \pi (y) + c\ , \label{2.12}
p(x) = \frac{d-bx}{c+ax}\ \ , \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \pi (y) = \frac{d-cy}{b+ay}\ \ , \label{2.13}
F(x,y) = \frac{ad+bc}{-d + axy + bx + cy}.\ \label{2.14}
A(s,t) = (-s-t)B(\frac{1}{2}-s,\frac{1}{2}-t) = \frac{\Gamma(\frac{1}{2}-s)\Gamma(\frac{1}{2}-t)}{\Gamma(-s-t)}. \label{1}
r_n(t) \equiv Res_{s=n+\frac{1}{2}} \frac{\Gamma(\frac{ 1}{2}-s)\Gamma(\frac{1}{2}-t)}{\Gamma(-s-t)} = \frac{1}{n!}(\frac{1}{2}+t)\cdots (\frac{1}{2}+t+n) \equiv \frac{1}{n!}\, {\left( t+\frac{1}{2} \right) }_{(n+1)}, \label{1a}
A(s,t)= \sum_{n=0}^\infty \frac{1}{n!}\ \frac{(t+\frac{1}{2})_{(n+1)}}{(s-n-\frac{1}{2})}\ , \ \ \ \ \ \ \  t \in (-3/2,-1/2). \label{4}
A(s,t)= A(0,t)+ \sum_{n=0}^\infty \frac{1}{n!}\, \left( \frac{(t+\frac{1}{2})_{(n+1)}}{s-n-\frac{1}{2}} + \frac{(t+\frac{1}{2})_{(n+1)}}{n+\frac{1}{2}} \right) ,\ \ \ \ \ t \in (-1/2, 1/2). \label{5}
A(s,t)=A(s,0)+ \sum_{n=0}^\infty \left( \frac{\rho_n(s)}{t-n-\frac{1}{2}}+\frac{\rho_n(s)}{n+\frac{1}{2}} \right)\ , \label{6}
A(0,t) = A(s,0) + \sum_{n=0}^\infty \left( \frac{\rho_n(s)}{t-n-\frac{1}{2}}+\frac{\rho_n(s)}{n+\frac{1}{2}} \right) -\sum_{n=0}^\infty \left( \frac{r_n(t)}{s-n-\frac{1}{2}}+\frac{r_n(t)}{n+\frac{1}{2}} \right)   \equiv A(s,0)+\Psi(s,t). \label{7}
\frac{\partial A(0,t)}{\partial t} = \frac{\partial\Psi(s,t)}{\partial t}\big|_{s=0},\ \ \ \ \ \ \ (t \sim 0) \label{8}
\frac{\partial A(s,0)}{\partial s} = -\frac{\partial\Psi(s,t)}{\partial s}\big|_{t=0}, \ \ \ \ \ \ \ (s \sim 0) \label{9}
\frac{\partial^{k+p+2}}{\partial s^{k+1}\partial t^{p+1}}\Psi(s,t)\big|_{s=0 , t=0}=0, \ \ \ \ \ \ \ \forall \  k,p=0,1,... \ . \label{10}
\left\{ \sum_{n=0}^\infty \frac{(-1)\ \rho_n^{(2)}(s)}{(t-n-\frac{1}{2})^2} - \sum_{n=0}^\infty \frac{(-1)^2\ 2!\ r_n^{(1)}(s)}{(s-n-\frac{1}{2})^3} \right\}_{s=0,\ t=0} = 0. \label{11}

\Sigma_\beta(k)&=-\frac{4g^2}{m_\Psi^2-m_A^2}(m+\Sigma_\Eins)   \intdrei{q}\frac{\nb{E_q}+\nf{E_q}}{E_q}\\   &\quad-\frac{4g^2}{m_\Psi^2-m_B^2}(-m-\Sigma_\Eins)   \intdrei{q}\frac{\nb{E_q}+\nf{E_q}}{E_q}\\   &\quad-8g^2\left(k_0\gamma_0+\tfrac{1}{3}\vec k\vec\gamma\right)   \left(\frac{1}{(m_\Psi^2-m_A^2)^2}         +\frac{1}{(m_\Psi^2-m_B^2)^2}\right)   \cdot\\&\quad\quad\cdot   \intdrei{q}E_q\bigl(\nb{E_q}+\nf{E_q}\bigr)\\   &\quad+\Sigma_\Eins.

\label{eq:def_delta}   \Delta_A=m_\Psi^2-m_A^2=\frac{14}{3}g^2\alpha m^2,\qquad   \Delta_B=m_\Psi^2-m_B^2=-2g^2\alpha m^2.
\Gamma_{\!A}(k,p)&=-2ig-4g^2\intdrei{q}\frac{\e^{-E_q/T}}{E_q}\cdot\\   &\quad\cdot\Bigg\{   \left(\frac{\pslash+2m}{3m^2}+\frac{3m}{-m^2}\right)   \left.\frac{\qslash+m}{\Delta_A-2qk}     \Gamma_{\!A}(k,q)\right|_{q_0=E_q\cdot\sign{p_0}} \\   &\qquad+\left. \left(\frac{\pslash+2m}{-m^2}+\frac{3m}{3m^2}\right)     \left.\frac{\qslash+m}{\Delta_A-2qk}       \Gamma_{\!A}(k,q)\right|_{q_0=-E_q\cdot\sign{p_0}} \right.\\   &\qquad-\left. \left(\frac{-\pslash+2m}{3m^2}+\frac{m}{-m^2}\right)     \left.\frac{-\qslash+m}{\Delta_B-2qk}    i\gamma^5\Gamma_{\!B}(k,q)\right|_{q_0=E_q\cdot\sign{p_0}}\right.\\   &\qquad- \left(\frac{-\pslash+2m}{-m^2}+\frac{m}{3m^2}\right)   \left.\frac{-\qslash+m}{\Delta_B-2qk}     i\gamma^5\Gamma_{\!B}(k,q)\right|_{q_0=-E_q\cdot\sign{p_0}}   \Bigg\}.
i\gamma^5\Gamma_{\!B}(k,p)&=   -2ig-4g^2\intdrei{q}\frac{\e^{-E_q/T}}{E_q}\cdot\\   &\quad\cdot\Bigg\{ \left(\frac{\pslash}{3m^2}+\frac{-m}{-m^2}\right)   \left.\frac{\qslash+m}{\Delta_A-2qk}     \Gamma_{\!A}(k,q)\right|_{q_0=E_q\cdot\sign{p_0}} \\   &\qquad+\left. \left(\frac{\pslash}{-m^2}+\frac{-m}{3m^2}\right)     \left.\frac{\qslash+m}{\Delta_A-2qk}       \Gamma_{\!A}(k,q)\right|_{q_0=-E_q\cdot\sign{p_0}} \right.\\   &\qquad-\left. \left(\frac{-\pslash}{3m^2}+\frac{m}{-m^2}\right)     \left.\frac{-\qslash+m}{\Delta_B-2qk}     i\gamma^5\Gamma_{\!B}(k,q)\right|_{q_0=E_q\cdot\sign{p_0}}\right.\\   &\qquad-\left. \left(\frac{-\pslash}{-m^2}+\frac{m}{3m^2}\right)     \frac{-\qslash+m}{\Delta_B-2qk}     i\gamma^5\Gamma_{\!B}(k,q)\right|_{q_0=-E_q\cdot\sign{p_0}}   \Bigg\}.
\tilde{\Gamma}_{\!A}(k,p)=    \frac{\pslash+m}{\Delta_A-2pk}\,\Gamma_{\!A}(k,p),\quad   \tilde{\Gamma}_{\!B}(k,p)=     -i\gamma^5\frac{\pslash+m}{\Delta_B-2pk}\,\Gamma_{\!B}(k,p).

\det (T(\lambda) - \mu) = 0 \quad  \equiv \quad \mu + \mu^{-1} - t(\lambda) = 0 \label{spectralcurve}

t(\lambda) = t^{(0)}(\lambda) + t^{(1)}(\lambda) \label{lagrange}
t^{(0)}(\lambda) =  (\lambda + \sum_i \lambda_i) \prod_{i=1}^n (\lambda - \lambda_i), \quad t^{(1)}(\lambda) =   \sum_i  \prod_{j\neq i} {\lambda-\lambda_j\over \lambda_i -\lambda_j}  \;(\mu_i + \mu_i^{-1})  \label{lagrangebis}

\label{relation1} \hat{G}[\vec{r}_1, \vec{r}_2; E] = \hat{G}_V[\vec{r}_1, \vec{r}_2; E] - \hat{v}(E) \hat{G}_V[\vec{r}_1, \vec{0}; E] \hat{G}[\vec{0}, \vec{r}_2; E].
\label{fixed-e1} \hat{G}[\vec{r}_1, \vec{r}_2; E] = \hat{G}_V[\vec{r}_1, \vec{r}_2; E] - \frac{\hat{G}_V[\vec{r}_1, \vec{0}; E] \hat{G}_V[\vec{0}, \vec{r}_2; E]}        {\frac{1}{\hat{v}(E)} + \hat{G}_V[\vec{0}, \vec{0}; E]}.
\label{free1} \hat{G}_V[x, y; E] \equiv \hat{G}_F[x, y; E] =  \frac{e^{-\sqrt{2E} |x - y|}}{\sqrt{2E}}
\label{fixed-e2} \hat{G}[x, y; E] = \frac{e^{-\sqrt{2E} |x - y|}}{\sqrt{2E}} -  \frac{\hat{v}(E)}{\sqrt{2E} ( \sqrt{2E} + \hat{v}(E) )} e^{-\sqrt{2E} (|x| + |y|)}.
\label{error} Erfc(z) \equiv \frac{2}{\sqrt{\pi}}  \int_z^{\infty} e^{-t^2} dt.
\label{eucli1} G[x, y; t] = G_0[x, y; t] - \hat{v} \int_0^{\infty} dz e^{-\hat{v} z} G_0[|x|, -|y|-|z|; t]
\label{free2} G_0[x, y; t] = \frac{1}{\sqrt{2 \pi t}} e^{-\frac{(x - y)^2}{2 t}}.
\label{fixed-e3} \hat{G}[x, y; E] = \frac{e^{-\sqrt{2E} |x - y|}}{\sqrt{2E}} - \frac{1}{\sqrt{2}} \frac{1}{\sqrt{E} + \frac{\sqrt{2}}{\alpha}} e^{-\sqrt{2E} (|x| + |y|)}.
\label{boundary2} \frac{\partial \hat{G}}{\partial x} [0^+, y; E] -  \frac{\partial \hat{G}}{\partial x} [0^-, y; E] = 2 \hat{v}(E) \hat{G}[0, y; E].
\label{relation2} \frac{\partial G}{\partial x} [0^+, y; t] -  \frac{\partial G}{\partial x} [0^-, y; t] = 2 \int_0^t ds v(t - s)  G[0, y; s]
\label{time-coupl} v(t) = \alpha \lim_{\epsilon \rightarrow 0^+} \delta^{\prime}(t - \epsilon)
\label{boundary3} \frac{\partial G}{\partial x} [0^+, y; t] -  \frac{\partial G}{\partial x} [0^-, y; t] = 2 \alpha  \frac{\partial}{\partial t} G[0, y; t].
\label{eucli2} G[x, y; t] = G_0[x, y; t] - G_0[|x|, -|y|; t] +  \frac{2}{\alpha} \int_0^{\infty} dz e^{-\frac{2}{\alpha} z} G_0[|x|, -|y|-|z|; t]

\label{fixed-e4} \hat{G}[a, b; E] = \hat{G}_{RS}[a, b; E] +  \frac{\hat{G}_{RS}[a, R; E] \hat{G}_{RS}[R, b; E]}      {\frac{1}{\lambda E} - \hat{G}_{RS}[R, R; E]}.

\label{rev1} V(\vec{x}) = \int dt G_R(t, \vec{x}, y=0; 0, \vec{0}, 0)
\label{rev2} G_R(t, \vec{x}, y; 0, \vec{0}, 0) \equiv \int \frac{d^4 p}{(2 \pi)^4} e^{i p x} \tilde{G}_R(p, y)
\label{rev3} V(r) = \frac{1}{2 \pi^2 r} \int_0^{\infty} dp p \sin pr \tilde{G}_R(p, y=0) = \frac{1}{2\pi^2 M_5^3 r} \int_{m_0}^{\infty} dm \sin mr \hat{G}[R, R; E].
\label{rev4} V(r) = \frac{1}{\pi^2 M_5^3 R r} \int_0^{\infty} du  \sin \left( \frac{r}{R} u \right) \frac{K_2(u)}{2 K_1(u) - \frac{\lambda}{R} u K_2(u)}.
\label{rev5} K_1(u) \sim \frac{1}{u} + \frac{u}{2} \ln u, \hspace{1.0cm} K_2(u) \sim \frac{1}{u^2} - \frac{1}{2}.
\label{rev6} V(r) \sim \frac{1}{2\pi M_5^3 R \left( 2 - \frac{\lambda}{R} \right) r} \left[ 1 - \frac{2}{\pi \left(2 - \frac{\lambda}{R} \right)} \lim_{\epsilon \rightarrow 0^+} \int_0^{\infty} du u e^{-\epsilon u} \sin \left( \frac{r}{R} u \right) \ln u \right]
\label{rev7} V(r) \sim \frac{1}{2\pi M_5^3 R \left( 2 - \frac{\lambda}{R} \right) r} \left( 1 + \frac{1}{2 - \frac{\lambda}{R}} \frac{R^2}{r^2} \right).
\label{rev8} K_1(u) \sim \sqrt{\frac{\pi}{2 u}} e^{-u}              \left( 1 + \frac{3}{8 u} \right), \hspace{1.0cm} K_2(u) \sim \sqrt{\frac{\pi}{2 u}} e^{-u}             \left( 1 + \frac{15}{8 u} \right).
\label{rev9} V(r) \sim -\frac{1}{\pi^2 M_5^3 \lambda r} \left[ \frac{\pi}{2} -  \frac{\frac{2R}{\lambda}}{\frac{2R}{\lambda} - \frac{15}{8}} \left\{\frac{\pi}{2} - f\left(\frac{r}{R} \left(\frac{2R}{\lambda} -  \frac{15}{8} \right) \right) \right\} \right]
\label{rev10} V(r) \sim -\frac{1}{\pi^2 M_5^3 \lambda r} f\left(\frac{2 r}{\lambda} \right).
\label{rev11} \lim_{z \rightarrow \infty} f(z) \sim \frac{1}{z} \left( 1 - \frac{2}{z^2} \right)
\label{rev12} V(r) \sim -\frac{1}{2\pi^2 M_5^3 \lambda r^2} \left( 1 - \frac{\lambda^2}{2 r^2} \right).
\label{rev13} V(r) \sim -\frac{1}{2 \pi M_5^3 \lambda r} \left( 1 + \frac{4 r}{\pi \lambda} \ln \frac{2 r}{\lambda} \right).

\label{stringy-spectrum} F(\omega) \propto \frac{1}{(e^{\bL \omega/2} - 1)(e^{\bR \omega/2} - 1)}.

A^a =  \left\{ V^a \; m^b - m^a \; V^b \right\} \nabla_b \psi.
V^a=(1,0,0,0); \qquad m^a= (0; \vec m).
A_a = (\varphi,\vec A) =  \left( [\vec m\cdot\vec\nabla] \psi, \vec m\; \dot\psi\right),
\vec E = - \vec\nabla\left([\vec m\cdot\vec\nabla] \psi\right)  + \vec m \; \ddot \psi =  - \vec\nabla\left([\vec m\cdot\vec\nabla] \psi\right) + \vec m \; \nabla^2 \psi = \vec\nabla\times(\vec\nabla\times[\vec m\; \psi]),
\vec B = \vec\nabla\times(\vec m\; \dot\psi) =  - \vec m \times \vec \nabla \dot\psi.
\rho = {1\over2} [\vec E^2+\vec B^2]; \qquad \vec S = \vec E \times \vec B.
m_i \; m_j \to {1\over3} \delta_{ij}.
{\mathcal E} = \oint \d^3 x \; \rho =  {1\over3} \oint \d^3 x \left\{  (\nabla^2 \psi)^2 + (\vec  \nabla\dot\psi)\cdot(\vec  \nabla\dot\psi) \right\}, \label{E:energy1}
\vec \wp = \oint \d^3 x \; \vec S = \oint \d^3 x \; \left[\vec\nabla\times(\vec\nabla\times[\vec m\; \psi])\right]  \times \left[ \vec\nabla\times(\vec m\; \dot\psi) \right].
\vec \wp = \oint \d^3 x \left\{  (\vec m\; \dot\psi) \cdot \nabla^2 (\vec\nabla\times[\vec m\; \psi]) \right\} = -\oint \d^3 x \left\{  \dot\psi \vec m \cdot [\vec m \times \vec\nabla (\nabla^2  \psi)]  \right\} = 0,
\oint \d^4 x \; {1\over2} \left[ \vec E^2 - \vec B^2 \right]  =  {1\over3} \oint \d^3 x \left\{  (\nabla^2 \psi)^2 - (\vec  \nabla\dot\psi)\cdot(\vec  \nabla\dot\psi)  \right\} = 0.
\psi(r,t) = {1\over r} \left[ f(r+t) - f(r-t) \right].
{\mathcal E}  = {1\over3} \oint \d^3 x \left\{  \partial_t^2 \psi \; \partial_t^2 \psi  - \partial_t\psi \; \partial_t^3 \psi \right\}.
{\mathcal E} = {1\over3} \oint \d^3 x \left\{  \psi \; \partial_t^4 \psi - \partial_t\psi \; \partial_t^3 \psi \right\}.
{\mathcal E}_{1,2} = {1\over2} \;{\phi_0^2\over a}.
P^a_{1,2}  = {1\over2}\; {\phi_0^2\over a} \;\; V^a  =  {1\over2}\; {\phi_0^2\over a^2} \;\; \zeta^a.
\psi = (\nabla^2)^{-1/2} \; \phi_{1,2} =  {1\over\Gamma(-1/2)} \int_0^\infty {\d t\over t^{3/2}}  \exp[-t \nabla^2] \; \phi_{1,2}.

\zeta^a = (a,0,0,a),
\phi(x) =  - {\psi_0 \over [t-ia]^2 - x^2-y^2-[z-ia]^2 }.

\label{eta-square-0}       \begin{split}    \sum_{-|x|<y\leq |x|\atop (x,y)\equiv ({1\over 6},0) {\rm     or } ({1\over 3},\half) {\rm mod}\Z^2} {\rm sign}(x)~     q^{3x^2 -y^2}  &= \sum_{j \geq 0\atop       |l|\leq j/2} (-1)^{j+l} q^{(3(2j+1)^2-(6l+1)^2)/24}\\   &= \eta(\tau)^2
c_{0,0}= c_{1,1} = c_{1,-1}= {1\over\eta(\tau)}, \qquad c_{0,1}= c_{1,0}= 0.
\label{1^6-char}   \begin{array}{lll} A := {\rm ch}_{0,0}^{\rm NS}(y,q) = {1\over \eta} \theta_{0,3}({\tau\over 2}, {z\over 3}) &= {1\over \eta} \sum_\Z q^{{3\over 2} n^2} y^n &= {1\over \eta} ~\th_3(z|3\tau) \\ B := {\rm ch}_{1,1}^{\rm NS}(y,q) = {1\over \eta}  \theta_{2,3}({\tau\over 2}, {z\over 3}) &= {1\over \eta} \sum_\Z q^{{3\over 2} (n+{1\over 3})^2} y^{n+{1\over 3}} &= {1\over   \eta} q^{1/6} y^{1/3}~ \th_3(z+\tau |3\tau)\\   C := {\rm ch}_{1,-1}^{\rm NS}(y,q) = {1\over \eta}  \theta_{4,3}({\tau\over 2}, {z\over 3}) &= {1\over \eta} \sum_\Z q^{{3\over 2} (n+{2\over 3})^2} y^{n+{2\over 3}} &= {1\over   \eta} q^{2/3} y^{2/3}~\th_3(z+2\tau |3\tau) \\ &&= {1\over \eta}q^{1/6} y^{-1/3}~ \th_3(z-\tau |3\tau)   \end{array}
\begin{array}{l}   \theta_{m,3}({\tau\over 2}, {z\over 3})   \stackrel{z\to z+{\tau\over 2}}{\longrightarrow} q^{-1/24}   y^{-1/6} ~\theta_{m+1,3}({\tau\over 2}, {z\over 3})   \stackrel{z\to z+{\tau\over 2}}{\longrightarrow} q^{-1/6}   y^{-1/3} ~\theta_{m+2,3}({\tau\over 2}, {z\over 3}),   \end{array}
A~~ \stackrel{z\to z+\tau}{\longrightarrow} ~~~B \to C \to A,
\label{1^6-orbits}   \begin{split} {\rm NS}_1 &= A^6 + B^6 +C^6 \\ {\rm NS}_2 &= A^3 B^3 + B^3 C^3 + C^3 A^3 \\ {\rm NS}_3 &= A^2 B^2 C^2 \\ {\rm NS}_4 &= A^4 B C + B^4 CA + C^4 A B .
\label{S_ij}   {\rm NS}_i = -\sum_j S_{ij}~{\rm NS}_j \Big(-{1\over\tau},{z\over\tau}\Big) ~e^{-2\pi i~z^2/\tau}, \qquad S_{ij} = {1\over 27} \left(  \begin{array}{rrrr} 3 & 60 & 270 & 90 \\ 3 & -21 & 27 & 9 \\ 1 & 2 & 9 & -6 \\ 3 & 6 & -54 & 9 \end{array}   \right)
\label{NS-special}   \begin{array}{lll} {\rm NS}_1 &= 2 q^{-1/4} &= \hat{\rm ch}_0^{\rm NS}(z={1+\tau\over 2}) \\ {\rm NS}_2 &= -  q^{-1/4}&= \hat{\rm ch}_{\half}^{\rm NS}(z={1+\tau\over 2}) \\ {\rm NS}_3 &= 0&\\ {\rm NS}_4 &= 0,&       \end{array}
{\rm NS}_3 &= A^2 B^2 C^2 = {q^{2/3} \over \eta^6} \big( \th_3(z|3\tau) ~\th_3(z+\tau|3\tau) ~\th_3(z-\tau|3\tau) \big)^2 \\ &= {q^{2/3} \over \eta^6} \left( \th_3(z|\tau) ~\prod {(1-q^{3n})^3   \over (1-q^n)} \right)^2 \\  &={\eta(3\tau)^6 \over \eta^8} ~\th_3(z|\tau)^2  \\ & \stackrel{!}{=} F_3~ {\rm ch}_0^{\rm NS} = F_3~q^{-1/8} ~{\th_3(z|\tau)^2   \over \eta^3}
{\rm NS}_4 &= ABC(A^3 + B^3 + C^3) \\ &=  {\eta(3\tau)^3   \over \eta^4}  \th_3(z|\tau) ~\big[ \th_3(z|3\tau)^3 + q^{1/2} y~ \th_3(z+\tau|3\tau)^3  + q^{2/3} y^{2/3} \th_3(z+2\tau|3\tau)^3 \big]\\ & \stackrel{!}{=} F_4~ {\rm ch}(h=0) = F_4~q^{-1/8} {\th_3(z|\tau)^2   \over \eta^3} .
a(\tau) &:={1\over\eta}~\sum_\Z (-1)^n (6n+1) ~q^{(6n+1)^2 /24}\\       &= \sum_{k,l\in\Z} q^{k^2+kl+l^2}.
\label{1^6-dirac-index}   \sum_{i=1}^d D_i {\rm NS}_i I_i = -2 ~{\rm NS}_1 +20 ~{\rm   NS}_2 = -24 ~{\th_1(z|\tau)^2 \over \th_3^2} + 2(\th_2^4-\th_4^4)   ~{\th_3(z|\tau)^2 \over\eta^6}.
\p_z^2\big|_{z={1-\tau\over 2}} ~{\rm NS}_1  &= \p_z^2\big|_{z={1-\tau\over 2}} ~(A^6 + B^6 + C^6)   = \p_z^2\big|_{z={1-\tau\over 2}} ~(A^6 + B^6) \\ &= 6 A^4 [ A''+5A'A] +6 B^4 [B'' +5 B'B].
\begin{array}{ll}       A &= \th_3(z|3\tau)\\        A|_{z={1-\tau\over 2}} &= \th_3({1+\tau\over 2}|3\tau)\\        A'|_{z={1-\tau\over 2}} &= -\th_3'({1+\tau\over 2}|3\tau)\\        A''|_{z={1-\tau\over 2}} &=\th_3''({1+\tau\over 2}|3\tau)      \end{array}
\begin{array}{ll}        B &= q^{1/6} y^{1/3} ~\th_3(z+\tau|3\tau)\\        B|_{z={1-\tau\over 2}} &= - \th_3({1+\tau\over 2}|3\tau)\\        B'|_{z={1-\tau\over 2}} &= [-{2\pi i\over 3} \th_3           -\th_3']({1+\tau\over 2}|3\tau) \\        B''|_{z={1-\tau\over 2}} &= [ -{4\pi i\over 9} \th_3 +          {4\pi i\over 3} \th_3' + \th_3'']({1+\tau\over 2}|3\tau)      \end{array}
\begin{array}{l} \p_z^2\big|_{z={1-\tau\over 2}} ~{\rm NS}_1  = {1\over\eta^6} ~\th_3({1+\tau\over 2}|3\tau)^4 ~\big[   12~\th_3''\th_3 + 60~{\th_3'}^2 + 48 \pi i~\th_3'\th_3 - 16\pi^2   \th_3^2 \big] ({1+\tau\over 2}|3\tau).  \end{array}
\begin{array}{rl}     \p_z^2\big|_{z={1-\tau\over 2}} ~{\rm NS}_2 &= \p_z^2\big|_{z={1-\tau\over 2}} ~(A^3 B^3 +B^3 C^3 +C^3 A^3 )  = \p_z^2\big|_{z={1-\tau\over 2}} ~(A^3 B^3 )\\  &= 3 A^2 B^2 ~[AB'' +2 A'B'+ A''B] + 6AB~[AB'+A'B]^2 \\ &=  {1\over\eta^6} ~\th_3({1+\tau\over 2}|3\tau)^4 ~\big[ -6 ~\th_3 \th_3'' + 6 ~{\th_3'}^2 +4\pi^2 ~\th_3^2 \big] ({1+\tau\over 2}|3\tau).    \end{array}
\begin{array}{rl}     \p_z^2\big|_{z={1-\tau\over 2}}( -2 ~{\rm NS}_1 +20 ~{\rm NS}_2) &= -{4\over\eta^6} ~\big[  \th_3^5 ~(36 ~\th_3'' + {24\pi i} ~\th_3' -4\pi^2\th_3) -24\pi^2 ~\th_3 \big]({1+\tau\over 2}|3\tau) \\ &= 16 \pi^2 q^{-1/4} ~(6+E_2),   \end{array}
\label{eisenstein}   \begin{split}     q^{1/24} (36 ~\th_3'' + {24\pi i} ~\th_3' -4\pi^2 ~\th_3) &= -4\pi^2 \sum_\Z (-1)^n (6n+1)^2 ~q^{(6n+1)^2 /24} \\ &= -4\pi^2 {24\over2\pi i} ~\p_\tau \sum_\Z (-1)^n q^{(6n+1)^2 /24} \\ &= -4\pi^2 {24\over2\pi i} ~\p_\tau \eta \\ &= -4\pi^2 ~\eta ~E_2,
\begin{array}{llll}     \th_1'(z+{1-\tau\over 2} | \tau) &= \p_z ~q^{-1/8} y^{1/2}     ~\th_3(z) &= i\pi ~\th_1(z+{1-\tau\over 2}|\tau) + q^{-1/8} y^{1/2}     ~\th_3'(z|\tau)   &\stackrel{z=0}{\longrightarrow} -i     \pi q^{-1/8} ~\th_3 \\     \th_3'(z+{1-\tau\over 2} | \tau) &= \p_z ~-i q^{-1/8} y^{1/2}     ~\th_1(z) &= i\pi ~\th_3(z+{1-\tau\over 2}|\tau) -i q^{-1/8} y^{1/2}     ~\th_1'(z|\tau) &\stackrel{z=0}{\longrightarrow} -     2\pi i q^{-1/8} ~\eta^3,    \end{array}
\begin{array}{ll}     \th_1''({1-\tau\over 2} | \tau) &= -\pi^2 q^{-1/8} ~\th_3 +     q^{-1/8}  ~\th_3''(0|\tau) \\     \th_3''(z+{1-\tau\over 2} | \tau) &= 4\pi^2 q^{-1/8} ~\eta^3 .   \end{array}
\p_z^2\big|_{z={1-\tau\over 2}} \th_1(z|\tau)^2         &=  q^{-1/4} \th_3^2 ~[ -2 \pi^2 + \th_3'' / \th_3 ] \\      \p_z^2\big|_{z={1-\tau\over 2}} \th_3(z|\tau)^2         &=  -4 \pi^2  q^{-1/4} ~\eta^6.
\p_z^2\big|_{z={1-\tau\over 2}}\left[ -24 {\th_1(z|\tau)^2  \over \th_3^2} + 2(\th_2^4-\th_4^4) {\th_3(z|\tau)^2  \over\eta^6} \right]  =  16 \pi^2 q^{-1/4} ~(6+E_2),
\th_3(z|3\tau)^3 &+ q^{1/2} y ~\th_3(z+\tau |3\tau)^3 + q^{2} y^2     ~\th_3(z+2\tau |3\tau)^3 = a(\tau) ~\th_3(z|\tau), \\   {\rm where } ~a(\tau) &:={1\over\eta}~\sum_\Z (-1)^n (6n+1)     ~q^{(6n+1)^2 /24} = \sum_{k,l\in\Z} q^{k^2+kl+l^2}.
\begin{array}{l}    3 ~\th_3({1+\tau\over 2}|3\tau)^2 ~[-2~~\th_3' -{2\pi i \over    3}~\th_3 ]({1+\tau\over 2}|3\tau) = a(\tau)~(-2\pi i    q^{-1/8}~\eta^3)   \end{array}
a(\tau)={1\over\eta}~\sum_\Z (-1)^n (6n+1) ~q^{(6n+1)^2/24}.
{\rm lhs} = (\sum_\Z q^{{3\over 2}n^2} y^n)^3 +   (\sum_{\Z+{1\over 3}} q^{{3\over 2}n^2} y^n)^3 +   (\sum_{\Z+{2\over 3}} q^{{3\over 2}n^2} y^n)^3   = \sum_n q^{{3\over 2} (n_1^2 + n_2^2 + n_3^2)} ~y^{(n_1 + n_2 + n_3)}
\begin{array}{rl} n_1&= (k_1 +k_2 -k_3)/3 \\ n_2&= (k_1 -2 k_2 -k_3)/3 \\ n_3&= (k_1 +k_2 +2k_3)/3 \\   \end{array} \qquad   \begin{array}{rl} k_1&= n_1 +n_2 +n_3 \\ k_2&= n_1 -n_2  \\ k_3&= -n_1 +n_3 \\   \end{array}
n_1^2 + n_2^2 +n_3^2 = {1\over 3} k_1^2 + {2\over 3} (k_2^2  +k_3^2 + k_2 k_3), \qquad \quad n_1 + n_2 + n_3 = k_1
{\rm lhs} =  \left( \sum_{k_2,k_3\in\Z} q^{k_2^2+k_2 k_3+k_3^2} \right)   \sum_\Z q^{{1\over 2} k_1^2} y^{k_1}  =   {\rm rhs}
{\rm For} \quad z=0: &\quad \th_3(0|3\tau)^3 + 2q^{1/2} ~\th_3(\tau |3\tau)^3  = a(\tau) ~\th_3 \\  {\rm For} \quad z=1/2:& \quad \th_4(0|3\tau)^3 - 2q^{1/2} ~\th_3(\tau |3\tau)^3  = a(\tau) ~\th_3 \\  {\rm For} \quad z=3\tau/2: &\quad \th_2(0|3\tau)^3 + 2q^{1/4}  ~\th_2(\tau|3\tau)^3 = a(\tau) ~\th_2
\th_3(z|\tau)^3 &+ q^{1/6} y ~\th_3(z+\frac{\tau}{3} |\tau)^3  + q^{2/3}  y^2 ~\th_3(z+{2\tau\over 3} |\tau)^3 = \Big( 6{\eta     (3\tau)^3 \over\eta} +a(\tau)\Big)~\th_3(z|{\tau\over 3}), \\   a(\tau) &:={1\over\eta}~\sum_\Z (-1)^n (6n+1) ~q^{(6n+1)^2 /24}
\th_3(0|\tau)^3 +2 q^{1/6}~\th_3(\tau/3|\tau)^3 = \Big( 6{\eta     (3\tau)^3 \over\eta} +a(\tau)\Big)~\th_3(0|{\tau\over 3})
\begin{array}{rl} {i\pi \over 3} e^{{i\pi\over 6}} \eta~\th_3(z+{1+\tau\over     2}|\tau)^3 =& -\pi e^{{i\pi\over 6}} q^{-5\over 24} y^{-{3\over     2}} \eta(3\tau)^3~ \Big[ z^{1/2}~\th_3(3z+{1+\tau\over 2}|3\tau) -     z^{-1/2}~\th_3(-3z+{1+\tau\over 2}|3\tau) \Big] \\   &+ \th' ~\th_3(3z+3{1+\tau\over 2}|3\tau),   \end{array}
\th'&:= \th'[^{1/3}_{1}](0|3\tau):= \p_z|_0 ~~e^{2\pi i/3}   q^{1/6} y^{-1/3} ~\th_1(z-\tau|3\tau), \\ {\rm such ~that }\quad -{3i \over\pi} e^{-i\pi/6}{\th'   \over\eta} &= {1\over\eta}~\sum_\Z (-1)^n (6n+1) q^{(6n+1)^2   /24} \\ &= a(\tau).
\begin{array}{rl}     {\rm at } ~z=-{1+\tau\over 2}&: \quad \th_3(0|\tau)^3 = 6     q^{1/6} {\eta (3\tau)^3 \over\eta}~ \th_3(\tau|3\tau)     + a(\tau)~\th_3(0|3\tau) \\     {\rm at } ~z=-\half +{\tau\over 6}&: \quad \th_3({\tau\over 3}|\tau)^3 = 3    {\eta (3\tau)^3 \over\eta}~\Big[q^{-1/6}~\th_3(0|3\tau)     +\th_3(\tau|3\tau) \Big]  + a(\tau)~\th_3(\tau|3\tau),   \end{array}
\th_3(0|\tau)^3 +2 q^{1/6}~\th_3(\tau/3|\tau)^3 = \Big( 6{\eta     (3\tau)^3 \over\eta} +a(\tau)\Big)~ \Big[\th_3(0|3\tau) +     2 q^{1/6}~\th_3(\tau|3\tau)\Big]
a(\tau/3) =  6{\eta (3\tau)^3 \over\eta} + a(\tau).
a(\tau) &= {q^{1\over 24} \over\eta} \p_y|_1 ~\sum_\Z     (-1)^n y^{6n+1} q^{n(3n+1)/2} \\ &= {q^{1\over 24} \over\eta} \p_y|_1 ~     y~\th_3(6z+{1+\tau\over 2}|3\tau)  \\ &= {q^{1\over 24} \over\eta} \p_y|_1 ~ y~\prod     (1-q^{3n})(1-y^{6n}q^{3n-1})(1-y^{-6n}q^{3n-2}) \\ &= 1+ 6 \sum_{n\geq 1} \left( {-q^{3n-1} \over 1-q^{3n-1}}+     {q^{3n-2} \over 1-q^{3n-2}} \right)\\ &= 1+6\sum q^n \Big(\sum_{d|n \atop d\equiv 1 (3)} 1 - \sum_{d|n     \atop d\equiv 2 (3)} 1 \Big) \\ &= 1+6\sum \delta_{3,1}(n)~q^n,
a(\tau)= \th_3(0|2\tau)~\th_3(0|6\tau)+   \th_2(0|2\tau)~\th_2(0|6\tau).
2 a(\tau)^2  = 3 E_2(3\tau) -  E_2.
E_2 &={1\over\eta}~ \sum_\Z (-1)^n (6n+1)^2 ~q^{(6n+1)^2 /24}\\     &= {q^{1/24}\over\eta}~{-1\over 4 \pi^2}~\p_z^2|_0     ~\sum(-1)^n y^{6n+1} q^{n(3n+1)/2}\\     &= {q^{1/24}\over\eta}~{-1\over 4 \pi^2}~\p_z^2|_0     ~y~\th_3(6z+{1+\tau\over 2}|3\tau) \\  &= {q^{1/24}\over\eta}~{-1\over 4 \pi^2}~\p_z^2|_0     ~y~\prod  (1-q^{3n})(1-y^{6n}q^{3n-1})(1-y^{-6n}q^{3n-2})
E_2 &= \Big[ 1+{1\over i\pi}~\Sigma -{1\over     4\pi^2}(\Sigma^2+\Sigma') \Big]_0 \\   &= 1+2(a-1) +(a-1)^2 -36~\sum_{n\geq 1} \left( {q^{3n-1} \over     (1-q^{3n-1})^2} + {q^{3n-2} \over (1-q^{3n-2})^2} \right)\\   &= a^2 +{3\over 2} \big[ E_2 -E_2(3\tau)\big].
{1\over\eta}~ \sum_\Z (-1)^n (6n+1)^3 ~q^{(6n+1)^2 /24}      &= a^3 + {3a\over (2\pi i)^2} \Sigma'|_0 +{1\over (2\pi       i)^3} \Sigma''|_0 \\  &=  a^3 + 3a~{3\over 2} (E_2 -E_2(3\tau))+{1\over (2\pi       i)^3} \Sigma''|_0 ,
\Sigma''|_0 =(2\pi i)^3 6^3 ~\sum_{n\geq 1} \left( -{q^{3n-1}(1+q^{3n-1}) \over (1-q^{3n-1})^3} + {q^{3n-2}(1+q^{3n-2})   \over (1-q^{3n-2})^3} \right)  = (2\pi i)^3 6^3 ~\sum_{i\geq 1} i^2 ~{q^i(1-q^i) \over 1-q^{3i}}
{1\over\eta}~ \sum_\Z (-1)^n (6n+1)^4 ~q^{(6n+1)^2 /24}      &= a^4 + {6a^2 \over (2\pi i)^2} \Sigma'|_0 +{4a\over (2\pi       i)^3} \Sigma''|_0 + {3 \over (2\pi i)^4} {\Sigma'}|_0^2 + {1 \over (2\pi i)^4} \Sigma'''|_0\\      &=  {1\over\eta}~ \left( {24\over 2\pi i} \p_\tau \right)^2     \eta = 3 E_2^2 - 2 E_4.
{1\over\eta}~ \sum_\Z (-1)^n (6n+1)^6 ~q^{(6n+1)^2 /24}      = 16 E_6 - 30 E_2 E_4 + 15 E_2^3 .
c_{00}=c_{22}, \qquad c_{20}=c_{02} \qquad c_{1,-1}=c_{11}.
\begin{array}{l}   \theta_{m,8} ({\tau\over 2}, {z\over 4}) = \sum_{n\in\Z}   q^{(2n+{m\over 8})^2} ~y^{2n+{m\over 8}} = q^{({m\over 8})^2}   ~y^{m\over 8} ~\th_3(2z+{m\tau\over 2}| 8\tau),\\    \theta_m +  \theta_{m+8} = q^{({m\over 8})^2} y^{m\over 8}   ~\th_3(z+{m\tau\over 4} |2\tau).   \end{array}
\begin{array}{l}   \theta_{m,8}({\tau\over 2}, {z\over 4})   \stackrel{z\to z+{\tau\over 2}}{\longrightarrow} q^{-1/6}   y^{-1/4} ~\theta_{m+2,8}({\tau\over 2}, {z\over 4})   \stackrel{z\to z+{\tau\over 2}}{\longrightarrow} q^{-1/4}   y^{-1/2} ~\theta_{m+4,8}({\tau\over 2}, {z\over 4}),   \end{array}
A \stackrel{z\to z+\tau}{\longrightarrow} B \to C   \to D \to A~,  \qquad \qquad E \to F \to E,
\begin{array}{rllrl} {\rm NS}_1 &= A^4 + B^4 +C^4 +D^4 & \qquad & {\rm NS}_7 &= AB^2C +BC^2D +CD^2A +DA^2B  \\ {\rm NS}_2 &= E^4 +F^4  & \qquad & {\rm NS}_8 &= ABCD  \\ {\rm NS}_3 &= A^2 B^2 + B^2 C^2 + C^2 D^2 + D^2 A^2 & \qquad &  {\rm NS}_9 &= ABE^2 +BCF^2 +CDE^2+DAF^2\\ {\rm NS}_4 &= ABF^2 +BCE^2 +CDF^2 +ADE^2  & \qquad & {\rm NS}_{10} &= (A^2 +B^2 +C^2 +D^2)EF  \\ {\rm NS}_5 &= B^2 D^2 + A^2 C^2  & \qquad & {\rm NS}_{11} &= E^2 F^2  \\ {\rm NS}_6 &= AC^3 +BD^3 +CA^3 +BD^3   & \qquad & {\rm NS}_{12} &= (AC + BD) EF \\   \end{array}
\label{three-relations}   \begin{array}{rl} AC &= BD \\ AB + CD &= F^2 \\ AD + BC &= E^2,   \end{array}
\begin{array}{rl}   {\rm NS}_2 &= {\rm NS}_4 \\    {\rm NS}_5 &= 2~{\rm NS}_8 \\    {\rm NS}_6 &=  {\rm NS}_7 = \half {\rm NS}_9 = {\rm NS}_{11}.   \end{array}
c_{11} = {\eta(2\tau)\over\eta^2}   ={1\over\eta}{\sqrt{{\th_2\over 2\eta}}} , \qquad \qquad   c_{00} -c_{02} = {\eta(\tau/2) \over\eta^2} =   {1\over\eta}{\sqrt{{\th_4\over \eta}}}
&= {1\over\eta}{\sqrt{{\th_3\over\eta}}} =     {\eta\over\eta(2\tau) ~\eta(\tau/2)}      = {q^{-1/16}\over \th(\tau) -q^{1/2}~\th(3\tau) } \\     c_{00} - c_{02} &= {1\over\eta}{\sqrt{{\th_4\over\eta}}} =     {\eta(\tau/2) \over\eta^2}       = {q^{-1/16}\over \th(\tau) +q^{1/2}~\th(3\tau) }
&= q^{-{1\over 16}} { \th(\tau) \over \th(\tau)^2 -q~\th(3\tau)^2}         =q^{{1\over 16}} { \th(\tau) \over \eta ~\eta(2\tau)} \\     c_{02} &= q^{-{1\over16}} { q^{1\over 2} ~\th(3\tau) \over         \th(\tau)^2 -q~\th(3\tau)^2}          =q^{{1\over 16}} { q^{1\over 2} ~\th(3\tau) \over \eta ~\eta(2\tau)}
^2 &= {1\over \eta ~\eta(2\tau)} ={ q^{-{1\over      8}} \over \th(\tau)^2 -q~\th(3\tau)^2} \\       c_{00}~ c_{02} &= q^{5\over 8} {\th(\tau)~\th(3\tau) \over      \eta^2 ~\eta(2\tau)^2} = {\eta(8\tau)^2 \over \eta^3 ~\eta(4\tau)}
\label{NS-special-bis}   \begin{array}{lll} A = c_{00}~\th(\tau) +c_{02}~(-q^{3/2})~\th(5\tau) &=q^{-1/16}\\  C = c_{02}~\th(\tau) +c_{00}~(-q^{3/2})~\th(5\tau)&= 0\\  B = -i \big[c_{02}~\th(\tau) -c_{00} ~q^{1/2}~\th(3\tau) \big] &= 0\\  D = -i \big[c_{02}~\th(\tau) -c_{00}~q^{1/2}~\th(3\tau) \big] &=-i~q^{-1/16}\\  E = {\eta(2\tau)\over\eta^2} ~q^{-{1\over 16}} e^{-i\pi /4} ~\th_3(\half|2\tau) &=  e^{-i\pi /4} q^{-1/16} \\  F = {\eta(2\tau)\over\eta^2} ~q^{3\over 16} e^{-i\pi /4} ~\th_3(\half+\tau|2\tau) &= 0   \end{array}
\begin{array}{rl} A+C &= {1\over \eta} \sqrt{\th_3\over\eta} ~\th_3(0|2\tau)      = {\eta(2\tau)^4 \over\eta~\eta(4\tau)^2 ~\eta(\tau/2)}     = E^2/B \\ A-C &= {1\over \eta} \sqrt{\th_3\over\eta} ~\th_4(0|2\tau)      = {\eta(\tau/2) \over\eta(2\tau)}= 1/E \\ B = D &=  {1\over \eta} \sqrt{\th_3\over\eta} ~\th_2(0|2\tau)  = {\eta   ~\eta(4\tau)^2 \over \eta(\tau/2) ~\eta(2\tau)^2 } \\ E = F &= {\eta(2\tau) \over \eta(\tau/2)} = \sqrt{\half {\th_2\over\th_4}}   \end{array}
\begin{array}{l} {\rm NS}_5 = 2 {\rm NS}_8 = 2 B^4 \\ {\rm NS}_6 ={\rm NS}_7 = \half {\rm NS}_9 ={\rm NS}_{11} = E^4 \\ {\rm NS}_{10} = E^6/B^2 = {\rm NS}_{12} ~{\rm NS}_6 / {\rm NS}_5 \\ {\rm NS}_{12} = 2 B^2 E^2    \end{array}
\begin{array}{l} F_5 = 2 F_8 =  2q^{1/8} {\eta(4\tau)^8 \over \eta^3 ~\eta(2\tau)^4 } \\ F_6 = F_{7} = \half F_9 =F_{11} = q^{1/8} {\eta(2\tau)^8 \over \eta^7} \\ F_{10} =  q^{1/8} {\eta(2\tau)^{14} \over \eta^9 ~\eta(4\tau)^4}\\ F_{12} = 2q^{1/8} { \eta(2\tau)^2 ~\eta(4\tau)^4 \over \eta^5 }\\ F_5  F_{10} = F_6 F_{12}   \end{array}
(A^2 + C^2)  &= (A-C)^2 +2B^2 =1/E^2 + 2B^2 \\        &= (A+C)^2 -2B^2 = E^4/B^2 - 2B^2 \\ \Rightarrow & E^6 =B^2 + 4 B^4 E^2
1/E^2 + 2B^2 &= 2 {\th_4 \over \th_2} + {\th_2(0|2\tau)^2     \over \th_2 ~\th_4} = {2\th_4^2 +\th_2(0|2\tau)^2     \over \th_2 ~\th_4} =  {3\th_4^2 + \th_3^2  \over 2~\th_2 ~\th_4}
\begin{array}{ll} {\rm NS}_1 &= (A^2 +C^2)^2 = (1/E^2 + 2B^2)^2 = \left( {3\th_4^2   +\th_3^2  \over 2~\th_2 ~\th_4} \right)^2 \\ {\rm NS}_2 = {\rm NS}_4 &= 2 ~E^4 \\ {\rm NS}_3 &= (3~\th_4^2 +\th_3^2) ~{\th_3^2 ~\th_2(0|2\tau)^2   \over 8 \eta^6} = (3~\th_4^2 +\th_3^2) ~{\th_3^2 -\th_4^2   \over 4~\th_2^2~\th_4^2} =  (3~\th_4^2 +\th_3^2)~ {\eta   ~\eta(4\tau) \over  2~\eta(\tau/2) ~\eta(2\tau)}\\  {\rm NS}_3^2 &= 2 ~{\rm NS}_1 {\rm NS}_5   \end{array}
\begin{array}{l} F_1 = q^{1/8} ~\eta \Big[ \left( {3~\th_4^2 +\th_3^2  \over      4~\eta^2 }\right)^2  + 2~h_3 \Big] -1 \\ F_2 = q^{1/8} ~\eta \Big[ 2 \left( {\eta(2\tau) \over      \eta } \right)^8 -h_3  \Big]  = 2 ~F_6 - q^{1/8} ~\eta ~h_3 \\ F_3 =  q^{1/8} ~\eta \Big[ (3~\th_4^2 +\th_3^2) {\eta(4\tau)^4 \over      2~\eta^4 ~\eta(2\tau)^2 } -h_3 \Big] \\ F_4 = F_2 \end{array}
\label{2^4-dirac-index}   \sum_{i=1}^d D_i {\rm NS}_i I_i = -2 ~{\rm NS}_1 +2 ~{\rm   NS}_2 + 6~{\rm NS}_3 +12~ {\rm NS}_4 = -24 ~{\th_1(z|\tau)^2 \over   \th_3^2} + 2(\th_2^4-\th_4^4)   ~{\th_3(z|\tau)^2 \over\eta^6}.
{\rm lhs}|_0 = {1\over 2~\th_2^2 ~\th_4^2} \Big[ -(3~\th_4^2+\th_2^2)^2 +(2+12)~ \th_2^4 +6(3~\th_4^2+\th_3^2) \half (\th_3^2-\th_4^2) \Big]
\begin{array}{l}  \th_4(0|{\tau\over 2}) ~\big( \th_1(z|\tau)^2 + \th_4(z|\tau)^2 \big)  = \th_3(0|{\tau\over 2}) ~\big( \th_3(z|\tau)^2 - \th_2(z|\tau)^2 \big)  = \th_3(0|{\tau\over 2}) ~\th_3({z\over 2}|{\tau\over 4}) \th_4({z\over 2}|{\tau\over 4}) \\   \th_3(0|{\tau\over 2}) ~\th_2(z|\tau) \th_3(z|\tau)  + \th_4(0|{\tau\over 2}) ~i \th_1(z|\tau) \th_4(z|\tau)  = \th_2(0|{\tau\over 2}) ~q^{1\over 16} y^{-\half}~ \th_3(z-{\tau\over 4}|\tau)^2 \\   \th_3(0|{\tau\over 2}) ~\th_2(z|\tau) \th_3(z|\tau)  - \th_4(0|{\tau\over 2}) ~i \th_1(z|\tau) \th_4(z|\tau)  = \th_2(0|{\tau\over 2}) ~q^{1\over 16} y^\half ~ \th_3(z+{\tau\over 4}|\tau)^2    \end{array}
   {4\over (c_{00} +c_{02})^2}~(AC-B^2) =  \underbrace{\th_3(0|2\tau)^2 -    \th_2(0|2\tau)^2}_{\th_4^2 ~{\rm by}~(\ref{easy4})}  -\left(    {\eta(\tau/2)^2 \eta(2\tau)  \over\eta^3} \right)^2    {\underbrace{\th_4(0|2\tau)}_{\eta^2/\eta(2\tau)}}^2 = 0 . 
c_{00}=c_{44}, \qquad c_{02}=c_{42}, \qquad c_{04}=c_{40}, \qquad   c_{20}=c_{24},  \qquad c_{22}, \qquad c_{11}=c_{33}, \qquad c_{13}=c_{31}.

= {\eta_{12}^2 \over \eta^2 ~\eta_{6}}, \qquad \qquad   c_{00} -c_{04} &= {1 \over \eta_{2}}, \qquad \qquad    c_{11} +c_{13} = {1 \over \eta_{1/2}}, \\   c_{00} +c_{04} -2c_{02} + 2c_{20} -2c_{22} &= {\eta_{1/12}^2 \over     \eta^2 ~\eta_{1/6}}
-\big(c_{00} +c_{04} +2c_{02} + 2c_{20} +2c_{22}\big) =    -{\eta_{1/6}^5 \over \eta^2~ \eta_{1/12}^2 ~\eta_{1/3}^2}, \qquad    {\rm since} \quad \eta_{1/2} \stackrel{T}{\longrightarrow} {\eta^3 \over \eta_{1/2} ~\eta_{2} } ~e^{i\pi /24}.
\begin{array}{rl}     c_{00} &\stackrel{S}{\longrightarrow} ~{1\over     2\sqrt{6}}\sqrt{i\over\tau}\big( c_{00} +c_{04} +2 c_{02} +     2c_{20} +2c_{22} + 2\sqrt{3}(c_{11} +c_{13}) \big) \\     c_{04} &\stackrel{S}{\longrightarrow} ~{1\over     2\sqrt{6}}\sqrt{i\over\tau}\big( c_{00} +c_{04} +2 c_{02} +     2c_{20} +2c_{22} - 2\sqrt{3}(c_{11} +c_{13}) \big) \\     c_{02} &\stackrel{S}{\longrightarrow} ~{1\over     2\sqrt{6}}\sqrt{i\over\tau}\big( c_{00} +c_{04} -2 c_{02} +     2c_{20} -2c_{22} \big) \\     c_{20} &\stackrel{S}{\longrightarrow} ~{1\over     2\sqrt{6}}\sqrt{i\over\tau}\big( 2c_{00} +2c_{04} +4c_{02} -     2c_{20} -2c_{22} \big) \\     c_{00} &\stackrel{S}{\longrightarrow} ~{1\over     2\sqrt{6}}\sqrt{i\over\tau}\big( 2c_{00} +2c_{04} -4c_{02} -     2c_{20} +2c_{22} \big),   \end{array}

&= {\eta_{6}^5 \over \eta^2 ~\eta_{12}^2      ~\eta_{3}^2 } = {\th_3(0|6\tau)\over \eta^2} \\      c_{00} -c_{04} &= {1 \over \eta_{2}} =      {\th_4(0|2\tau)\over \eta^2}\\      c_{02} &=  {\eta_{12}^2 \over \eta^2 ~\eta_{6}} =      {\th_2(0|6\tau)\over 2\eta^2}\\

\begin{array}{rll} \theta_m + \theta_{m+24} &= \sum q^{3(n+{m\over 24})^2} y^{2(n+{m\over 24})}     &= q^{({m\over 8})^2/3} y^{m\over 12} ~\th_3(2z+{m\tau\over 4}|6\tau) \\ \theta_m - \theta_{m+24} &= \sum (-1)^n q^{3(n+{m\over 24})^2} y^{2(n+{m\over 24})}     &= q^{({m\over 8})^2/3} y^{m\over 12} ~\th_4(2z+{m\tau\over 4}|6\tau) \\ \theta_m + \theta_{m+12} + \theta_{m+24} + \theta_{m+36}  &=  \sum q^{{3\over 4}(n+{m\over 12})^2} y^{n+{m\over 12}}  &= q^{({m\over 8})^2/3} y^{m\over 12} ~\th_3(z+{m\tau\over   8})|{3\tau\over 2}) \\  \theta_m - \theta_{m+12} + \theta_{m+24} - \theta_{m+36}  &=  \sum (-1)^n q^{{3\over 4}(n+{m\over 12})^2} y^{n+{m\over 12}}  &= q^{({m\over 8})^2/3} y^{m\over 12} ~\th_4(z+{m\tau\over   8})|{3\tau\over 2})\\   \end{array}

\label{1^6-4^3}   \begin{array}{rll} A+D &= 2 c_{02} ~\th_2(2z|6\tau) +(c_{00}+c_{04}) ~\th_3(2z|6\tau) = {1\over \eta^2} \th_3(z|3\tau)^2 &= A^2{ }_{[1^6 ~{\rm theory}]} \\ B+E &= {q^{1/3} y^{2/3}\over \eta^2} \th_3 (z+\tau|3\tau)^2 &= B^2{ }_{[1^6 ~{\rm theory}]} \\ C+F &= {q^{4/3} y^{4/3}\over \eta^2} \th_3 (z+2\tau|3\tau)^2 &= C^2{ }_{[1^6 ~{\rm theory}]} \\ G &= c_{22} ~q^{1\over 12} y^{1\over 3} ~\th_3(2z+\tau|6\tau) +   c_{20} ~q^{1\over 12} y^{1\over 3} ~\th_2(2z+\tau|6\tau) & \\ &= {q^{1/6} y^{1/3} \over \eta^2} ~\th_3(z|3\tau)~\th_3(z+\tau|3\tau) &= AB_{[1^6 ~{\rm theory}]} \\ H &= {q^{5/6} y \over \eta^2} ~\th_3(z+\tau|3\tau)~\th_3(z+2\tau|3\tau) &= BC_{[1^6 ~{\rm theory}]} \\ I &= {q^{2/3} y^{2/3} \over \eta^2} ~\th_3(z|3\tau)~\th_3(z+2\tau|3\tau) &= AC_{[1^6 ~{\rm theory}]},   \end{array}

\begin{array}{rl} A &= {1\over 2\eta^2}\Big[ \th_2(0|6\tau) (\theta_{-12} +  \theta_{12}) + \th_3(0|6\tau) (\theta_{0} + \theta_{24}) +    \th_4(0|2\tau) (\theta_{0} -\theta_{24})\Big]\\    &= {1\over 2\eta^2}\Big[ \th_2(0|6\tau)  (-q^{1/4})\th_3(2\tau|6\tau)  +\th_3(0|6\tau)~\th_3(\tau|6\tau)  +\underbrace{\th_4(0|2\tau)~\th_4(\tau|6\tau)}_{q^{-1/12}~\eta^2} \Big] = q^{-1/12} \\ B &= C= D = E = 0\\ F &= e^{-2\pi i/3} ~q^{-1/12}\\ G &= {q^{1/12}\over \eta^2} \th_3(\tau|6\tau) ~(\theta_{-20} +  \theta_{4}) + {q^{1/3}\over \eta^2} \th_3(2\tau|6\tau) ~(\theta_{-8} +  \theta_{16}) = 0 \\ H &= 0 \\ I &=  e^{-2\pi i/6} ~q^{-1/12}\\   \end{array}

\label{ghDSEs1}    \frac{Z_3}{Z_\lambda \lambda} \,  \langle \,       \partial A^a_x \, \partial A^b_y \, \rangle \, = \,          \widetilde Z_3 \,  \langle  \, i (\partial D_r c)^a_x \, \bar c^b_y\,   \rangle  \;.

\label{ghDSEs2}    \frac{Z_3}{Z_\lambda \lambda} \,  \langle \,       \partial A^a_x \, \partial A^b_y \, \rangle \, = \,   \widetilde Z_3 \,        \frac{1}{2} \, \Big( \langle  \, i (\partial D_r c)^a_x \, \bar c^b_y\,   \rangle \,  + \,  \langle  \,  c^b_y\,  i(\partial D_r \bar c)^a_x \,   \rangle \Big) \, - \,  i\widetilde Z_1 \,\frac{1}{2} \, (1-\alpha )  \, \langle \, \partial       A^a_x \,       (\bar c \times c )^b_y \, \rangle \;.
\label{auxSTI}   \widetilde Z_1 \,\frac{1}{2} \, \, \langle \, \partial       A^a_x \, (\bar c \times c )^b_y \, \rangle  \, = \,    \widetilde Z_3 \,        \frac{i}{2} \, \Big( \langle  \, i (\partial D_r c)^a_x \, \bar c^b_y\,   \rangle \,  - \,  \langle  \,  c^b_y\,  i(\partial D_r \bar c)^a_x \,   \rangle \Big) \;.
\label{ghDSEs3}    \frac{Z_3}{Z_\lambda \lambda} \,  \langle \,       \partial A^a_x \, \partial A^b_y \, \rangle \, = \,   \widetilde Z_3 \,         \Big( (1-\frac \alpha 2) \, \langle  \, i (\partial D_r c)^a_x \,  	\bar c^b_y\,   \rangle \,  + \, \frac \alpha 2 \,  \langle  \,  c^b_y\,     i(\partial D_r \bar c)^a_x \,   \rangle \Big)  \;.

\hspace{4cm}+\left.  \left[  \frac{\delta V_{c}\left[  \phi(\vec{x}),t\right] }{\delta\phi(\vec{x})}+\frac{\delta V_{nc}\left[  \phi(\vec{x}),t\right] }{\delta\phi(\vec{x})}+\frac{\delta Q_{K}\left[  \phi(\vec{x}),t\right] }{\delta\phi(\vec{x})}\right]  \right|  _{\phi(\vec{x})=\phi(\vec{x} ,t)}=0.\label{9}

Q_{I}=\operatorname{Re}\left(  \frac{V\left(  x^{i}+\frac{i\theta^{ij}} {2}\partial_{j}\right)  \Psi}{\Psi}\right)  -V\left(  x^{i}-\frac{\theta ^{ij}\partial_{j}S}{2\hbar}\right)  .\label{18}

\label{eq:lagrangian} \mathcal{L}=-\frac{1}{4\pi\alpha'} G_{\mu\nu} \left(             h^{\tau\tau} \dot Z^\mu \dot Z^\nu +             2 h^{\tau\sigma} \dot Z^\mu Z^{\nu\prime} +             h^{\sigma\!\sigma} Z^{\mu\prime} Z^{\nu\prime}             \right) 
\label{eq:canon-momenta} \pi_\mu = \frac{\delta\mathcal{L}}{\delta \dot Z^\mu} =           -\frac{1}{2\pi\alpha'}G_{\mu\nu} \left(           h^{\tau\tau} \dot Z^\nu + h^{\tau\sigma} Z^{\nu\prime}           \right) \ ,

\label{eq:LC Lagrangian}     \mathcal{L}_{LC}=-\frac{h^{\tau\tau}}{4\pi\alpha'} \left(     2 G_{+-} \dot Z^- +  G_{ij} \dot Z^i \dot Z^j -     \frac{1}{(h^{\tau\tau})^2} G_{ij} Z^{i\,\prime} Z^{j\,\prime}     \right)
\label{eq:LC Hamiltonian}     H_{LC} = \int_0^l \mathcal{H}_{LC} =     \int_0^l d\sigma \, \frac{G_{+-}}{2 \,\pi_-}     \left( G^{ij} \pi_i \pi_j +     \frac{1}{(2\pi\alpha')^2} G_{ij} Z^{i\,\prime} Z^{j\,\prime}     \right)
\mathcal{H}_{LC}=-G_{+-}G^{-+}\pi_+ = -\pi_+ \ .

\label{eq:LC AdS Hamiltonian}    H_{LC}^{(AdS)}= \int_0^l \frac{d\sigma}{2\, \pi_-} \, \left(                      \pi_i \pi_i +                      \frac{1}{(2\pi\alpha')^2}                      \frac{R^4}{Y^4} Z^{i\,\prime} Z^{i\,\prime}                      \right)\ .
\label{eq:pi- transformation}     \tilde\pi_-(\tilde\sigma)d\tilde\sigma = \pi_-(\sigma)d\sigma \ .
\tilde\sigma = \frac{1}{p_-}    \int_0^{\sigma} \pi_-(\sigma') d\sigma' \ ,
\label{eq:LC AdS Hamiltonian 1}    H_{LC}^{(AdS)}= \frac{1}{2 p_-}\int_0^l d\sigma \, \left(                      \pi_i \pi_i +                      \frac{1}{(2\pi\alpha')^2}                      \frac{R^4}{Y^4} Z^{i\,\prime} Z^{i\,\prime}                      \right)\ .
\label{eq:flat Hamiltonian}     H_{LC}^{(flat)} =     \frac{1}{2 p_-}\int_0^l d\sigma \, \left(     \pi_i \pi_i +     \frac{1}{(2\pi\alpha')^2}     Z^{i\,\prime} Z^{i\,\prime}                      \right)\ .
\label{eq:LC zeroAdS Hamiltonian}     H_{LC} = \frac{1}{2 p_-}\int_0^l d\sigma \;     \pi_i \pi_i   \equiv     \frac{1}{2 p_-}\int_0^l d\sigma \;     \left( \bm{\pi}_{\perp}(\sigma)^2 +     \pi_Y(\sigma)^2\right) \ ,
\label{eq:py string Hamiltonian}    H_{LC} = \int_0^l d\sigma \, \frac{                      \sum_{i=2}^{d-1} \pi_i \pi_i + p_Y^2}                      {2 \, \pi_-(\sigma)} \equiv            \int_0^l d\sigma \, \frac{                      \bm{\pi}_{\perp}(\sigma)^2 + p_Y^2}                      {2 \, \pi_-(\sigma)}\ ,
Z^- (\sigma,\tau) = \sum_{n=-\infty}^{\infty} \left(                         z_n^- + \frac{p_n^-}{l} \tau \right)                         \cos\left(\frac{\pi n \sigma}{l}\right)
\label{eq:open string H mode expansion}      H_{LC} = \frac{1}{2p_-} \int_0^{l}\! d\sigma \, \pi_i \pi_i =               \frac{p_-}{2l}\sum_{n=-\infty}^{\infty} p^i_n p^i_n
Z^- (\sigma,\tau) = \sum_{n=-\infty}^{\infty} \left(                         z_n^- + \frac{p_n^-}{l} \tau \right)                         e^{\textstyle{\frac{2\pi i n \sigma}{l}}}
\sum_{m=-\infty}^{\infty} m \, z^i_{-m} \, p^i_m = 0 \ .
\label{eq:closed string H mode expansion}     H_{LC} \; = \;             \frac{1}{2} \int_0^{2\pi P_-}\! d\sigma \, \pi_M \pi_M =              \frac{p_-}{2l}\!\sum_{n=-\infty}^{\infty} p^i_n p^i_{-n}              \; = \;              \frac{p_-}{2l}\!\sum_{n=-\infty}^{\infty} p^i_n (p^i_n)^* \ .
[z^j_n, p^k_m] = \frac{i}{p_-} \delta^{jk} \delta_{n,-m}
\label{eq:open-zp-comm}     \left[ z^j_n , \, p^k_m \right] =     \frac{i}{2p_-} \delta_{nm} \delta^{jk}     , \ \ \ \ n,m\geq 0
[z_0^-, p_-] = i/l \ ,
\label{eq:py commutation relation}      \left[ y_0, p_Y \right] = i/l \ .
\label{eq:Schroedinger equation}     -\frac{1}{l^2} \frac{d^2}{dy_0^2} \psi(y_0) =      E_Y \psi(y_0) \ ,
E_Y = \frac{4\pi^2 n^2}{l^2 Y_{max}^2} \ ,

\label{eq:Lorentz-algebra}     [J^K_I, J^M_N] = i \left(                      \delta^K_N J^M_I -                      \delta^M_I J^K_N +                      \eta_{N\!I}\,\eta^{M\!L} J^K_L -                      \eta_{N\!L}\,\eta^{M\!K} J^L_I                      \right) \ .

\label{eq:JpJp-zero}     [J^M_+, J^N_+] = 0 \ .     [J^M_-, J^N_-] = 0\ .

\langle V \rangle /N = \frac{1}{2} \mu^2  [\phi_c^2+G(x,x)] +\frac{\lambda_0}{4}  [\phi_c^2+G(x,x)]^2+ \frac{\eta}{6}  [\phi_c^2+G(x,x)]^3,

G(xx,\chi) \rightarrow G(xx, \chi) - G(xx, m^2) \equiv G_r(x,x;\chi).
H= \int dx [ {1 \over 2} \pi(x,t)^2 + {1\over 2} (\nabla \varphi(x,t))^2 - {\alpha_0 \over \beta^2} \cos \beta \varphi + \gamma ]
< V > = < - {\alpha_0 \over \beta^2} \cos \beta \varphi > =   - {\alpha_0 \over \beta^2} \cos \beta \phi~~ e^{- {\beta^2 \over 2} G(x,x)}
\ddot{\phi} - \nabla^2 \phi + {\alpha_0 \over \beta} \sin \beta \phi ~~e^{- {\beta^2 \over 2} G(x,x)} =0 \label{eq:phi},

{\cal{H}}(\mu^2) = {1 \over 8 \pi} \int_{-\Lambda}^{\Lambda} dk {2 k^2 + \mu^2 \over (k^2 + \mu^2)^{1/2} } - {\alpha_0 \over \beta^2}  ( {\Lambda^2 \over \mu^2})^ {-\beta^2/ 8 \pi}

]_- &= \tfrac{1}{2}(\mR_{S^2}{})^2  \\    [W'\mR_{RP^2}]_-  &=  \begin{cases}   \left(\mR_{RP^2}-\frac{1}{2z}\right)\mR_{S^2}           & \text{$SO$ antisymmetric} \\   \left(\mR_{RP^2}-\frac{1}{2}\frac{d}{dz}\right)\mR_{S^2}& \text{$SO$ symmetric} \\   \left(\mR_{RP^2}+\frac{1}{2z}\right)\mR_{S^2}           & \text{$Sp$ symmetric} \\   \left(\mR_{RP^2}+\frac{1}{2}\frac{d}{dz}\right)\mR_{S^2}& \text{$Sp$ antisymmetric}  \end{cases}   \\      [W'\mR_{D^2}+\tr(m'\mM_{D^2})]_-  &= \mR_{D^2} \mR_{S^2}   \\      2[(\mM_{D^2} m)_{ff'}]_-     &= \mR_{S^2} \delta_{ff'}   \\      2[(m \mM_{D^2})_{\ft\ft'}]_- &= \mR_{S^2} \delta_{\ft \ft'} ,
]_- &= (\mR_{S^2}{})^2  \\    [W'\mR_{D^2}+\tr(m'\mM_{D^2})]_-  &= 2\mR_{D^2} \mR_{S^2}  \\    [(\mM_{D^2} m)_{ff'}]_-     &= \mR_{S^2} \delta_{ff'}   \\  [(m \mM_{D^2})_{\ft\ft'}]_- &= \mR_{S^2} \delta_{\ft \ft'} ,
R(z)  &=  \mR_{S^2}(z),  \\    T(z)  &=  N\frac{\partial}{\partial \mS}\mR_{S^2}(z)  +4\mR_{RP^2}(z) +\mR_{D^2}(z),  \\  M(z)&=\mM_{D^2}(z)

T = \left( \sqrt{\alpha} - 1 \over \sqrt{\alpha} + 1 \right)^{1/2} \sinh  \left( {(r_+^2 - r_-^2) \over r_+} t \right).
